Pubmed_ID: 32888430

Diet Diurnally Regulates Small Intestinal Microbiome-Epithelial-Immune Homeostasis and Enteritis

饮食每日调节小肠微生物组-上皮-免疫稳态和肠炎

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.08.027

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32888430/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Throughout a 24-h period, the small intestine (SI) is exposed to diurnally varying food- and microbiome-derived antigenic burdens but maintains a strict immune homeostasis, which when perturbed in genetically susceptible individuals, may lead to Crohn disease. Herein, we demonstrate that dietary content and rhythmicity regulate the diurnally shifting SI epithelial cell (SIEC) transcriptional landscape through modulation of the SI microbiome. We exemplify this concept with SIEC major histocompatibility complex (MHC) class II, which is diurnally modulated by distinct mucosal-adherent SI commensals, while supporting downstream diurnal activity of intra-epithelial IL-10+ lymphocytes regulating the SI barrier function. Disruption of this diurnally regulated diet-microbiome-MHC class II-IL-10-epithelial barrier axis by circadian clock disarrangement, alterations in feeding time or content, or epithelial-specific MHC class II depletion leads to an extensive microbial product influx, driving Crohn-like enteritis. Collectively, we highlight nutritional features that modulate SI microbiome, immunity, and barrier function and identify dietary, epithelial, and immune checkpoints along this axis to be potentially exploitable in future Crohn disease interventions.

摘要: 在整个24小时内，小肠（SI）暴露于食物和微生物组来源的昼夜变化的抗原负担，但维持严格的免疫稳态，当受到遗传易感性个体的干扰时，可能导致克罗恩病。在本文中，我们证明饮食含量和节律性通过调制SI微生物组来调节昼夜移动的SI上皮细胞（SIEC）转录环境。我们用SIECII类主要组织相容性复合体（MHC）举例说明了这一概念，该复合体由不同的粘膜粘附SI指数昼夜调节，同时支持上皮内IL-10+淋巴细胞调节SI屏障功能的下游昼夜活动。通过昼夜节律紊乱，进食时间或含量的改变或上皮特异性MHCII类耗竭改变这种昼夜调节的饮食微生物组MHCII类-IL-10-上皮屏障轴会导致大量微生物产品大量涌入，从而驱动克罗恩病样肠炎。总体而言，我们重点介绍了可调节SI微生物组，免疫力和屏障功能的营养特征，并确定了沿该轴的饮食，上皮和免疫检查点，可在未来的克罗恩病干预措施中加以利用。

Pubmed_ID: 32888417

Mothers of Preterm Infants Have Individualized Breast Milk Microbiota that Changes Temporally Based on Maternal Characteristics

早产儿的母亲具有个性化的母乳菌群，该菌群会根据母体特征而临时改变

DOI: 10.1016/j.chom.2020.08.001

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32888417/

Journal: Cell host & microbe {'ISSN': '1931-3128', 'Name': 'cell host & microbe', '2015': '12.552', '2016': '14.946', '2017': '17.872', '2018': '15.753', '2019': '15.923'}

Date: 08/31/2020

Abstract: Mother's milk contains complex microbial communities thought to be important for colonizing a preterm infant's gastrointestinal tract. However, little is known about the microbiota in the preterm mother's milk and factors influencing its composition. We characterized the temporal dynamics of microbial communities in 490 breast milk samples from 86 mothers of preterm infants (born <1,250g) over the first 8 weeks postpartum. Highly individualized microbial communities were identified in each mother's milk that changed temporally with notable alterations in predicted microbial functions. However, pre-pregnancy BMI, delivery mode, and antibiotics were associated with changes in these microbial dynamics. Individual classes of antibiotics and their duration of exposure during prenatal and postpartum periods showed unique relationships with microbial taxa abundance and diversity in mother's milk. These results highlight the temporal complexity of the preterm mother's milk microbiota and its relationship with maternal characteristics as well as the importance of discussing antibiotic stewardship for mothers.

摘要: 母乳中含有复杂的微生物群落，这些微生物群对于定居早产儿的胃肠道至关重要。但是，对于早产母乳中的微生物群及其影响因素知之甚少。我们表征了在产后前8周中来自86个早产母亲（出生于<1,250g）的490个母乳样品中微生物群落的时间动态。在每个母乳中鉴定出高度个体化的微生物群落，这些微生物随预测的微生物功能的显着变化随时间变化。但是，孕前的BMI，分娩方式和抗生素与这些微生物动力学的变化有关。产前和产后各个类别的抗生素及其接触持续时间显示出与母乳中微生物分类单元的丰度和多样性的独特关系。这些结果突出了早产母亲的牛奶菌群的时间复杂性及其与母亲特征的关系，以及讨论母亲的抗生素管理工作的重要性。

Pubmed_ID: 32887944

Activity-based cell sorting reveals responses of uncultured archaea and bacteria to substrate amendment

基于活动的细胞分选揭示了未培养的古细菌和细菌对底物修饰的反应

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-00749-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32887944/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/04/2020

Abstract: Metagenomic studies have revolutionized our understanding of the metabolic potential of uncultured microorganisms in various ecosystems. However, many of these genomic predictions have yet to be experimentally tested, and the functional expression of genomic potential often remains unaddressed. In order to obtain a more thorough understanding of cell physiology, novel techniques capable of testing microbial metabolism under close to in situ conditions must be developed. Here, we provide a benchmark study to demonstrate that bioorthogonal non-canonical amino acid tagging (BONCAT) in combination with fluorescence-activated cell sorting (FACS) and 16S rRNA gene sequencing can be used to identify anabolically active members of a microbial community incubated in the presence of various growth substrates or under changing physicochemical conditions. We applied this approach to a hot spring sediment microbiome from Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming, USA) and identified several microbes that changed their activity levels in response to substrate addition, including uncultured members of the phyla Thaumarchaeota, Acidobacteria, and Fervidibacteria. Because shifts in activity in response to substrate amendment or headspace changes are indicative of microbial preferences for particular growth conditions, results from this and future BONCAT-FACS studies could inform the development of cultivation media to specifically enrich uncultured microbes. Most importantly, BONCAT-FACS is capable of providing information on the physiology of uncultured organisms at as close to in situ conditions as experimentally possible.

摘要: 元基因组学研究彻底改变了我们对各种生态系统中未培养微生物代谢潜力的理解。然而，许多这些基因组预测尚未经过实验测试，而基因组潜力的功能表达通常仍未解决。为了获得对细胞生理学的更彻底的了解，必须开发能够在接近原位条件下测试微生物代谢的新技术。在这里，我们提供了一项基准研究，以证明生物正交非规范性氨基酸标签（BONCAT）与荧光激活细胞分选（FACS）和16SrRNA基因测序的结合可用于鉴定在以下条件下培养的微生物群落的合成代谢活性成员各种生长底物的存在或物理化学条件的变化。我们将这种方法应用于黄石国家公园（美国怀俄明州）的温泉沉积物微生物组，并发现了几种微生物，这些微生物会根据底物的添加而改变其活性水平，包括未培养的Thaumarchaeota门菌，Acidobacteria和Fervidibacteria菌。由于响应底物修饰或顶空变化而发生的活性变化表明微生物对特定生长条件的偏爱，因此本次和未来的BONCAT-FACS研究的结果可能会为培养培养基的发展提供信息，以特别丰富未培养的微生物。最重要的是，BONCAT-FACS能够在尽可能接近原位条件的条件下提供未培养生物的生理信息。

Pubmed_ID: 32887943

Environmental stability impacts the differential sensitivity of marine microbiomes to increases in temperature and acidity

环境稳定性影响海洋微生物群对温度和酸度增加的不同敏感性

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-00748-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32887943/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/04/2020

Abstract: Ambient conditions shape microbiome responses to both short- and long-duration environment changes through processes including physiological acclimation, compositional shifts, and evolution. Thus, we predict that microbial communities inhabiting locations with larger diel, episodic, and annual variability in temperature and pH should be less sensitive to shifts in these climate-change factors. To test this hypothesis, we compared responses of surface ocean microbes from more variable (nearshore) and more constant (offshore) sites to short-term factorial warming (+3 °C) and/or acidification (pH -0.3). In all cases, warming alone significantly altered microbial community composition, while acidification had a minor influence. Compared with nearshore microbes, warmed offshore microbiomes exhibited larger changes in community composition, phylotype abundances, respiration rates, and metatranscriptomes, suggesting increased sensitivity of microbes from the less-variable environment. Moreover, while warming increased respiration rates, offshore metatranscriptomes yielded evidence of thermal stress responses in protein synthesis, heat shock proteins, and regulation. Future oceans with warmer waters may enhance overall metabolic and biogeochemical rates, but they will host altered microbial communities, especially in relatively thermally stable regions of the oceans.

摘要: 环境条件通过包括生理适应，组成变化和进化的过程来塑造微生物组对短期和长期环境变化的响应。因此，我们预测，居住在温度和pH值较大，偶发性，情景性和年度可变性较大的位置的微生物群落对这些气候变化因子的变化应较不敏感。为了验证这一假设，我们比较了来自变化多端（近海）和恒定不变（近海）的地表海洋微生物对短期因子升温（+3°C）和/或酸化（pH-0.3）的响应。在所有情况下，单独变暖都会显着改变微生物群落组成，而酸化影响较小。与近岸微生物相比，变暖的近海微生物群在群落组成，系统型丰度，呼吸频率和元转录组方面表现出较大的变化，这表明在变化不大的环境中微生物的敏感性增加。此外，在变暖增加呼吸速率的同时，海上转录组产生了蛋白质合成，热激蛋白和调控中热应激反应的证据。未来海水变暖的海洋可能会提高整体代谢和生物地球化学速率，但它们将拥有变化的微生物群落，尤其是在海洋相对热稳定的地区。

Pubmed_ID: 32887539

Lactose-reduced infant formula with added corn syrup solids is associated with a distinct gut microbiota in Hispanic infants

乳糖减少的婴儿配方奶粉加上玉米糖浆固体成分与西班牙裔婴儿中独特的肠道菌群相关

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1813534

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32887539/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/09/2020

Abstract: Infant formula feeding, compared with human milk, has been associated with development of a distinct infant gut microbiome, but no previous study has examined effects of formula with added sugars. This work examined differences in gut microbiota among 91 Hispanic infants who consumed human milk [at breast (BB) vs. pumped in bottle (BP)] and 2 kinds of infant formula [(traditional lactose-based (TF) vs. lactose-reduced with added sugar (ASF)]. At 1 and 6 months, infant stool was collected to characterize gut microbiota. At 6 months, mothers completed 24-hour dietary recalls and questionnaires to determine infant consumption of human milk (BB vs. BP) or formula (TF vs. ASF). Linear regression models were used to determine associations of milk consumption type and microbial features at 6 months. Infants in the formula groups exhibited a significantly more 'mature' microbiome than infants in the human milk groups with the most pronounced differences observed between the ASF vs. BB groups. In the ASF group, we observed reduced log-normalized abundance of Bifidobacteriaceae (TF-BB Mean Difference = -0.71, ASF-BB Mean Difference = -1.10), and increased abundance of Lachnospiraceae (TF-BB Mean Difference = +0.89, ASF-BB Mean Difference = +1.20). We also observed a higher Community Phenotype Index of propionate, most likely produced by Lachnospiraceae, in the ASF group (TF-BB Mean Difference = +0.27, ASF-BB Mean Difference = +0.36). This study provides the first evidence that consumption of infant formula with added sugar may have a stronger association than birth delivery mode, infant caloric intake, and maternal BMI on the infant's microbiome at 6 months of age.

摘要: 与母乳相比，婴儿配方食品的喂养与独特的婴儿肠道微生物组的发展有关，但是以前没有研究检查添加糖的配方食品的效果。这项工作研究了91名西班牙裔婴儿中肠道菌群的差异，这些婴儿在母乳中食用[母乳（BB）与在瓶中抽奶（BP）]和2种婴儿配方奶粉[（传统乳糖基（TF）与乳糖减少）在第1和6个月时，收集婴儿粪便以表征肠道菌群。在6个月时，母亲完成24小时的饮食召回和问卷调查，以确定婴儿的母乳消耗量（BBvs.BP）或（TFvs.ASF）。线性回归模型用于确定6个月时的牛奶摄入类型和微生物特征之间的关系。配方奶粉组中婴儿的“成熟”微生物组明显多于婴儿奶粉组中婴儿的“成熟”微生物组。在ASF组和BB组之间观察到明显的差异。在ASF组中，我们观察到双歧杆菌科的对数归一化丰度降低（TF-BB平均差异=-0.71，ASF-BB平均差异=-1.10），斜纹藻科的丰度增加（TF-BB平均差=+0.89，ASF-BB平均差=+1.20）。我们还观察到在ASF组中丙酸的群落表型指数更高，最有可能由斜纹菌科产生（TF-BB平均差异=+0.27，ASF-BB平均差异=+0.36）。这项研究提供了第一个证据，即与分娩方式，婴儿热量摄入和6个月大时婴儿的微生物组中的母亲BMI相比，食用含糖的婴儿配方食品可能具有更强的关联性。

Pubmed_ID: 32879462

A 500-year tale of co-evolution, adaptation, and virulence: Helicobacter pylori in the Americas

共进化，适应和毒力的500年历史：美洲的幽门螺杆菌

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-00758-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32879462/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Helicobacter pylori is a common component of the human stomach microbiota, possibly dating back to the speciation of Homo sapiens. A history of pathogen evolution in allopatry has led to the development of genetically distinct H. pylori subpopulations, associated with different human populations, and more recent admixture among H. pylori subpopulations can provide information about human migrations. However, little is known about the degree to which some H. pylori genes are conserved in the face of admixture, potentially indicating host adaptation, or how virulence genes spread among different populations. We analyzed H. pylori genomes from 14 countries in the Americas, strains from the Iberian Peninsula, and public genomes from Europe, Africa, and Asia, to investigate how admixture varies across different regions and gene families. Whole-genome analyses of 723 H. pylori strains from around the world showed evidence of frequent admixture in the American strains with a complex mosaic of contributions from H. pylori populations originating in the Americas as well as other continents. Despite the complex admixture, distinctive genomic fingerprints were identified for each region, revealing novel American H. pylori subpopulations. A pan-genome Fst analysis showed that variation in virulence genes had the strongest fixation in America, compared with non-American populations, and that much of the variation constituted non-synonymous substitutions in functional domains. Network analyses suggest that these virulence genes have followed unique evolutionary paths in the American populations, spreading into different genetic backgrounds, potentially contributing to the high risk of gastric cancer in the region.

摘要: 幽门螺杆菌是人胃微生物群的常见组成部分，可能可以追溯到智人的物种。异源病原体进化的历史已经导致了与不同人群相关的遗传上不同的幽门螺杆菌亚群的发展，并且幽门螺杆菌亚群之间的最新混合可以提供有关人类迁徙的信息。但是，对于一些幽门螺杆菌基因在混合物中的保守程度知之甚少，这可能表明宿主的适应性，或者毒力基因如何在不同人群中传播。我们分析了来自美洲14个国家的幽门螺杆菌基因组，伊比利亚半岛的菌株以及欧洲，非洲和亚洲的公共基因组，以研究混合物在不同地区和基因家族之间的差异。对来自世界各地的723例H.pylori菌株进行全基因组分析表明，在美洲菌株中频繁混合的证据表明，起源于美洲和其他大陆的H.pylori种群具有复杂的贡献。尽管存在复杂的混合物，但仍为每个区域鉴定了独特的基因组指纹，从而揭示了新颖的美国幽门螺杆菌亚群。泛基因组Fst分析表明，与非美国人群相比，毒力基因的变异在美国具有最强的固定性，并且大部分变异构成功能域中的非同义词替换。网络分析表明，这些毒力基因在美国人群中遵循独特的进化路径，传播到不同的遗传背景，可能导致该地区胃癌的高风险。

Pubmed_ID: 32879459

Cytometric fingerprints of gut microbiota predict Crohn's disease state

肠道菌群的细胞指纹图谱可预测克罗恩病状态

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-00762-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32879459/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Variations in the gut microbiome have been associated with changes in health state such as Crohn's disease (CD). Most surveys characterize the microbiome through analysis of the 16S rRNA gene. An alternative technology that can be used is flow cytometry. In this report, we reanalyzed a disease cohort that has been characterized by both technologies. Changes in microbial community structure are reflected in both types of data. We demonstrate that cytometric fingerprints can be used as a diagnostic tool in order to classify samples according to CD state. These results highlight the potential of flow cytometry to perform rapid diagnostics of microbiome-associated diseases.

摘要: 肠道微生物组的变化与诸如克罗恩病（CD）等健康状况的变化有关。大多数调查通过对16SrRNA基因的分析来表征微生物组。可以使用的替代技术是流式细胞仪。在本报告中，我们重新分析了两种技术都具有的疾病队列。两种类型的数据都反映了微生物群落结构的变化。我们证明细胞计数指纹可以用作诊断工具，以便根据CD状态对样品进行分类。这些结果凸显了流式细胞仪进行微生物组相关疾病快速诊断的潜力。

Pubmed_ID: 32873785

Widespread transfer of mobile antibiotic resistance genes within individual gut microbiomes revealed through bacterial Hi-C

通过细菌Hi-C揭示了单个肠道微生物群中移动抗生素抗性基因的广泛转移

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18164-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32873785/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: The gut microbiome harbors a 'silent reservoir' of antibiotic resistance (AR) genes that is thought to contribute to the emergence of multidrug-resistant pathogens through horizontal gene transfer (HGT). To counteract the spread of AR, it is paramount to know which organisms harbor mobile AR genes and which organisms engage in HGT. Despite methods that characterize the overall abundance of AR genes in the gut, technological limitations of short-read sequencing have precluded linking bacterial taxa to specific mobile genetic elements (MGEs) encoding AR genes. Here, we apply Hi-C, a high-throughput, culture-independent method, to surveil the bacterial carriage of MGEs. We compare two healthy individuals with seven neutropenic patients undergoing hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, who receive multiple courses of antibiotics, and are acutely vulnerable to the threat of multidrug-resistant infections. We find distinct networks of HGT across individuals, though AR and mobile genes are associated with more diverse taxa within the neutropenic patients than the healthy subjects. Our data further suggest that HGT occurs frequently over a several-week period in both cohorts. Whereas most efforts to understand the spread of AR genes have focused on pathogenic species, our findings shed light on the role of the human gut microbiome in this process.

摘要: 肠道微生物组具有抗生素抗性（AR）基因的“沉默库”，据认为可通过水平基因转移（HGT）促进多药耐药性病原体的出现。为了抵消AR的扩散，了解哪些生物带有可携带的AR基因以及哪些生物参与HGT至关重要。尽管有各种方法可以表征肠道中AR基因的总体丰度，但短读测序的技术局限性却无法将细菌分类群与编码AR基因的特定移动遗传元件（MGE）连接起来。在这里，我们应用Hi-C（一种高通量，与培养无关的方法）来监测MGE的细菌携带。我们将两名健康个体与接受造血干细胞移植的七名中性粒细胞减少症患者进行比较，他们接受了多个疗程的抗生素治疗，并且极易受到多重耐药性感染的威胁。我们发现个体之间存在不同的HGT网络，尽管与健康受试者相比，中性粒细胞减少症患者中AR和移动基因与更多不同的分类群相关。我们的数据进一步表明，这两个队列均在数周的时间内频繁发生HGT。尽管大多数了解AR基因传播的努力都集中在致病物种上，但我们的发现揭示了人类肠道微生物组在此过程中的作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32873760

A Novel Mycovirus Evokes Transcriptional Rewiring in the Fungus Malassezia and Stimulates Beta Interferon Production in Macrophages

一种新型的分枝杆菌病毒在真菌马拉色菌中引起转录重排，并刺激巨噬细胞中的β干扰素产生。

DOI: 10.1128/mBio.01534-20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32873760/

Journal: mBio {'ISSN': '2150-7511', 'Name': 'mbio', '2015': '6.975', '2016': '6.956', '2017': '6.689', '2018': '6.747', '2019': '6.784'}

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: Mycoviruses infect fungi, and while most persist asymptomatically, there are examples of mycoviruses having both beneficial and detrimental effects on their host. Virus-infected Saccharomyces and Ustilago strains exhibit a killer phenotype conferring a growth advantage over uninfected strains and other competing yeast species, whereas hypovirus-infected Cryphonectria parasitica displays defects in growth, sporulation, and virulence. In this study, we identify a double-stranded RNA (dsRNA) mycovirus in five Malassezia species. Sequence analysis reveals it to be a totivirus with two dsRNA segments: a larger 4.5-kb segment with genes encoding components for viral replication and maintenance, and a smaller 1.4-kb segment encoding a novel protein. Furthermore, transcriptome sequencing (RNA-seq) of virus-infected versus virus-cured Malassezia sympodialis revealed an upregulation of dozens of ribosomal components in the cell, suggesting the virus modifies the transcriptional and translational landscapes of the cell. Given that Malassezia is the most abundant fungus on human skin, we assessed the impact of the mycovirus in a murine epicutaneous infection model. Although infection with virus-infected strains was not associated with an increased inflammatory response, we did observe enhanced skin colonization in one of two virus-infected M. sympodialis strains. Noteworthy, beta interferon expression was significantly upregulated in bone marrow-derived macrophages when challenged with virus-infected, compared to virus-cured, M. sympodialis, suggesting that the presence of the virus can induce an immunological response. Although many recent studies have illuminated how widespread mycoviruses are, there are relatively few in-depth studies about their impact on disease caused by the host fungus. We describe here a novel mycovirus in Malassezia and its possible implications in pathogenicity.IMPORTANCE Malassezia species represent the most common fungal inhabitant of the mammalian skin microbiome and are natural skin commensal flora. However, these fungi are also associated with a variety of clinical skin disorders. Recent studies have reported associations of Malassezia with Crohn's disease and pancreatic cancer, further implicating this fungal genus in inflammatory and neoplastic disease states. Because M. sympodialis has lost genes involved in RNA interference (RNAi), we hypothesized Malassezia could harbor dsRNA mycoviruses. Indeed, we identified a novel mycovirus of the totivirus family in several Malassezia species and characterized the MsMV1 mycovirus of M. sympodialis We found conditions that lead to curing of the virus and analyzed isogenic virus-infected/virus-cured strains to determine MsMV1 genetic and pathogenic impacts. MsMV1 induces a strong overexpression of transcription factors and ribosomal genes, while downregulating cellular metabolism. Moreover, MsMV1 induced a significantly higher level of beta interferon expression in cultured macrophages. This study sheds light on the mechanisms of pathogenicity of Malassezia, focusing on a previously unidentified novel mycovirus.

摘要: 霉菌病毒感染真菌，尽管大多数无症状，但仍有一些霉菌病毒对其宿主产生有益和有害作用的例子。病毒感染的酿酒酵母和Ustilago菌株表现出杀手表型，与未感染的菌株和其他竞争酵母相比，具有生长优势，而被低毒病毒感染的Cryphonectriaparasitica则表现出生长，孢子形成和毒力方面的缺陷。在这项研究中，我们确定了五个马拉色菌属物种中的双链RNA（dsRNA）分支病毒。序列分析显示它是一种带有两个dsRNA片段的轮状病毒：一个较大的4.5kb片段，带有编码病毒复制和维持成分的基因，一个较小的1.4kb片段，编码新蛋白质。此外，病毒感染的和病毒治疗的马拉色氏菌症状的转录组测序（RNA-seq）揭示了细胞中数十种核糖体成分的上调，表明该病毒修饰了细胞的转录和翻译环境。鉴于马拉色霉菌是人类皮肤上最丰富的真菌，我们评估了鼠类表皮感染模型中分枝杆菌病毒的影响。尽管用病毒感染的菌株感染与炎症反应增加无关，但我们确实观察到两种病毒感染的M.sympodialis菌株之一的皮肤定植增强。值得注意的是，与病毒治疗的交感支原体相比，β-干扰素的表达在被病毒感染的骨髓来源的巨噬细胞中显着上调，表明该病毒的存在可以诱导免疫反应。尽管最近的许多研究阐明了分枝杆菌病毒的广泛传播，但关于其对宿主真菌引起的疾病影响的深入研究相对较少。我们在这里描述了一种新的马拉色菌属分枝杆菌病毒及其在致病性中的潜在意义。重要事项马拉色菌属代表了哺乳动物皮肤微生物组中最常见的真菌，是自然的皮肤共生菌群。但是，这些真菌也与多种临床皮肤疾病有关。最近的研究报道了马拉色菌病与克罗恩氏病和胰腺癌的相关性，进一步将这种真菌属牵涉到炎性和赘生性疾病状态。由于交配分枝杆菌失去了涉及RNA干扰（RNAi）的基因，因此我们假设马拉色菌可以携带dsRNA霉菌病毒。确实，我们在几个马拉色菌属中鉴定了一种新型的轮状病毒家族分枝杆菌病毒，并鉴定了交趾支原体的MsMV1分支杆菌病毒。致病影响。MsMV1诱导转录因子和核糖体基因的强烈过表达，同时下调细胞代谢。此外，MsMV1诱导培养的巨噬细胞中β干扰素的表达水平明显升高。这项研究阐明了马拉色菌的致病性机制，重点研究了以前未知的新型霉菌病毒。

Pubmed_ID: 32873755

Unveiling Crucivirus Diversity by Mining Metagenomic Data

通过挖掘元基因组数据揭示十字形病毒的多样性

DOI: 10.1128/mBio.01410-20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32873755/

Journal: mBio {'ISSN': '2150-7511', 'Name': 'mbio', '2015': '6.975', '2016': '6.956', '2017': '6.689', '2018': '6.747', '2019': '6.784'}

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: The discovery of cruciviruses revealed the most explicit example of a common protein homologue between DNA and RNA viruses to date. Cruciviruses are a novel group of circular Rep-encoding single-stranded DNA (ssDNA) (CRESS-DNA) viruses that encode capsid proteins that are most closely related to those encoded by RNA viruses in the family Tombusviridae The apparent chimeric nature of the two core proteins encoded by crucivirus genomes suggests horizontal gene transfer of capsid genes between DNA and RNA viruses. Here, we identified and characterized 451 new crucivirus genomes and 10 capsid-encoding circular genetic elements through de novo assembly and mining of metagenomic data. These genomes are highly diverse, as demonstrated by sequence comparisons and phylogenetic analysis of subsets of the protein sequences they encode. Most of the variation is reflected in the replication-associated protein (Rep) sequences, and much of the sequence diversity appears to be due to recombination. Our results suggest that recombination tends to occur more frequently among groups of cruciviruses with relatively similar capsid proteins and that the exchange of Rep protein domains between cruciviruses is rarer than intergenic recombination. Additionally, we suggest members of the stramenopiles/alveolates/Rhizaria supergroup as possible crucivirus hosts. Altogether, we provide a comprehensive and descriptive characterization of cruciviruses.IMPORTANCE Viruses are the most abundant biological entities on Earth. In addition to their impact on animal and plant health, viruses have important roles in ecosystem dynamics as well as in the evolution of the biosphere. Circular Rep-encoding single-stranded (CRESS) DNA viruses are ubiquitous in nature, many are agriculturally important, and they appear to have multiple origins from prokaryotic plasmids. A subset of CRESS-DNA viruses, the cruciviruses, have homologues of capsid proteins encoded by RNA viruses. The genetic structure of cruciviruses attests to the transfer of capsid genes between disparate groups of viruses. However, the evolutionary history of cruciviruses is still unclear. By collecting and analyzing cruciviral sequence data, we provide a deeper insight into the evolutionary intricacies of cruciviruses. Our results reveal an unexpected diversity of this virus group, with frequent recombination as an important determinant of variability.

摘要: 十字架病毒的发现揭示了迄今为止DNA和RNA病毒之间常见蛋白质同源性的最明确例子。十字花科病毒是一组新的环状Rep编码单链DNA（ssDNA）（CRESS-DNA）病毒，其编码与衣壳病毒科（Tombusviridae）的RNA病毒编码的衣壳蛋白最密切相关的衣壳蛋白。两个核心的明显嵌合性质杯状病毒基因组编码的蛋白质提示衣壳基因在DNA和RNA病毒之间水平转移。在这里，我们通过从头组装和宏基因组学数据的挖掘，鉴定并鉴定了451个新的十字病毒基因组和10个编码衣壳的环状遗传元件。这些基因组具有高度多样性，如序列比较和对它们编码的蛋白质序列子集的系统发育分析所证明。大多数变异反映在复制相关蛋白（Rep）序列中，许多序列多样性似乎是由于重组引起的。我们的结果表明，重组病毒往往在衣壳蛋白相对相似的组间更频繁地发生，并且在交叉病毒之间的Rep蛋白结构域的交换比基因间重组更为罕见。此外，我们建议将stramenopiles/alveolates/Rhizaria超群成员作为可能的十字形病毒宿主。总而言之，我们提供了十字形病毒的全面描述性特征。重要信息病毒是地球上最丰富的生物实体。除了对动植物健康的影响外，病毒在生态系统动态以及生物圈的演变中也起着重要作用。环状Rep编码单链（CRESS）DNA病毒在自然界普遍存在，许多在农业上具有重要意义，并且它们似乎具有来自原核质粒的多种来源。CRESS-DNA病毒的一部分，即十字病毒，具有由RNA病毒编码的衣壳蛋白的同源物。交叉病毒的遗传结构证明了衣壳基因在不同病毒组之间的转移。但是，十字花科病毒的进化历史仍不清楚。通过收集和分析十字花科病毒序列数据，我们可以更深入地了解十字花科病毒的进化复杂性。我们的结果揭示了该病毒组的意外多样性，其频繁重组是变异性的重要决定因素。

Pubmed_ID: 32873697

Western-type diet influences mortality from necrotising pancreatitis and demonstrates a central role for butyrate

西式饮食会影响坏死性胰腺炎的死亡率，并显示丁酸盐的核心作用

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-320430

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32873697/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: Objective: The gut microbiota are the main source of infections in necrotising pancreatitis. We investigated the effect of disruption of the intestinal microbiota by a Western-type diet on mortality and bacterial dissemination in necrotising pancreatitis and its reversal by butyrate supplementation. Design: C57BL/6 mice were fed either standard chow or a Western-type diet for 4 weeks and were then subjected to taurocholate-induced necrotising pancreatitis. Blood and pancreas were collected for bacteriology and immune analysis. The cecum microbiota composition of mice was analysed using 16S rRNA gene amplicon sequencing and cecal content metabolites were analysed by targeted (ie, butyrate) and untargeted metabolomics. Prevention of necrotising pancreatitis in this model was compared between faecal microbiota transplantation (FMT) from healthy mice, antibiotic decontamination against Gram-negative bacteria and oral or systemic butyrate administration. Additionally, the faecal microbiota of patients with pancreatitis and healthy subjects were analysed. Results: Mortality, systemic inflammation and bacterial dissemination were increased in mice fed Western diet and their gut microbiota were characterised by a loss of diversity, a bloom of Escherichia coli and an altered metabolic profile with butyrate depletion. While antibiotic decontamination decreased mortality, Gram-positive dissemination was increased. Both oral and systemic butyrate supplementation decreased mortality, bacterial dissemination, and reversed the microbiota alterations. Paradoxically, mortality and bacterial dissemination were increased with FMT administration. Finally, patients with acute pancreatitis demonstrated an increase in Proteobacteria and a decrease of butyrate producers compared with healthy subjects. Conclusion: Butyrate depletion and its repletion appear to play a central role in disease progression towards necrotising pancreatitis.

摘要: 目的：肠道菌群是坏死性胰腺炎的主要感染源。我们调查了坏死性胰腺炎中西方饮食对肠道菌群的破坏对死亡率和细菌传播的影响，并通过补充丁酸盐逆转了这种作用。设计：给C57BL/6小鼠喂普通食物或西式饮食4周，然后进行牛磺胆酸盐诱导的坏死性胰腺炎。收集血液和胰腺进行细菌学和免疫分析。使用16SrRNA基因扩增子序列分析小鼠的盲肠微生物群组成，并通过靶向（即丁酸盐）和非靶向代谢组学分析盲肠含量代谢产物。在健康小鼠的粪便微生物菌群移植（FMT），革兰氏阴性菌抗生素去污以及口服或全身丁酸盐给药之间，比较了该模型中坏死性胰腺炎的预防作用。此外，对胰腺炎患者和健康受试者的粪便微生物群进行了分析。结果：喂食西方饮食的小鼠死亡率，全身炎症和细菌传播均增加，其肠道微生物群的特征是多样性丧失，大肠杆菌大量繁殖和丁酸耗竭而代谢特征发生改变。尽管抗生素去污降低了死亡率，但革兰氏阳性扩散却增加了。口服和全身性丁酸盐的补充都降低了死亡率，细菌传播并扭转了微生物群的改变。矛盾的是，使用FMT会增加死亡率和细菌传播。最后，与健康受试者相比，急性胰腺炎患者表现出Proteobacteria的增加和丁酸盐生产者的减少。结论：丁酸盐的消耗及其补充似乎在疾病向坏死性胰腺炎的发展中起着重要作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32868914

Context-aware dimensionality reduction deconvolutes gut microbial community dynamics

上下文感知的降维反演肠道微生物群落动态

DOI: 10.1038/s41587-020-0660-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32868914/

Journal: Nature biotechnology {'ISSN': '1087-0156', 'Name': 'nature biotechnology', '2015': '43.113', '2016': '41.667', '2017': '35.724', '2018': '31.864', '2019': '36.558'}

Date: 08/31/2020

Abstract: The translational power of human microbiome studies is limited by high interindividual variation. We describe a dimensionality reduction tool, compositional tensor factorization (CTF), that incorporates information from the same host across multiple samples to reveal patterns driving differences in microbial composition across phenotypes. CTF identifies robust patterns in sparse compositional datasets, allowing for the detection of microbial changes associated with specific phenotypes that are reproducible across datasets.

摘要: 人类微生物组研究的翻译能力受到个体间差异很大的限制。我们描述了一种降维工具，成分张量因子分解（CTF），该工具将来自多个样本中同一宿主的信息合并在一起，以揭示驱动表型微生物组成差异的模式。CTF可以识别稀疏成分数据集中的稳健模式，从而可以检测与可在数据集之间重现的特定表型相关的微生物变化。

Pubmed_ID: 32865119

Gut commensal microbiota and decreased risk for Enterobacteriaceae bacteriuria and urinary tract infection

肠道共生菌群和肠杆菌科细菌尿症和尿路感染的风险降低

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1805281

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32865119/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/09/2020

Abstract: Urinary tract infection (UTI) is a common complication in kidney transplant recipients and can lead to significant morbidity and mortality. Recent evidence supports a role for the gut as a source for UTIs but little is known about the relationship between gut commensal bacteria and UTI development. We hypothesized that the abundance of gut commensal bacteria is associated with a lower risk of developing bacteriuria and UTIs. We performed gut microbiome profiling using 16S rRNA gene sequencing of the V4-V5 hypervariable region on 510 fecal specimens in 168 kidney transplant recipients. Fifty-one kidney transplant recipients (30%) developed Enterobacteriaceae bacteriuria within the first 6 months after transplantation (Enterobacteriaceae Bacteriuria Group) and 117 did not (No Enterobacteriaceae Bacteriuria Group). The relative abundances of Faecalibacterium and Romboutsia were significantly higher in the fecal specimens from the No Enterobacteriaceae Bacteriuria Group than those from the Enterobacteriaceae Bacteriuria Group (Adjusted P value<.01). The combined relative abundance of Faecalibacterium and Romboutsia was inversely correlated with the relative abundance of Enterobacteriaceae (r = -0.13, P = .003). In a multivariable Cox Regression, a top tercile cutoff of the combined relative abundance of Faecalibacterium and Romboutsia of ≥13.7% was independently associated with a decreased risk for Enterobacteriaceae bacteriuria (hazard ratio 0.3, P = .02) and Enterobacteriaceae UTI (hazard ratio 0.4, P = .09). In conclusion, we identify bacterial taxa associated with decreased risk for Enterobacteriaceae bacteriuria and Enterobacteriaceae UTI in kidney transplant recipients, which supports future studies on modulating the gut microbiota as a novel treatment for preventing UTIs.

摘要: 尿路感染（UTI）是肾移植患者的常见并发症，可导致明显的发病率和死亡率。最近的证据支持肠道作为UTI的来源，但对肠道共生细菌与UTI发展之间关系的了解甚少。我们假设肠道共生细菌的丰富与细菌尿症和泌尿道感染的风险降低有关。我们在168个肾脏移植受者的510个粪便标本上使用V4-V5高变区的16SrRNA基因测序对肠道微生物组进行了分析。51例肾移植受者（30％）在移植后的前6个月内出现了肠杆菌科细菌性尿杆菌（肠杆菌科细菌性尿酸组），而117例则没有（没有肠杆菌科细菌性尿酸组）。无肠杆菌科细菌粪便组中粪便标本中费氏杆菌和罗氏菌的相对丰度明显高于肠杆菌科细菌粪便组（校正后的P值<.01）。Faecalibacterium和Rom​​boutsia的总相对丰度与肠杆菌科的相对丰度呈负相关（r=-0.13，P=.003）。在多变量Cox回归中，费氏细菌和罗氏菌的相对相对丰度最高的临界截止值≥13.7％与降低肠杆菌科细菌尿的风险（危险比0.3，P=.02）和肠杆菌科尿路感染（危险比0.4）相关。，P=.09）。总之，我们确定了与肾脏移植受者肠杆菌科细菌尿杆菌和肠杆菌科尿路感染的风险降低相关的细菌类群，这为将来调节肠道菌群作为预防尿路感染的新方法提供了支持。

Pubmed_ID: 32862830

Impact of investigational microbiota therapeutic RBX2660 on the gut microbiome and resistome revealed by a placebo-controlled clinical trial

安慰剂对照临床试验揭示了研究性微生物群治疗性RBX2660对肠道微生物组和抵抗组的影响

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00907-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32862830/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 08/31/2020

Abstract: Background: Intestinal microbiota restoration can be achieved by complementing a subject's perturbed microbiota with that of a healthy donor. Recurrent Clostridioides difficile infection (rCDI) is one key application of such treatment. Another emerging application of interest is reducing antibiotic-resistant genes (ARGs) and organisms (AROs). In this study, we investigated fecal specimens from a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled phase 2b study of microbiota-based investigational drug RBX2660. Patients were administered either placebo, 1 dose of RBX2660 and 1 placebo, or 2 doses of RBX2660 via enema and longitudinally tracked for changes in their microbiome and antibiotic resistome. Results: All patients exhibited significant recovery of gut microbiome diversity and a decrease of ARG relative abundance during the first 7 days post-treatment. However, the microbiome and resistome shifts toward average configurations from unperturbed individuals were more significant and longer-lasting in RBX2660 recipients compared to placebo. We quantified microbiome and resistome modification by RBX2660 using a novel "transplantation index" metric. We identified taxonomic and metabolic features distinguishing the baseline microbiome of non-transplanted patients and taxa specifically enriched during the process of transplantation. We elucidated the correlation between resistome and taxonomic transplantations and post-treatment dynamics of patient-specific and RBX2660-specific ARGs. Whole genome sequencing of AROs cultured from RBX2660 product and patient samples indicate ARO eradication in patients via RBX2660 administration, but also, to a lesser extent, introduction of RBX2660-derived AROs. Conclusions: Through shotgun metagenomic sequencing, we elucidated the effects of RBX2660 in the microbiome and resistome. Antibiotic discontinuation alone resulted in significant recovery of gut microbial diversity and reduced ARG relative abundance, but RBX2660 administration more rapidly and completely changed the composition of patients' microbiome, resistome, and ARO colonization by transplanting RBX2660 microbiota into the recipients. Although ARGs and AROs were transmitted through RBX2660, the resistome post-RBX2660 more closely resembled that of the administered product-a proxy for the donor-than an antibiotic perturbed state. Trial registration: ClinicalTrials.gov, NCT02299570 . Registered 19 November 2014 Video Abstract.

摘要: 背景：肠道菌群的恢复可以通过用健康的供体补充受试者的摄动菌群来实现。复发性艰难梭菌感染（rCDI）是此类治疗的关键应用之一。另一个令人感兴趣的新兴应用是减少抗生素抗性基因（ARG）和生物体（ARO）。在这项研究中，我们调查了基于微生物群的研究药物RBX2660的多中心，随机，双盲，安慰剂对照2b期研究的粪便标本。通过灌肠给患者服用安慰剂，1剂RBX2660和1剂安慰剂或2剂RBX2660，并纵向跟踪其微生物组和抗生素抵抗组的变化。结果：所有患者在治疗后的前7天均表现出明显的肠道微生物组多样性恢复，并且ARG相对丰度降低。但是，与安慰剂相比，RBX2660接受者中微生物组和抵抗组从不受干扰的个体向平均构型的转变更为显着且持续时间更长。我们使用新的“移植指数”指标，通过RBX2660量化了微生物组和抵抗组修饰。我们确定了分类学和代谢特征，这些特征区分了非移植患者的基线微生物组和在移植过程中特别丰富的分类单元。我们阐明了抵抗组和分类移植与患者特异性和RBX2660特异性ARGs治疗后动力学之间的相关性。从RBX2660产品和患者样品中培养出的ARO的全基因组测序表明，通过RBX2660给药可根除患者的ARO，但在较小程度上，还可引入RBX2660衍生的ARO。结论：通过shot弹枪宏基因组测序，我们阐明了RBX2660在微生物组和抵抗组中的作用。单独使用抗生素会导致肠道微生物多样性显着恢复并降低ARG相对丰度，但是通过将RBX2660微生物菌群移植到受体中，RBX2660的给药更加迅速，彻底地改变了患者微生物组，抵抗组和ARO定植的组成。尽管ARG和ARO是通过RBX2660传播的，但RBX2660之后的抗药性组与被摄产品的抗药性（供体的代理人）更像是抗生素扰动状态。试用注册：ClinicalTrials.gov，NCT02299570。2014年11月19日注册录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32859933

Faecal microbiota transplantation for the treatment of diarrhoea induced by tyrosine-kinase inhibitors in patients with metastatic renal cell carcinoma

粪便菌群移植治疗酪氨酸激酶抑制剂引起的转移性肾细胞癌腹泻

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18127-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32859933/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/28/2020

Abstract: Diarrhoea is one of the most burdensome and common adverse events of chemotherapeutics, and has no standardised therapy to date. Increasing evidence suggests that the gut microbiome can influence the development of chemotherapy-induced diarrhoea. Here we report findings from a randomised clinical trial of faecal microbiota transplantation (FMT) to treat diarrhoea induced by tyrosine kinase inhibitors (TKI) in patients with metastatic renal cell carcinoma (ClinicalTrials.gov number: NCT04040712). The primary outcome is the resolution of diarrhoea four weeks after the end of treatments. Twenty patients are randomised to receive FMT from healthy donors or placebo FMT (vehicle only). Donor FMT is more effective than placebo FMT in treating TKI-induced diarrhoea, and a successful engraftment is observed in subjects receiving donor faeces. No serious adverse events are observed in both treatment arms. The trial meets pre-specified endpoints. Our findings suggest that the therapeutic manipulation of gut microbiota may become a promising treatment option to manage TKI-dependent diarrhoea.

摘要: 腹泻是化学疗法中最繁重且最常见的不良事件之一，迄今为止尚无标准化疗法。越来越多的证据表明，肠道微生物组可以影响化疗引起的腹泻。在这里，我们报告了粪便微生物群移植（FMT）治疗由转移性肾细胞癌患者酪氨酸激酶抑制剂（TKI）引起的腹泻的随机临床试验的发现（ClinicalTrials.gov编号：NCT04040712）。主要结局是治疗结束四周后腹泻得到缓解。20名患者被随机分配接受来自健康供体的FMT或安慰剂FMT（仅用于车辆）。供体FMT在治疗TKI引起的腹泻方面比安慰剂FMT更有效，并且在接受供体粪便的受试者中观察到成功的植入。在两个治疗组中均未观察到严重的不良事件。该试验符合预先指定的终点。我们的发现表明，肠道菌群的治疗性操作可能成为管理TKI依赖型腹泻的有前途的治疗选择。

Pubmed_ID: 32859898

Integrated microbiota and metabolite profiles link Crohn's disease to sulfur metabolism

完整的微生物群和代谢产物谱将克罗恩病与硫代谢联系起来

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-17956-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32859898/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/28/2020

Abstract: Gut microbial and metabolite alterations have been linked to the pathogenesis of inflammatory bowel diseases. Here we perform a multi-omics microbiome and metabolite analysis of a longitudinal cohort of Crohn's disease patients undergoing autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, and investigational therapy that induces drug free remission in a subset of patients. Via comparison of patients who responded and maintained remission, responded but experienced disease relapse and patients who did not respond to therapy, we identify shared functional signatures that correlate with disease activity despite the variability of gut microbiota profiles at taxonomic level. These signatures reflect the disease state when transferred to gnotobiotic mice. Taken together, the integration of microbiome and metabolite profiles from human cohort and mice improves the predictive modelling of disease outcome, and allows the identification of a network of bacteria-metabolite interactions involving sulfur metabolism as a key mechanism linked to disease activity in Crohn's disease.

摘要: 肠道微生物和代谢产物的改变与炎症性肠病的发病机理有关。在这里，我们对接受自体造血干细胞移植的克罗恩氏病患者的纵向队列进行了多组学微生物组和代谢物分析，并在一部分患者中引起了无药缓解的研究性治疗。通过比较缓解和维持缓解，缓解但经历过疾病复发的患者和未响应治疗的患者，我们发现尽管肠道菌群在分类学水平上存在差异，但与疾病活动相关的共享功能特征。这些特征反映了转移到gnotobiotic小鼠时的疾病状态。总之，人类队列和小鼠的微生物组和代谢产物谱的整合改善了疾病结局的预测模型，并允许鉴定涉及硫代谢的细菌-代谢物相互作用网络，这是与克罗恩病疾病活动相关的关键机制。

Pubmed_ID: 32845788

Modulation of gut microbiota in healthy rats after exposure to nutritional supplements

暴露于营养补充剂后健康大鼠肠道菌群的调节

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1779002

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32845788/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/09/2020

Abstract: Introduction: Rats are experimental animals, frequently used as model organisms in the biomedical studies, and increasingly used to study the gut microbiota. Specifically, the aim of latter studies is either the elucidation of relationship between intestinal dysbiosis and diseases or the determination of nutrients or pharmaceutical agents which can cause the modulation in the presence or abundance of gut microbiota. Aim: Herein, the research studies conducted on the gut microbiota of healthy rats are presented in a summarized and concise overview. The focus is on studies aimed to reveal the shifts in microbial composition and functional changes after exposure to various types of nutritional supplements. Methods: We performed the search of PubMed database using the term "rat gut microbiome microbiota" and examined studies aimed to assess the composition of gut microbiota in physiological homeostasis as well as the effect of various nutritional supplements on the gut microbiota of healthy rats.

摘要: 简介：大鼠是实验动物，在生物医学研究中经常用作模型生物，并越来越多地用于研究肠道菌群。具体而言，后一研究的目的是阐明肠道营养不良与疾病之间的关系，或者确定可能导致肠道菌群存在或丰富的调节的营养素或药物。目的：在本文中，对健康大鼠的肠道菌群进行的研究总结在简明扼要的概述中。重点是旨在揭示暴露于各种类型营养补品后微生物成分变化和功能变化的研究。方法：我们使用术语“大鼠肠道微生物组微生物群”进行PubMed数据库搜索，并检查了旨在评估生理稳态中肠道微生物群组成以及各种营养补充剂对健康大鼠肠道微生物群的影响的研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32844722

Pre-therapy fasting slows epithelial turnover and modulates the microbiota but fails to mitigate methotrexate-induced gastrointestinal mucositis

治疗前的禁食可减慢上皮周转并调节微生物群，但不能缓解甲氨蝶呤引起的胃肠道粘膜炎

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1809332

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32844722/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/09/2020

Abstract: Background: Recent findings by Tang et al. (2020) show dietary restriction (30%, 2 weeks) prevents methotrexate-induced mortality by modulation of the microbiota, specifically the expansion of Lactobacillus. While fundamentally insightful, upscaling this schedule is a major obstacle to clinical uptake. Here, we evaluate a safe and clinically achievable schedule of pre-therapy fasting for 48 h on microbiota composition, body composition and intestinal proliferation, and assess its impact on the severity of methotrexate-induced gastrointestinal mucositis using a validated preclinical rat model. Methods: Age- and weight-matched male Wistar rats were treated with a sublethal dose of 45 mg/kg methotrexate with or without pre-therapy fasting. The impact of acute fasting on epithelial proliferation, body composition and the microbiota was assessed using plasma citrulline, Ki67 immunohistochemistry, miniSpec and 16S rRNA sequencing. The severity of gastrointestinal mucositis was evaluated using plasma citrulline and body weight. Results: Whilst pre-therapy fasting slowed epithelial proliferation and increased microbial diversity and richness, it also induced significant weight loss and was unable to attenuate the severity of mucositis in both age- and weight-matched groups. In contrast to Tang et al., we saw no expansion of Lactobacillus following acute fasting. Conclusions: Our findings suggest that the beneficial effects of acute fasting are masked by the detrimental effects on body weight and composition and lacking influence on Lactobacillus. Future studies should consider alternative fasting schedules or aim to induce comparable microbial and mucosal manipulation without compromising body composition using clinically feasible methods of dietary or microbial intervention.

摘要: 背景：Tang等人的最新发现。（2020年）显示饮食限制（30％，2周）可通过调节微生物群（特别是乳杆菌的膨胀）来防止甲氨蝶呤致死。虽然从根本上具有洞察力，但扩大此时间表是临床吸收的主要障碍。在这里，我们评估禁食前48小时对微生物群组成，身体组成和肠道增殖的安全且临床上可实现的时间表，并使用经过验证的临床前大鼠模型评估其对甲氨蝶呤诱发的胃肠道粘膜炎严重程度的影响。方法：年龄和体重相匹配的雄性Wistar大鼠以亚致死剂量45mg/kg甲氨蝶呤治疗，禁食或不禁食。使用血浆瓜氨酸，Ki67免疫组织化学，miniSpec和16SrRNA测序评估了急性禁食对上皮增殖，身体成分和微生物群的影响。使用血浆瓜氨酸和体重评估胃肠道粘膜炎的严重程度。结果：尽管禁食可以减缓上皮细胞的增殖，增加微生物的多样性和丰富性，但它也引起体重的明显减轻，并且不能减轻年龄和体重匹配组的粘膜炎的严重性。与Tang等人相反，我们发现急性禁食后乳酸杆菌没有扩增。结论：我们的发现表明，急性禁食的有益作用被体重和组成的不利影响所掩盖，而对乳杆菌缺乏影响。未来的研究应考虑替代性的禁食时间表，或旨在通过临床上可行的饮食或微生物干预方法，在不损害人体成分的前提下诱导类似的微生物和粘膜操作。

Pubmed_ID: 32843654

Metabolic cross-feeding in imbalanced diets allows gut microbes to improve reproduction and alter host behaviour

不均衡饮食中的新陈代谢交叉喂养可使肠道微生物改善繁殖并改变宿主行为

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18049-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32843654/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/25/2020

Abstract: The impact of commensal bacteria on the host arises from complex microbial-diet-host interactions. Mapping metabolic interactions in gut microbial communities is therefore key to understand how the microbiome influences the host. Here we use an interdisciplinary approach including isotope-resolved metabolomics to show that in Drosophila melanogaster, Acetobacter pomorum (Ap) and Lactobacillus plantarum (Lp) a syntrophic relationship is established to overcome detrimental host diets and identify Ap as the bacterium altering the host's feeding decisions. Specifically, we show that Ap uses the lactate produced by Lp to supply amino acids that are essential to Lp, allowing it to grow in imbalanced diets. Lactate is also necessary and sufficient for Ap to alter the fly's protein appetite. Our data show that gut bacterial communities use metabolic interactions to become resilient to detrimental host diets. These interactions also ensure the constant flow of metabolites used by the microbiome to alter reproduction and host behaviour.

摘要: 共生细菌对宿主的影响来自复杂的微生物-饮食-宿主相互作用。因此，了解肠道微生物群落中的代谢相互作用是了解微生物组如何影响宿主的关键。在这里，我们使用一种跨学科的方法，包括通过同位素解析的代谢组学，来表明在果蝇、,醋杆菌（Ap）和植物乳杆菌（Lp）中建立了营养关系，以克服有害的宿主饮食，并将Ap识别为改变宿主喂养决策的细菌。具体而言，我们表明Ap可以利用Lp产生的乳酸来提供Lp必需的氨基酸，从而使其在不均衡的饮食中生长。乳酸对于Ap改变果蝇的蛋白质食欲也是必要和充分的。我们的数据表明，肠道细菌群落利用代谢相互作用来抵抗有害的宿主饮食。这些相互作用还确保了微生物组用来改变繁殖和宿主行为的代谢产物的恒定流动。

Pubmed_ID: 32843557

Cervicovaginal Microbiome Composition Is Associated with Metabolic Profiles in Healthy Pregnancy

宫颈阴道微生物组成分与健康妊娠中的代谢特征相关。

DOI: 10.1128/mBio.01851-20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32843557/

Journal: mBio {'ISSN': '2150-7511', 'Name': 'mbio', '2015': '6.975', '2016': '6.956', '2017': '6.689', '2018': '6.747', '2019': '6.784'}

Date: 08/25/2020

Abstract: Microbes and their metabolic products influence early-life immune and microbiome development, yet remain understudied during pregnancy. Vaginal microbial communities are typically dominated by one or a few well-adapted microbes which are able to survive in a narrow pH range and are adapted to live on host-derived carbon sources, likely sourced from glycogen and mucin present in the vaginal environment. We characterized the cervicovaginal microbiomes of 16 healthy women throughout the three trimesters of pregnancy. Additionally, we analyzed saliva and urine metabolomes using gas chromatography-time of flight mass spectrometry (GC-TOF MS) and liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry (LC-MS/MS) lipidomics approaches for samples from mothers and their infants through the first year of life. Amplicon sequencing revealed most women had either a simple community with one highly abundant species of Lactobacillus or a more diverse community characterized by a high abundance of Gardnerella, as has also been previously described in several independent cohorts. Integrating GC-TOF MS and lipidomics data with amplicon sequencing, we found metabolites that distinctly associate with particular communities. For example, cervicovaginal microbial communities dominated by Lactobacillus crispatus have high mannitol levels, which is unexpected given the characterization of L. crispatus as a homofermentative Lactobacillus species. It may be that fluctuations in which Lactobacillus dominate a particular vaginal microbiome are dictated by the availability of host sugars, such as fructose, which is the most likely substrate being converted to mannitol. Overall, using a multi-"omic" approach, we begin to address the genetic and molecular means by which a particular vaginal microbiome becomes vulnerable to large changes in composition.IMPORTANCE Humans have a unique vaginal microbiome compared to other mammals, characterized by low diversity and often dominated by Lactobacillus spp. Dramatic shifts in vaginal microbial communities sometimes contribute to the presence of a polymicrobial overgrowth condition called bacterial vaginosis (BV). However, many healthy women lacking BV symptoms have vaginal microbiomes dominated by microbes associated with BV, resulting in debate about the definition of a healthy vaginal microbiome. Despite substantial evidence that the reproductive health of a woman depends on the vaginal microbiota, future therapies that may improve reproductive health outcomes are stalled due to limited understanding surrounding the ecology of the vaginal microbiome. Here, we use sequencing and metabolomic techniques to show novel associations between vaginal microbes and metabolites during healthy pregnancy. We speculate these associations underlie microbiome dynamics and may contribute to a better understanding of transitions between alternative vaginal microbiome compositions.

摘要: 微生物及其代谢产物会影响生命早期的免疫和微生物组发育，但在怀孕期间仍需研究不足。阴道微生物群落通常以一种或几种适应性很强的微生物为主导，这些微生物能够在狭窄的pH范围内生存，并适合生活在宿主衍生的碳源上，这些碳源可能来自阴道环境中存在的糖原和粘蛋白。在整个妊娠的三个月中，我们对16名健康女性的宫颈阴道微生物群进行了表征。此外，我们使用气相色谱-飞行时间质谱（GC-TOFMS）和液相色谱-串联质谱（LC-MS/MS）脂质组学方法分析了唾液和尿中代谢组的第一年母亲和婴儿的样品生活。扩增子测序表明，大多数女性要么拥有一个简单的群落，即具有一种高度丰富的乳杆菌物种，要么拥有一个以高含量的加德纳氏菌为特征的更加多样化的群落，如先前在多个独立研究中所描述的。将GC-TOFMS和脂质组学数据与扩增子测序整合在一起，我们发现了与特定群落明显相关的代谢产物。例如，以曲霉乳杆菌为主导的宫颈阴道微生物群落具有较高的甘露醇水平，鉴于曲霉乳杆菌是同型发酵乳杆菌种的特征，这是出乎意料的。乳酸菌在特定的阴道微生物组中占主导地位的波动可能是由宿主糖（例如果糖）的可用性所决定的，果糖是最有可能转化为甘露醇的底物。总体而言，我们采用多组学方法，着手研究遗传和分子手段，特定的阴道微生物组易受组成变化的影响。重要提示与其他哺乳动物相比，人类具有独特的阴道微生物组，其特点是多样性低并且通常以乳酸杆菌属为主。阴道微生物群落的剧烈变化有时会导致称为细菌性阴道病（BV）的细菌过度繁殖。但是，许多缺乏BV症状的健康女性的阴道微生物群以与BV相关的微生物为主，这引发了关于健康阴道微生物组定义的争论。尽管有大量证据表明妇女的生殖健康取决于阴道微生物群，但由于对阴道微生物组生态学的了解有限，因此可能改善生殖健康结果的未来疗法被搁置了。在这里，我们使用测序和代谢组学技术来显示健康怀孕期间阴道微生物与代谢产物之间的新型关联。我们推测这些关联是微生物组动力学的基础，可能有助于更好地了解替代性阴道微生物组之间的过渡。

Pubmed_ID: 32843548

Cooperation, Competition, and Specialized Metabolism in a Simplified Root Nodule Microbiome

简化的根瘤微生物组中的合作，竞争和专门代谢

DOI: 10.1128/mBio.01917-20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32843548/

Journal: mBio {'ISSN': '2150-7511', 'Name': 'mbio', '2015': '6.975', '2016': '6.956', '2017': '6.689', '2018': '6.747', '2019': '6.784'}

Date: 08/25/2020

Abstract: Microbiomes associated with various plant structures often contain members with the potential to make specialized metabolites, e.g., molecules with antibacterial, antifungal, or siderophore activities. However, when and where microbes associated with plants produce specialized metabolites, and the potential role of these molecules in mediating intramicrobiome interactions, is not well understood. Root nodules of legume plants are organs devoted to hosting symbiotic bacteria that fix atmospheric nitrogen and have recently been shown to harbor a relatively simple accessory microbiome containing members with the ability to produce specialized metabolites in vitro On the basis of these observations, we sought to develop a model nodule microbiome system for evaluating specialized microbial metabolism in planta Starting with an inoculum derived from field-grown Medicago sativa nodules, serial passaging through gnotobiotic nodules yielded a simplified accessory community composed of four members: Brevibacillus brevis , Paenibacillus sp., Pantoea agglomerans, and Pseudomonas sp. Some members of this community exhibited clear cooperation in planta, while others were antagonistic and capable of disrupting cooperation between other partners. Using matrix-assisted laser desorption ionization-imaging mass spectrometry, we found that metabolites associated with individual taxa had unique distributions, indicating that some members of the nodule community were spatially segregated. Finally, we identified two families of molecules produced by B. brevis in planta as the antibacterial tyrocidines and a novel set of gramicidin-type molecules, which we term the britacidins. Collectively, these results indicate that in addition to nitrogen fixation, legume root nodules are likely also sites of active antimicrobial production.

摘要: 与各种植物结构相关的微生物群通常包含具有产生专门代谢产物的能力的成员，例如具有抗菌，抗真菌或铁载体活性的分子。然而，与植物相关的微生物何时何地产生专门的代谢产物，以及这些分子在介导微生物组内相互作用中的潜在作用尚不清楚。豆科植物的根瘤是专门用来寄养固定大气氮的共生细菌的器官，最近被证明具有相对简单的辅助微生物组，该微生物组含有能够在体外产生专门代谢产物的成员。基于这些发现，我们寻求开发用于评估植物体内特定微生物代谢的模型节结微生物组系统，从源自田间种植的苜蓿苜蓿结节的接种物开始，连续经过gnotobiotic结节进行传代，产生了一个简化的辅助群落，该群落由四个成员组成：短短杆菌，短芽孢杆菌，团聚体，和假单胞菌。该社区的一些成员在植物群落中表现出明显的合作，而其他成员则具有敌对性，并能够破坏其他伙伴之间的合作。使用基质辅助激光解吸电离成像质谱技术，我们发现与单个分类单元相关的代谢产物具有独特的分布，表明结节群落的某些成员在空间上是隔离的。最后，我们确定了由短双歧杆菌在植物中产生的两个分子家族，即抗菌酪氨酸和一套新的短杆菌肽型分子，我们称之为britacidins。总的来说，这些结果表明，除了固氮以外，豆科植物根瘤也可能是活性抗菌素产生的场所。

Pubmed_ID: 32843357

Angiogenin maintains gut microbe homeostasis by balancing α-Proteobacteria and Lachnospiraceae

血管生成素可通过平衡α-变形杆菌和链霉菌来维持肠道微生物稳态

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-320135

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32843357/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 08/25/2020

Abstract: Objective: Antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) play essential roles in maintaining gut health and are associated with IBD. This study is to elucidate the effect of angiogenin (ANG), an intestine-secreted AMP, on gut microbiota and its relevance with IBD. Design: The effect of ANG on microbiota and its contribution to colitis were evaluated in different colitis models with co-housing and faecal microbiota transplantation. ANG-regulated bacteria were determined by 16S rDNA sequencing and their functions in colitis were analysed by bacterial colonisation. The species-specific antimicrobial activity of ANG and its underlying mechanism were further investigated with microbiological and biochemical methods. ANG level and the key bacteria were characterised in IBD faecal samples. Results: ANG regulated microbiota composition and inhibited intestinal inflammation. Specifically, Ang1 deficiency in mice led to a decrease in the protective gut commensal strains of Lachnospiraceae but an increase in the colitogenic strains of α-Proteobacteria. Direct binding of ANG to α-Proteobacteria resulted in lethal disruption of bacterial membrane integrity, and consequently promoted the growth of Lachnospiraceae, which otherwise was antagonised by α-Proteobacteria. Oral administration of ANG1 reversed the dysbiosis and attenuated the severity of colitis in Ang1-deficient mice. The correlation among ANG, the identified bacteria and IBD status was established in patients. Conclusion: These findings demonstrate a novel role of ANG in shaping gut microbe composition and thus maintaining gut health, suggesting that the ANG-microbiota axis could be developed as a potential preventive and/or therapeutic approach for dysbiosis-related gut diseases.

摘要: 目的：抗菌肽（AMPs）在维持肠道健康中起重要作用，并与IBD相关。这项研究旨在阐明血管生成素（ANG）（一种肠道分泌的AMP）对肠道菌群的影响及其与IBD的相关性。设计：在不同的结肠炎模型中，通过共置和粪便微生物群移植，评估了ANG对微生物群的影响及其对结肠炎的贡献。通过16SrDNA测序确定ANG调节细菌，并通过细菌定植分析其在结肠炎中的功能。用微生物学和生化方法进一步研究了ANG的物种特异性抗菌活性及其潜在机理。在IBD粪便样品中表征了ANG水平和关键细菌。结果：ANG调节微生物群组成并抑制肠道炎症。具体而言，小鼠中的Ang1缺乏症导致鼠尾草科的肠道保护性共生菌株减少，而α-变形杆菌的致生菌菌株增加。ANG与α-Proteobacteria的直接结合导致细菌膜完整性的致死性破坏，因此促进了Lachnospiraceae的生长，否则其被α-Proteobacteria所拮抗。口服ANG1可逆转Ang1缺乏小鼠的营养不良，减轻结肠炎的严重程度。在患者中建立了ANG，已鉴定细菌和IBD状态之间的相关性。结论：这些发现证明了ANG在塑造肠道微生物组成，从而维持肠道健康方面的新作用，表明ANG-菌群轴可被开发为与营养不良相关的肠道疾病的潜在预防和/或治疗方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32841606

The Gut Virome Database Reveals Age-Dependent Patterns of Virome Diversity in the Human Gut

肠道病毒数据库显示了人类肠道中病毒多样性的年龄依赖性模式

DOI: 10.1016/j.chom.2020.08.003

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32841606/

Journal: Cell host & microbe {'ISSN': '1931-3128', 'Name': 'cell host & microbe', '2015': '12.552', '2016': '14.946', '2017': '17.872', '2018': '15.753', '2019': '15.923'}

Date: 08/24/2020

Abstract: The gut microbiome profoundly affects human health and disease, and their infecting viruses are likely as important, but often missed because of reference database limitations. Here, we (1) built a human Gut Virome Database (GVD) from 2,697 viral particle or microbial metagenomes from 1,986 individuals representing 16 countries, (2) assess its effectiveness, and (3) report a meta-analysis that reveals age-dependent patterns across healthy Westerners. The GVD contains 33,242 unique viral populations (approximately species-level taxa) and improves average viral detection rates over viral RefSeq and IMG/VR nearly 182-fold and 2.6-fold, respectively. GVD meta-analyses show highly personalized viromes, reveal that inter-study variability from technical artifacts is larger than any "disease" effect at the population level, and document how viral diversity changes from human infancy into senescence. Together, this compact foundational resource, these standardization guidelines, and these meta-analysis findings provide a systematic toolkit to help maximize our understanding of viral roles in health and disease.

摘要: 肠道微生物组对人类健康和疾病产生深远影响，其感染病毒可能同样重要，但由于参考数据库的局限性而常常被遗漏。在这里，我们（1）从代表16个国家的1,986个人的2697个病毒颗粒或微生物元基因组建立了人类肠道病毒数据库（GVD），（2）评估了其有效性，（3）报告了揭示年龄依赖性的荟萃分析健康的西方人的生活方式。GVD包含33,242个独特的病毒种群（大约是物种水平的分类单元），与RefSeq和IMG/VR相比，平均病毒检测率分别提高了182倍和2.6倍。GVD荟萃分析显示高度个性化的病毒血症，揭示了技术人工制品的研究间变异性大于人群水平上的任何“疾病”效应，并记录了病毒多样性如何从人类婴儿期发展到衰老。这些紧凑的基础资源，这些标准化指南以及这些荟萃分析结果共同提供了系统的工具包，可帮助我们最大限度地了解病毒在健康和疾病中的作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32839304

Alterations of the gut ecological and functional microenvironment in different stages of multiple sclerosis

多发性硬化症不同阶段肠道生态和功能微环境的改变

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2011703117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32839304/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 08/24/2020

Abstract: Multiple sclerosis (MS), an autoimmune disease of the central nervous system, generally starts as the relapsing remitting form (RRMS), but often shifts into secondary progressive MS (SPMS). SPMS represents a more advanced stage of MS, characterized by accumulating disabilities and refractoriness to medications. The aim of this study was to clarify the microbial and functional differences in gut microbiomes of the different stages of MS. Here, we compared gut microbiomes of patients with RRMS, SPMS, and two closely related disorders with healthy controls (HCs) by 16S rRNA gene and whole metagenomic sequencing data from fecal samples and by fecal metabolites. Each patient group had a number of species having significant changes in abundance in comparison with HCs, including short-chain fatty acid (SCFA)-producing bacteria reduced in MS. Changes in some species had close association with clinical severity of the patients. A marked reduction in butyrate and propionate biosynthesis and corresponding metabolic changes were confirmed in RRMS compared with HCs. Although bacterial composition analysis showed limited differences between the patient groups, metagenomic functional data disclosed an increase in microbial genes involved in DNA mismatch repair in SPMS as compared to RRMS. Together with an increased ratio of cysteine persulfide to cysteine in SPMS revealed by sulfur metabolomics, we postulate that excessive DNA oxidation could take place in the gut of SPMS. Thus, gut ecological and functional microenvironments were significantly altered in the different stages of MS. In particular, reduced SCFA biosynthesis in RRMS and elevated oxidative level in SPMS were characteristic.

摘要: 多发性硬化症（MS）是中枢神经系统的一种自身免疫性疾病，通常以复发缓解形式（RRMS）开始，但通常会转变为继发性进行性MS（SPMS）。SPMS代表了MS的更高级阶段，其特征是累积的残疾和药物的难治性。这项研究的目的是澄清不同阶段MS肠道微生物区系的微生物和功能差异。在这里，我们通过16SrRNA基因以及粪便样品和粪便代谢产物的全宏基因组测序数据，比较了RRMS，SPMS和两个与健康对照（HCs）有密切关系的疾病的患者肠道菌群。每个患者组都有许多与HCs相比丰度有明显变化的物种，包括MS中减少的产生短链脂肪酸（SCFA）的细菌。一些物种的变化与患者的临床严重程度密切相关。与HCs相比，在RRMS中证实了丁酸和丙酸生物合成的显着减少以及相应的代谢变化。尽管细菌成分分析显示患者组之间的差异有限，但宏基因组学功能数据显示与RRMS相比，SPMS中DNA错配修复涉及的微生物基因增加。加上硫代谢组学揭示了SPMS中半胱氨酸与半胱氨酸的比率增加，我们推测SPMS的肠道中可能发生过度的DNA氧化。因此，肠道的生态和功能微环境在MS的不同阶段发生了显着变化。特别是，RRMS中SCFA生物合成减少和SPMS中氧化水平升高是特征。

Pubmed_ID: 32839200

Metagenomics analysis of gut microbiota in response to diet intervention and gestational diabetes in overweight and obese women: a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial

超重和肥胖女性对饮食干预和妊娠糖尿病的肠道菌群的元基因组学分析：一项随机，双盲，安慰剂对照的临床试验

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2020-321643

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32839200/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 08/24/2020

Abstract: Objective: Gut microbiota and diet are known to contribute to human metabolism. We investigated whether the metagenomic gut microbiota composition and function changes over pregnancy are related to gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) and can be modified by dietary supplements, fish oil and/or probiotics. Design: The gut microbiota of 270 overweight/obese women participating in a mother-infant clinical study were analysed with metagenomics approach in early (mean gestational weeks 13.9) and late (gestational weeks 35.2) pregnancy. GDM was diagnosed with a 2 hour 75 g oral glucose tolerance test. Results: Unlike women with GDM, women without GDM manifested changes in relative abundance of bacterial species over the pregnancy, particularly those receiving the fish oil + probiotics combination. The specific bacterial species or function did not predict the onset of GDM nor did it differ according to GDM status, except for the higher abundance of Ruminococcus obeum in late pregnancy in the combination group in women with GDM compared with women without GDM. In the combination group, weak decreases over the pregnancy were observed in basic bacterial housekeeping functions. Conclusions: The specific gut microbiota species do not contribute to GDM in overweight/obese women. Nevertheless, the GDM status may disturb maternal gut microbiota flexibility and thus limit the capacity of women with GDM to respond to diet, as evidenced by alterations in gut microbiota observed only in women without GDM. These findings may be important when considering the metabolic complications during pregnancy, but further studies with larger populations are called for to verify the findings.

摘要: 目的：肠道菌群和饮食有助于人类新陈代谢。我们调查了妊娠期宏基因组肠道微生物群的组成和功能变化是否与妊娠糖尿病（GDM）有关，并且可以通过膳食补充剂，鱼油和/或益生菌进行修饰。设计：在早期（平均孕周13.9）和晚期（孕周35.2）妊娠中，采用宏基因组学方法分析了参加母婴临床研究的270名超重/肥胖妇女的肠道菌群。通过2小时75克口服葡萄糖耐量测试诊断为GDM。结果：与患有GDM的女性不同，没有GDM的女性在怀孕期间细菌种类的相对丰度发生了变化，尤其是那些接受鱼油和益生菌组合的女性。特定细菌的种类或功能不能预测GDM的发作，也不能根据GDM的状态而有所不同，除了合并组中GDM女性的妊娠后期obeminocoumcusobeum的丰度比没有GDM的女性更高。在组合组中，观察到基本细菌看家功能在整个怀孕期间的微弱下降。结论：超重/肥胖妇女中特定的肠道菌群对GDM无贡献。然而，GDM的状态可能会干扰产妇肠道菌群的灵活性，从而限制GDM妇女对饮食做出反应的能力，这仅在没有GDM的妇女中观察到肠道菌群的改变即可证明。在考虑怀孕期间的代谢并发症时，这些发现可能很重要，但是需要对更大的人群进行进一步的研究以验证发现。

Pubmed_ID: 32835617

The effects of dairy and dairy derivatives on the gut microbiota: a systematic literature review

乳制品和乳制品衍生物对肠道菌群的影响：系统文献综述

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1799533

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32835617/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/09/2020

Abstract: The effects of dairy and dairy-derived products on the human gut microbiota remains understudied. A systematic literature search was conducted using Medline, CINAHL, Embase, Scopus, and PubMed databases with the aim of collating evidence on the intakes of all types of dairy and their effects on the gut microbiota in adults. Risk of bias was assessed using the Cochrane risk-of-bias tool.The search resulted in 6,592 studies, of which eight randomized controlled trials (RCTs) met pre-determined eligibility criteria for inclusion, consisting of a total of 468 participants. Seven studies assessed the effect of type of dairy (milk, yogurt, and kefir) and dairy derivatives (whey and casein) on the gut microbiota, and one study assessed the effect of the quantity of dairy (high dairy vs low dairy). Three studies showed that dairy types consumed (milk, yogurt, and kefir) increased the abundance of beneficial genera Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium. One study showed that yogurt reduced the abundance of Bacteroides fragilis, a pathogenic strain. Whey and casein isolates and the quantity of dairy consumed did not prompt changes to the gut microbiota composition. All but one study reported no changes to bacterial diversity in response to dairy interventions and one study reported reduction in bacterial diversity in response to milk intake.In conclusion, the results of this review suggest that dairy products such as milk, yogurt, and kefir may modulate the gut microbiota composition in favor to the host. However, the broader health implications of these findings remain unclear and warrant further studies.

摘要: 乳制品和乳制品衍生产品对人类肠道菌群的影响尚待研究。使用Medline，CINAHL，Embase，Scopus和PubMed数据库进行了系统的文献检索，目​​的是收集各种类型乳制品的摄入量及其对成年人肠道菌群的影响的证据。使用Cochrane偏倚风险工具评估了偏倚风险。该搜索结果进行了6,592项研究，其中八项随机对照试验（RCT）符合预定的纳入标准，总共468名参与者。七项研究评估了乳制品类型（牛奶，酸奶和开菲尔）和乳制品衍生物（乳清蛋白和酪蛋白）对肠道菌群的影响，一项研究评估了乳制品数量的影响（高乳制品与低乳制品）。三项研究表明，食用的乳制品类型（牛奶，酸奶和开菲尔）增加了有益的乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌属的数量。一项研究表明，酸奶可以减少致病菌株脆弱拟杆菌（Bacteroidesfragilis）的含量。乳清和酪蛋白分离物以及食用的乳制品数量并未提示肠道微生物群组成发生变化。除一项研究外，所有研究均未报告对乳制品干预措施引起的细菌多样性变化，而另一项研究报告对摄入乳汁引起的细菌多样性降低。总而言之，本评价的结果表明，乳制品如牛奶，酸奶和开菲尔可能调节肠道菌群组成，使其对宿主有利。然而，这些发现对健康的广泛影响尚不清楚，需要进一步研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32835590

Gut microbes from the phylogenetically diverse genus Eubacterium and their various contributions to gut health

系统发育多样的真细菌属的肠道微生物及其对肠道健康的各种贡献

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1802866

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32835590/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/09/2020

Abstract: Over the last two decades our understanding of the gut microbiota and its contribution to health and disease has been transformed. Among a new 'generation' of potentially beneficial microbes to have been recognized are members of the genus Eubacterium, who form a part of the core human gut microbiome. The genus consists of phylogenetically, and quite frequently phenotypically, diverse species, making Eubacterium a taxonomically unique and challenging genus. Several members of the genus produce butyrate, which plays a critical role in energy homeostasis, colonic motility, immunomodulation and suppression of inflammation in the gut. Eubacterium spp. also carry out bile acid and cholesterol transformations in the gut, thereby contributing to their homeostasis. Gut dysbiosis and a consequently modified representation of Eubacterium spp. in the gut, have been linked with various human disease states. This review provides an overview of Eubacterium species from a phylogenetic perspective, describes how they alter with diet and age and summarizes its association with the human gut and various health conditions.

摘要: 在过去的二十年中，我们对肠道菌群及其对健康和疾病的贡献的认识已经转变。公认的新一代潜在有益微生物是真细菌属的成员，它们构成人类核心肠道微生物组的一部分。该属包括系统发育的，并且在表型上经常是多种多样的物种，使真细菌成为分类学上独特且具有挑战性的属。该属的几个成员产生丁酸酯，丁酸酯在能量稳态，结肠运动，免疫调节和肠道炎症抑制中起关键作用。真细菌还会在肠道中进行胆汁酸和胆固醇的转化，从而促进其体内稳态。肠道营养不良，并因此修饰了真细菌属。在肠道中，已经与各种人类疾病状态相关联。这篇综述从系统发育的角度概述了真细菌，描述了它们如何随着饮食和年龄而变化，并总结了其与人类肠道和各种健康状况的关系。

Pubmed_ID: 32828122

Protoblock - A biological standard for formalin fixed samples

Protoblock-福尔马林固定样品的生物学标准

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00901-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32828122/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 08/22/2020

Abstract: Background: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue is the gold standard in pathology tissue storage, representing the largest collections of patient material. Their reliable use for DNA analyses could open a trove of potential samples for research and are currently being recognised as a viable source material for bacterial analysis. There are several key features which limit bacterial-related data generation from this material: (i) DNA damage inherent to the fixing process, (ii) low bacterial biomass that increases the vulnerability to contamination and exacerbates the host DNA effects and (iii) lack of suitable DNA extraction methods, leading to data bias. The development and systematic use of reliable standards is a key priority for microbiome research. More than perhaps any other sample type, FFPE material urgently requires the development of standards to ensure the validity of results and to promote reproducibility. Results: To address these limitations and concerns, we have developed the Protoblock as a biological standard for FFPE tissue-based research and method optimisation. This is a novel system designed to generate bespoke mock FFPE 'blocks' with a cell content that is user-defined and which undergoes the same treatment conditions as clinical FFPE tissues. The 'Protoblock' features a mix of formalin-fixed cells, of known number, embedded in an agar matrix which is solidified to form a defined shape that is paraffin embedded. The contents of various Protoblocks populated with mammalian and bacterial cells were verified by microscopy. The quantity and condition of DNA purified from blocks was evaluated by qPCR, 16S rRNA gene amplicon sequencing and whole genome sequencing. These analyses validated the capability of the Protoblock system to determine the extent to which each of the three stated confounding features impacts on eventual analysis of cellular DNA present in FFPE samples. Conclusion: The Protoblock provides a representation of biological material after FFPE treatment. Use of this standard will greatly assist the stratification of biological variations detected into those legitimately resulting from experimental conditions, and those that are artefacts of the processed nature of the samples, thus enabling users to relate the outputs of laboratory analyses to reality. Video Abstract.

摘要: 背景：福尔马林固定，石蜡包埋（FFPE）组织是病理组织存储的金标准，代表了患者材料的最大收集量。它们在DNA分析中的可靠应用可以为研究提供大量潜在的样品，并且目前被认为是细菌分析的可行原料。有几种关键特征限制了这种材料的细菌相关数据生成：（i）固定过程固有的DNA损伤；（ii）低细菌生物量，增加了对污染的脆弱性并加剧了宿主DNA的作用；（iii）缺乏合适的DNA提取方法，导致数据偏倚。可靠标准的开发和系统使用是微生物组研究的关键优先事项。FFPE材料比任何其他样品类型都要多，因此迫切需要制定标准以确保结果的有效性并促进可重复性。结果：为了解决这些局限性和担忧，我们开发了Protoblock作为FFPE组织研究和方法优化的生物学标准。这是一个新颖的系统，旨在生成定制的模拟FFPE“块”，其中的细胞含量是用户定义的，并且经受与临床FFPE组织相同的治疗条件。“Protoblock”的特征是将已知数量的福尔马林固定细胞混合在一起，将其嵌入琼脂基质中，然后固化形成石蜡包埋的确定形状。通过显微镜验证了充满哺乳动物和细菌细胞的各种Protoblocks的含量。通过qPCR，16SrRNA基因扩增子测序和全基因组测序评估从区块纯化的DNA的数量和条件。这些分析验证了Protoblock系统确定三种陈述的混杂特征各自对FFPE样品中存在的细胞DNA的最终分析的影响程度的能力。结论：Protoblock提供了FFPE处理后生物材料的代表。使用该标准将极大地帮助将检测到的生物学变异分层为那些由于实验条件而合法产生的变异，以及那些属于样品加工性质的伪像，从而使用户能够将实验室分析的输出与现实联系起来。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32825849

Antimicrobial drug use in the first decade of life influences saliva microbiota diversity and composition

生命的前十年使用抗菌药物会影响唾液微生物群的多样性和组成

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00893-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32825849/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 08/21/2020

Abstract: Background: The human microbiota contributes to health and well-being. Antimicrobials (AM) have an immediate effect on microbial diversity and composition in the gut, but next to nothing is known about their long-term contribution to saliva microbiota. Our objectives were to investigate the long-term impact of AM use on saliva microbiota diversity and composition in preadolescents. We compared the lifetime effects by gender and AMs. We used data from 808 randomly selected children in the Finnish Health In Teens (Fin-HIT) cohort with register-based data on AM purchases from the Social Insurance Institution of Finland. Saliva microbiota was assessed with 16S rRNA (V3-V4) sequencing. The sequences were aligned to the SILVA ribosomal RNA database and classified and counted using the mothur pipeline. Associations between AM use and alpha-diversity (Shannon index) were identified with linear regression, while associations between beta-diversity (Bray-Curtis dissimilarity) and low, medium or high AM use were identified with PERMANOVA. Results: Of the children, 53.6% were girls and their mean age was 11.7 (0.4) years. On average, the children had 7.4 (ranging from 0 to 41) AM prescriptions during their lifespan. The four most commonly used AMs were amoxicillin (n = 2622, 43.7%), azithromycin (n = 1495, 24.9%), amoxicillin-clavulanate (n = 1123, 18.7%) and phenoxymethylpenicillin (n = 408, 6.8%). A linear inverse association was observed between the use of azithromycin and Shannon index (b - 0.015, p value = 0.002) in all children, the effect was driven by girls (b - 0.032, p value = 0.001), while not present in boys. Dissimilarities were marked between high, medium and low users of all AMs combined, in azithromycin users specifically, and in boys with amoxicillin use. Amoxicillin and amoxicillin-clavulanate use was associated with the largest decrease in abundance of Rikenellaceae. AM use in general and phenoxymethylpenicillin specifically were associated with a decrease of Paludibacter and pathways related to amino acid degradations differed in proportion between high and low AM users. Conclusions: A systematic approach utilising reliable registry data on lifetime use of AMs demonstrated long-term effects on saliva microbiota diversity and composition. These effects are gender- and AM-dependent. We found that frequent lifelong use of AMs shifts bacterial profiles years later, which might have unforeseen health impacts in the future. Our findings emphasise a concern for high azithromycin use, which substantially decreases bacterial diversity and affects composition as well. Further studies are needed to determine the clinical implications of our findings. Video Abstract.

摘要: 背景：人类微生物群有助于健康和福祉。抗菌素（AM）对肠道中的微生物多样性和组成具有立竿见影的作用，但几乎不了解其对唾液微生物群的长期贡献。我们的目标是调查AM的使用对青春期前唾液微生物群多样性和组成的长期影响。我们比较了性别和AMs对生命的影响。我们使用了来自芬兰青少年健康（Fin-HIT）队列中808名随机选择的儿童的数据，以及从芬兰社会保险机构购买的AM购买的基于登记的数据。用16SrRNA（V3-V4）测序评估唾液微生物群。将该序列与SILVA核糖体RNA数据库进行比对，并使用mothur管线对它们进行分类和计数。通过线性回归确定了AM使用与alpha多样性（Shannon指数）之间的关联，而使用PERMANOVA则确定了β多样性（Bray-Curtis相似性）与AM的低，中或高之间的关联。结果：在儿童中，女孩占53.6％，平均年龄为11.7（0.4）岁。平均而言，孩子们一生中有7.4次AM处方（从0到41）。四种最常用的AM是阿莫西林（n=2622，43.7％），阿奇霉素（n=1495，24.9％），阿莫西林-克拉维酸盐（n=1123，18.7％）和苯氧甲基青霉素（n=408，6.8％）。在所有儿童中，观察到阿奇霉素和香农指数的使用之间呈线性负相关（b-0.015，p值=0.002），这种影响是由女孩驱动的（b-0.032，p值=0.001），而男孩中不存在。在所有AM合并使用的高，中，低使用者之间，特别是在阿奇霉素使用者和使用阿莫西林的男孩之间，存在明显差异。阿莫西林和阿莫西林-克拉维酸盐的使用与里克菌科的丰度下降最大有关。一般而言，AM的使用以及苯氧基甲基青霉素的使用都与肺炎双歧杆菌的减少有关，并且与氨基酸降解相关的途径在高和低AM使用者之间的比例不同。结论：一种系统的方法，利用可靠的注册表数据来了解AM的终生使用情况，表明对唾液微生物群的多样性和组成具有长期影响。这些影响取决于性别和AM。我们发现，频繁终身使用AM会在数年后改变细菌谱，这可能会对未来的健康产生不可预料的影响。我们的发现强调了对阿奇霉素的大量使用的担忧，这会大大降低细菌的多样性并影响其组成。需要进一步研究以确定我们发现的临床意义。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32822584

Multi-omic Analysis of the Interaction between Clostridioides difficile Infection and Pediatric Inflammatory Bowel Disease

艰难梭菌感染与小儿炎症性肠病相互作用的多组学分析

DOI: 10.1016/j.chom.2020.07.020

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32822584/

Journal: Cell host & microbe {'ISSN': '1931-3128', 'Name': 'cell host & microbe', '2015': '12.552', '2016': '14.946', '2017': '17.872', '2018': '15.753', '2019': '15.923'}

Date: 08/11/2020

Abstract: Children with inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD) are particularly vulnerable to infection with Clostridioides difficile (CDI). IBD and IBD + CDI have overlapping symptoms but respond to distinctive treatments, highlighting the need for diagnostic biomarkers. Here, we studied pediatric patients with IBD and IBD + CDI, comparing longitudinal data on the gut microbiome, metabolome, and other measures. The microbiome is dysbiotic and heterogeneous in both disease states, but the metabolome reveals disease-specific patterns. The IBD group shows increased concentrations of markers of inflammation and tissue damage compared with healthy controls, and metabolic changes associate with susceptibility to CDI. In IBD + CDI, we detect both metabolites associated with inflammation/tissue damage and fermentation products produced by C. difficile. The most discriminating metabolite found is isocaproyltaurine, a covalent conjugate of a distinctive C. difficile fermentation product (isocaproate) and an amino acid associated with tissue damage (taurine), which may be useful as a joint marker of the two disease processes.

摘要: 患有炎症性肠病（IBD）的儿童特别容易感染艰难梭菌（CDI）。IBD和IBD+CDI的症状重叠，但对独特的治疗方法有反应，从而突出了对诊断性生物标志物的需求。在这里，我们研究了患有IBD和IBD+CDI的儿童患者，比较了肠道微生物组，代谢组和其他指标的纵向数据。在这两种疾病状态下，微生物组都是营养不良和异质的，但代谢组揭示了疾病的特定模式。与健康对照组相比，IBD组的炎症和组织损伤标志物浓度增加，并且代谢变化与对CDI的易感性有关。在IBD+CDI中，我们同时检测到与炎症/组织损伤相关的代谢产物和艰难梭菌产生的发酵产物。发现的最有区别的代谢物是异卡丙烯酰基牛磺酸，它是独特的艰难梭菌发酵产物（异己酸）和与组织损伤相关的氨基酸（牛磺酸）的共价结合物，可用作两种疾病过程的联合标志物。

Pubmed_ID: 32819450

Correction to: Microbiome definition re-visited: old concepts and new challenges

更正：重新审视微生物组定义：旧概念和新挑战

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00905-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32819450/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 08/20/2020

Abstract: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via the original article.

摘要: 本文的修订版已经发布，可以通过原始文章访问。

Pubmed_ID: 32819434

The gut microbiota regulates autism-like behavior by mediating vitamin B 6 homeostasis in EphB6-deficient mice

肠道菌群通过介导EphB6缺陷小鼠的维生素B 6稳态来调节自闭症样行为。

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00884-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32819434/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 08/20/2020

Abstract: Background: Autism spectrum disorder (ASD) is a developmental disorder, and the effective pharmacological treatments for the core autistic symptoms are currently limited. Increasing evidence, particularly that from clinical studies on ASD patients, suggests a functional link between the gut microbiota and the development of ASD. However, the mechanisms linking the gut microbiota with brain dysfunctions (gut-brain axis) in ASD have not yet been full elucidated. Due to its genetic mutations and downregulated expression in patients with ASD, EPHB6, which also plays important roles in gut homeostasis, is generally considered a candidate gene for ASD. Nonetheless, the role and mechanism of EPHB6 in regulating the gut microbiota and the development of ASD are unclear. Results: Here, we found that the deletion of EphB6 induced autism-like behavior and disturbed the gut microbiota in mice. More importantly, transplantation of the fecal microbiota from EphB6-deficient mice resulted in autism-like behavior in antibiotic-treated C57BL/6J mice, and transplantation of the fecal microbiota from wild-type mice ameliorated the autism-like behavior in EphB6-deficient mice. At the metabolic level, the disturbed gut microbiota in EphB6-deficient mice led to vitamin B6 and dopamine defects. At the cellular level, the excitation/inhibition (E/I) balance in the medial prefrontal cortex was regulated by gut microbiota-mediated vitamin B6 in EphB6-deficient mice. Conclusions: Our study uncovers a key role for the gut microbiota in the regulation of autism-like social behavior by vitamin B6, dopamine, and the E/I balance in EphB6-deficient mice, and these findings suggest new strategies for understanding and treating ASD. Video abstract.

摘要: 背景：自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）是一种发育障碍，目前对核心自闭症症状的有效药理治疗是有限的。越来越多的证据，特别是对ASD患者进行临床研究的证据表明，肠道菌群与ASD的发展之间存在功能联系。然而，尚不完全阐明将肠道菌群与ASD中脑功能障碍（肠脑轴）联系起来的机制。由于其基因突变和在ASD患者中的表达下调，EPHB6在肠道稳态中也起着重要作用，通常被认为是ASD的候选基因。然而，尚不清楚EPHB6在调节肠道菌群和ASD发生中的作用和机制。结果：在这里，我们发现EphB6的缺失诱导了自闭症样行为并扰乱了小鼠的肠道菌群。更重要的是，从EphB6缺陷小鼠移植粪便菌群会导致抗生素治疗的C57BL/6J小鼠出现自闭症样行为，而从野生型小鼠的粪便微生物菌群移植会缓解EphB6缺陷小鼠的自闭症样行为。。在代谢水平上，EphB6缺陷小鼠的肠道菌群受到干扰导致维生素B6和多巴胺缺陷。在细胞水平上，内侧前额叶皮层中的兴奋/抑制（E/I）平衡是由肠道菌群介导的EphB6缺陷小鼠维生素B6调节的。结论：我们的研究揭示了肠道菌群在EphB6缺陷小鼠中通过维生素B6，多巴胺和E/I平衡调节自闭症样社会行为的关键作用，这些发现为理解和治疗ASD提供了新的策略。。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32817517

Indoles from the commensal microbiota act via the AHR and IL-10 to tune the cellular composition of the colonic epithelium during aging

来自共生菌群的吲哚通过AHR和IL-10发挥作用，在衰老过程中调节结肠上皮的细胞组成

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2003004117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32817517/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 09/01/2020
