Pubmed_ID: 32526178

Nourishing the Microbiota to Promote Mucosal Immunity

滋养微生物以促进粘膜免疫

DOI: 10.1016/j.chom.2020.05.016

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32526178/

Journal: Cell host & microbe {'ISSN': '1931-3128', 'Name': 'cell host & microbe', '2015': '12.552', '2016': '14.946', '2017': '17.872', '2018': '15.753', '2019': '15.923'}

Date: 06/10/2020

Abstract: Childhood undernutrition is associated with dysbiosis and dampened vaccine responses. Understanding how nutrients influence the microbiota and immunity is critical for vaccine efficacy. In this issue of Cell Host & Microbe, Di Luccia et al. and Huus et al. reveal that nutrition affects IgA responses to the microbiota and oral vaccines.

摘要: 儿童营养不良与营养不良和疫苗反应减弱有关。了解营养素如何影响微生物群和免疫力对于疫苗效力至关重要。在本期《细胞宿主与微生物》中，DiLuccia等人。和Huus等。表明营养会影响IgA对微生物群和口服疫苗的反应。

Pubmed_ID: 32522285

Topography of the respiratory tract bacterial microbiota in cattle

牛呼吸道细菌菌群的地形

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00869-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32522285/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/10/2020

Abstract: Background: Bacterial bronchopneumonia (BP) is the leading cause of morbidity and mortality in cattle. The nasopharynx is generally accepted as the primary source of pathogenic bacteria that cause BP. However, it has recently been shown in humans that the oropharynx may act as the primary reservoir for pathogens that reach the lung. The objective was therefore to describe the bacterial microbiota present along the entire cattle respiratory tract to determine which upper respiratory tract (URT) niches may contribute the most to the composition of the lung microbiota. Methods: Seventeen upper and lower respiratory tract locations were sampled from 15 healthy feedlot steer calves. Samples were collected using a combination of swabs, protected specimen brushes, and saline washes. DNA was extracted from each sample and the 16S rRNA gene (V3-V4) was sequenced. Community composition, alpha-diversity, and beta-diversity were compared among sampling locations. Results: Microbiota composition differed across sampling locations, with physiologically and anatomically distinct locations showing different relative abundances of 1137 observed sequence variants (SVs). An analysis of similarities showed that the lung was more similar to the nasopharynx (R-statistic = 0.091) than it was to the oropharynx (R-statistic = 0.709) or any other URT sampling location. Five distinct metacommunities were identified across all samples after clustering at the genus level using Dirichlet multinomial mixtures. This included a metacommunity found primarily in the lung and nasopharynx that was dominated by Mycoplasma. Further clustering at the SV level showed a shared metacommunity between the lung and nasopharynx that was dominated by Mycoplasma dispar. Other metacommunities found in the nostrils, tonsils, and oral microbiotas were dominated by Moraxella, Fusobacterium, and Streptococcus, respectively. Conclusions: The nasopharyngeal bacterial microbiota is most similar to the lung bacterial microbiota in healthy cattle and therefore may serve as the primary source of bacteria to the lung. This finding indicates that the nasopharynx is likely the most important location that should be targeted when doing bovine respiratory microbiota research. Video abstract.

摘要: 背景：细菌性支气管肺炎（BP）是牛发病和死亡的主要原因。鼻咽通常被认为是引起BP的致病细菌的主要来源。然而，最近在人类中显示，口咽可能充当到达肺部的病原体的主要储存库。因此，目的是描述整个牛呼吸道中存在的细菌菌群，以确定哪些上呼吸道（URT）生态位可能对肺菌群的组成贡献最大。方法：从15头健康的育肥牛犊中抽取17个上下呼吸道位置。使用拭子，受保护的标本刷子和盐水洗涤的组合收集样品。从每个样品中提取DNA，并对16SrRNA基因（V3-V4）进行测序。在抽样地点之间比较了社区组成，α-多样性和β-多样性。结果：菌群组成在采样位置上有所不同，生理和解剖上不同的位置显示了1137个观察到的序列变体（SV）的相对相对丰度。相似性分析表明，肺部与鼻咽（R统计量=0.091）比与口咽（R统计量=0.709）或任何其他URT采样位置更为相似。使用Dirichlet多项式混合物在属水平上进行聚类后，在所有样本中鉴定出五个不同的元社区。这包括主要在肺和鼻咽中发现的以支原体为主的元社区。在SV水平上的进一步聚类显示，肺和鼻咽之间有一个共同的元共同体，主要由Dispar支原体支配。在鼻孔，扁桃体和口腔微生物群中发现的其他元共同体分别由莫拉氏菌，梭菌和链球菌所主导。结论：健康牛的鼻咽细菌菌群与肺细菌菌群最为相似，因此可能是肺部细菌的主要来源。这一发现表明，在进行牛呼吸菌群研究时，鼻咽可能是最重要的定位部位。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32522236

VIBRANT: automated recovery, annotation and curation of microbial viruses, and evaluation of viral community function from genomic sequences

充满活力：自动恢复，注释和治愈微生物病毒，并根据基因组序列评估病毒群落功能

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00867-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32522236/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/10/2020

Abstract: Background: Viruses are central to microbial community structure in all environments. The ability to generate large metagenomic assemblies of mixed microbial and viral sequences provides the opportunity to tease apart complex microbiome dynamics, but these analyses are currently limited by the tools available for analyses of viral genomes and assessing their metabolic impacts on microbiomes. Design: Here we present VIBRANT, the first method to utilize a hybrid machine learning and protein similarity approach that is not reliant on sequence features for automated recovery and annotation of viruses, determination of genome quality and completeness, and characterization of viral community function from metagenomic assemblies. VIBRANT uses neural networks of protein signatures and a newly developed v-score metric that circumvents traditional boundaries to maximize identification of lytic viral genomes and integrated proviruses, including highly diverse viruses. VIBRANT highlights viral auxiliary metabolic genes and metabolic pathways, thereby serving as a user-friendly platform for evaluating viral community function. VIBRANT was trained and validated on reference virus datasets as well as microbiome and virome data. Results: VIBRANT showed superior performance in recovering higher quality viruses and concurrently reduced the false identification of non-viral genome fragments in comparison to other virus identification programs, specifically VirSorter, VirFinder, and MARVEL. When applied to 120,834 metagenome-derived viral sequences representing several human and natural environments, VIBRANT recovered an average of 94% of the viruses, whereas VirFinder, VirSorter, and MARVEL achieved less powerful performance, averaging 48%, 87%, and 71%, respectively. Similarly, VIBRANT identified more total viral sequence and proteins when applied to real metagenomes. When compared to PHASTER, Prophage Hunter, and VirSorter for the ability to extract integrated provirus regions from host scaffolds, VIBRANT performed comparably and even identified proviruses that the other programs did not. To demonstrate applications of VIBRANT, we studied viromes associated with Crohn's disease to show that specific viral groups, namely Enterobacteriales-like viruses, as well as putative dysbiosis associated viral proteins are more abundant compared to healthy individuals, providing a possible viral link to maintenance of diseased states. Conclusions: The ability to accurately recover viruses and explore viral impacts on microbial community metabolism will greatly advance our understanding of microbiomes, host-microbe interactions, and ecosystem dynamics. Video Abstract.

摘要: 背景：在所有环境中，病毒都是微生物群落结构的核心。产生混合的微生物和病毒序列的大型宏基因组装配体的能力提供了机会，以区分复杂的微生物组动力学，但是这些分析目前受到可用于病毒基因组分析和评估其对微生物组的代谢影响的工具的限制。设计：在这里，我们介绍VIBRANT，这是第一种利用混合机器学习和蛋白质相似性方法的方法，该方法不依赖于序列特征来自动恢复和注释病毒，确定基因组质量和完整性以及从宏基因组学中表征病毒群落功能组件。VIBRANT使用蛋白质特征码的神经网络和新开发的v得分指标，该指标规避了传统界限，以最大程度地鉴定裂解性病毒基因组和整合的原病毒，包括高度多样化的病毒。VIBRANT突出显示了病毒辅助代谢基因和代谢途径，从而成为评估病毒群落功能的用户友好平台。在参考病毒数据集以及微生物组和病毒学数据上对VIBRANT进行了培训和验证。结果：与其他病毒识别程序（特别是VirSorter，VirFinder和MARVEL）相比，VIBRANT在恢复更高质量的病毒方面表现出卓越的性能，同时减少了对非病毒基因组片段的错误识别。如果将VIBRANT应用于代表了几种人类和自然环境的120,834个基因组基因衍生的病毒序列，则平均可回收94％的病毒，而VirFinder，VirSorter和MARVEL的性能则较差，分别为48％，87％和71％，分别。同样，当应用于真正的基因组时，VIBRANT可以鉴定出更多的总病毒序列和蛋白质。与PHASTER，ProphageHunter和VirSorter相比，它具有从宿主支架中提取整合的前病毒区域的能力，VIBRANT的性能相当，甚至可以确定其他程序没有的前病毒。为了证明VIBRANT的应用，我们研究了与克罗恩氏病相关的病毒，以显示特定的病毒组，即肠杆菌样病毒以及推定的与菌体失调相关的病毒蛋白比健康个体更为丰富，为维持该病毒提供了可能的病毒联系病态。结论：准确恢复病毒并探索病毒对微生物群落代谢的能力将极大地增进我们对微生物群系，宿主-微生物相互作用和生态系统动态的了解。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32522072

Lactobacillus rhamnosus probiotic prevents airway function deterioration and promotes gut microbiome resilience in a murine asthma model

鼠李糖乳杆菌益生菌可预防鼠哮喘模型中的气道功能恶化并增强肠道微生物组的适应力

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1766345

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32522072/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/01/2020

Abstract: Allergic asthma is a highly prevalent inflammatory disease of the lower airways, clinically characterized by airway hyperreactivity and deterioration of airway function. Immunomodulatory probiotic bacteria are increasingly being explored to prevent asthma development, alone or in combination with other treatments. In this study, wild-type and recombinant probiotic Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 were tested as preventive treatment of experimental allergic asthma in mice. Recombinant L. rhamnosus GR-1 was designed to produce the major birch pollen allergen Bet v 1, to promote allergen-specific immunomodulation. Administration of wild-type and recombinant L. rhamnosus GR-1 prevented the development of airway hyperreactivity. Recombinant L. rhamnosus GR-1 also prevented elevation of airway total cell counts, lymphocyte counts and lung IL-1β levels, while wild-type L. rhamnosus GR-1 inhibited airway eosinophilia. Of note, a shift in gut microbiome composition was observed after asthma development, which correlated with the severity of airway inflammation and airway hyperreactivity. In the groups that received L. rhamnosus GR-1, this asthma-associated shift in gut microbiome composition was not observed, indicating microbiome-modulating effects of this probiotic. These data demonstrate that L. rhamnosus GR-1 can prevent airway function deterioration in allergic asthma. Bet v 1 expression by L. rhamnosus GR-1 further contributed to lower airway inflammation, although not solely through the expected reduction in T helper 2-associated responses, suggesting involvement of additional mechanisms. The beneficial effects of L. rhamnosus GR-1 correlate with increased gut microbiome resilience, which in turn is linked to protection of airway function, and thus further adds support to the existence of a gut-lung axis.

摘要: 过敏性哮喘是下呼吸道的高度流行的炎症性疾病，临床上以气道反应过度和气道功能恶化为特征。越来越多地探索免疫调节性益生菌单独或与其他疗法联合使用以预防哮喘的发展。在这项研究中，测试了野生型和重组益生菌鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1作为小鼠实验性过敏性哮喘的预防性治疗。重组鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1被设计为产生主要的桦树花粉变应原Betv1，以促进变应原特异性免疫调节。野生型和重组鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1的使用可防止气道高反应性的发展。重组鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1还阻止了气道总细胞计数，淋巴细胞计数和肺IL-1β水平的升高，而野生型鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1抑制了气道嗜酸性粒细胞增多。值得注意的是，哮喘发生后肠道微生物组组成发生了变化，这与气道炎症和气道高反应性的严重程度相关。在接受鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1的组中，未观察到与哮喘相关的肠道微生物组组成发生变化，表明该益生菌具有微生物组调节作用。这些数据表明，鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1可以预防过敏性哮喘中的气道功能恶化。鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1的Betv1表达进一步促进了气道炎症的降低，尽管这不仅是由于预期的与T辅助2相关的反应减少所致，还暗示了其他机制的参与。鼠李糖乳杆菌GR-1的有益作用与肠道微生物组的适应能力增强有关，这又与保护气道功能有关，因此进一步支持了肠肺轴的存在。

Pubmed_ID: 32518248

Assessing similarities and disparities in the skin microbiota between wild and laboratory populations of house mice

评估家养小鼠的野生种群和实验室种群之间皮肤微生物群的相似性和差异性

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-0690-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32518248/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 06/09/2020

Abstract: The house mouse is a key model organism in skin research including host-microbiota interactions, yet little is known about the skin microbiota of free-living mice. It is similarly unclear how closely laboratory mice, which typically live under exceptionally hygienic conditions, resemble the ancestral state of microbial variation in the wild. In this study, we sampled an area spanning 270 km2 in south-west France and collected 203 wild Mus musculus domesticus. We profiled the ear skin microbiota on standing and active communities (DNA-based and RNA-based 16 rRNA gene sequencing, respectively), and compared multiple community aspects between wild-caught and laboratory-reared mice kept in distinct facilities. Compared to lab mice, we reveal the skin microbiota of wild mice on the one hand to be unique in their composition within the Staphylococcus genus, with a majority of sequences most closely matching known novobiocin-resistant species, and display evidence of a rare biosphere. On the other hand, despite drastic disparities between natural and laboratory environments, we find that shared taxa nonetheless make up the majority of the core skin microbiota of both wild- and laboratory skin communities, suggesting that mammalian skin is a highly specialized habitat capable of strong selection from available species pools. Finally, the influence of environmental factors suggests RNA-based profiling as a preferred method to reduce environmental noise.

摘要: 家鼠是包括宿主-微生物群相互作用在内的皮肤研究中的关键模型生物，但对于自由生存小鼠的皮肤微生物群知之甚少。同样不清楚的是，通常生活在异常卫生条件下的实验室小鼠与野生动物中微生物变异的祖先状态有多接近。在这项研究中，我们在法国西南部采样了一个面积为270km2的区域，并收集了203只野生小家鼠。我们分析了站立和活动社区（分别基于DNA和基于RNA的16rRNA基因测序）上的耳部皮肤微生物群，并比较了保存在不同设施中的野生和实验室饲养小鼠之间的多个社区方面。与实验室小鼠相比，我们一方面揭示了野生小鼠的皮肤微生物群在葡萄球菌属中的组成是独特的，并且大多数序列与已知的耐新生物素的物种最接近，并显示出罕见的生物圈证据。另一方面，尽管自然环境与实验室环境之间存在巨大差异，但我们发现，共有的类群构成了野生和实验室皮肤群落的大部分核心皮肤微生物区系，这表明哺乳动物皮肤是一种高度专业化的栖息地，能够从可用物种库中进行选择。最后，环境因素的影响表明基于RNA的谱图分析是减少环境噪音的首选方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32518247

Competitive traits of coral symbionts may alter the structure and function of the microbiome

珊瑚共生菌的竞争特征可能会改变微生物组的结构和功能

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-0697-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32518247/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 06/09/2020

Abstract: In the face of global warming and unprecedented coral bleaching, a new avenue of research is focused on relatively rare algal symbionts and their ability to confer thermal tolerance to their host by association. Yet, thermal tolerance is just one of many physiological attributes inherent to the diversity of symbiodinians, a result of millions of years of competition and niche partitioning. Here, we revealed that competition among cocultured symbiodinians alters nutrient assimilation and compound production with species-specific responses. For Cladocopium goreaui, a species ubiquitous within stable coral associations, temperature stress increased sensitivity to competition eliciting a shift toward investment in cell replication, i.e., putative niche exploitation. Meanwhile, competition led Durusdinium trenchii, a thermally tolerant "background" symbiodinian, to divert resources from immediate growth to storage. As such, competition may be driving the dominance of C. goreaui outside of temperature stress, the destabilization of symbioses under thermal stress, the repopulation of coral tissues by D. trenchii following bleaching, and ultimately undermine the efficacy of symbiont turnover as an adaptive mechanism.

摘要: 面对全球变暖和史无前例的珊瑚褪色，新的研究途径集中在相对罕见的藻类共生体及其通过缔合赋予宿主耐热性的能力。然而，耐热性只是共生动物多样性固有的许多生理属性之一，这是数百万年竞争和生态位分配的结果。在这里，我们揭示了共培养共生菌之间的竞争改变了营养同化和具有特定物种反应的化合物生产。对于在稳定的珊瑚协会中无处不在的刺柏（Cladocopiumgoreaui），温度胁迫增加了对竞争的敏感性，从而引发了对细胞复制投资的投资，即假定的利基开发。同时，竞争导致耐热的“本底”共生植物DurusdiniumTrenchii将资源从立即增长转移到存储。这样一来，竞争可能会驱使果蝇的优势地位超出温度胁迫，在热胁迫下共生体不稳定，漂白后海藻D.Trenchii会重新繁殖珊瑚组织，最终破坏共生体周转作为适应性机制的功效。。

Pubmed_ID: 32518182

A Framework for Effective Application of Machine Learning to Microbiome-Based Classification Problems

机器学习有效应用于基于微生物组的分类问题的框架

DOI: 10.1128/mBio.00434-20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32518182/

Journal: mBio {'ISSN': '2150-7511', 'Name': 'mbio', '2015': '6.975', '2016': '6.956', '2017': '6.689', '2018': '6.747', '2019': '6.784'}

Date: 06/09/2020

Abstract: Machine learning (ML) modeling of the human microbiome has the potential to identify microbial biomarkers and aid in the diagnosis of many diseases such as inflammatory bowel disease, diabetes, and colorectal cancer. Progress has been made toward developing ML models that predict health outcomes using bacterial abundances, but inconsistent adoption of training and evaluation methods call the validity of these models into question. Furthermore, there appears to be a preference by many researchers to favor increased model complexity over interpretability. To overcome these challenges, we trained seven models that used fecal 16S rRNA sequence data to predict the presence of colonic screen relevant neoplasias (SRNs) (n = 490 patients, 261 controls and 229 cases). We developed a reusable open-source pipeline to train, validate, and interpret ML models. To show the effect of model selection, we assessed the predictive performance, interpretability, and training time of L2-regularized logistic regression, L1- and L2-regularized support vector machines (SVM) with linear and radial basis function kernels, a decision tree, random forest, and gradient boosted trees (XGBoost). The random forest model performed best at detecting SRNs with an area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (AUROC) of 0.695 (interquartile range [IQR], 0.651 to 0.739) but was slow to train (83.2 h) and not inherently interpretable. Despite its simplicity, L2-regularized logistic regression followed random forest in predictive performance with an AUROC of 0.680 (IQR, 0.625 to 0.735), trained faster (12 min), and was inherently interpretable. Our analysis highlights the importance of choosing an ML approach based on the goal of the study, as the choice will inform expectations of performance and interpretability.IMPORTANCE Diagnosing diseases using machine learning (ML) is rapidly being adopted in microbiome studies. However, the estimated performance associated with these models is likely overoptimistic. Moreover, there is a trend toward using black box models without a discussion of the difficulty of interpreting such models when trying to identify microbial biomarkers of disease. This work represents a step toward developing more-reproducible ML practices in applying ML to microbiome research. We implement a rigorous pipeline and emphasize the importance of selecting ML models that reflect the goal of the study. These concepts are not particular to the study of human health but can also be applied to environmental microbiology studies.

摘要: 人类微生物组的机器学习（ML）建模具有识别微生物生物标志物的潜力，并有助于诊断许多疾病，例如炎症性肠病，糖尿病和大肠癌。在开发使用细菌丰度预测健康结果的ML模型方面已经取得了进展，但是培训和评估方法的不一致采用使这些模型的有效性受到质疑。此外，许多研究人员似乎更倾向于增加模型的复杂性而不是可解释性。为了克服这些挑战，我们训练了七个模型，这些模型使用粪便16SrRNA序列数据来预测结肠筛查相关的瘤样增生（SRN）的存在（n=490例患者，261例对照和229例）。我们开发了可重用的开源管道来训练，验证和解释ML模型。为了显示模型选择的效果，我们评估了具有线性和径向基函数核的L2规范化logistic回归，L1和L2规范化支持向量机（SVM）的预测性能，可解释性和训练时间，随机森林和梯度增强树（XGBoost）。随机森林模型在检测SRN时表现最佳，其接收器工作特征曲线（AUROC）下的面积为0.695（四分位数范围[IQR]，0.651至0.739），但训练速度较慢（83.2小时），无法固有地解释。尽管它很简单，但是L2正规逻辑回归在随机森林的预测性能之后，其AUROC为0.680（IQR，0.625至0.735），训练更快（12分钟），并且具有内在的解释性。我们的分析强调了根据研究目标选择ML方法的重要性，因为选择将告知对性能和可解释性的期望。重要性在微生物组研究中，使用机器学习（ML）诊断疾病已迅速被采用。但是，与这些模型相关的估计性能可能过于乐观。此外，有一种趋势是使用黑盒模型而不讨论在尝试鉴定疾病的微生物生物标记物时解释这种模型的困难。这项工作代表了在将ML应用于微生物组研究中开发出更具可重复性的ML实践的一步。我们实施了严格的流程，并强调了选择反映研究目标的ML模型的重要性。这些概念并非专门用于人类健康的研究，但也可以应用于环境微生物学研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32518181

Critical Relevance of Stochastic Effects on Low-Bacterial-Biomass 16S rRNA Gene Analysis

低细菌生物量16S rRNA基因分析中随机效应的关键相关性

DOI: 10.1128/mBio.00258-20

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32518181/

Journal: mBio {'ISSN': '2150-7511', 'Name': 'mbio', '2015': '6.975', '2016': '6.956', '2017': '6.689', '2018': '6.747', '2019': '6.784'}

Date: 06/09/2020

Abstract: The bacterial microbiome of human body sites, previously considered sterile, remains highly controversial because it can be challenging to isolate signal from noise when low-biomass samples are being analyzed. We tested the hypothesis that stochastic sequencing noise, separable from reagent contamination, is generated during sequencing on the Illumina MiSeq platform when DNA input is below a critical threshold. We first purified DNA from serial dilutions of Pseudomonas aeruginosa and from negative controls using three DNA purification kits, quantified input using droplet digital PCR, and then sequenced the 16S rRNA gene in four technical replicates. This process identified reproducible contaminant signal that was separable from an irreproducible stochastic noise, which occurred as bacterial biomass of samples decreased. This approach was then applied to authentic respiratory samples from healthy individuals (n = 22) that ranged from high to ultralow bacterial biomass. Using oral rinse, bronchoalveolar lavage (BAL) fluid, and exhaled breath condensate (EBC) samples and matched controls, we were able to demonstrate (i) that stochastic noise dominates sequencing in real-world low-bacterial-biomass samples that contain fewer than 104 copies of the 16S rRNA gene per sample, (ii) that critical examination of the community composition of technical replicates can be used to separate signal from noise, and (iii) that EBC is an irreproducible sampling modality for sampling the microbiome of the lower airways. We anticipate that these results combined with suggested methods for identifying and dealing with noisy communities will facilitate increased reproducibility while simultaneously permitting characterization of potentially important low-biomass communities.IMPORTANCE DNA contamination from external sources (reagents, environment, operator, etc.) has long been assumed to be the main cause of spurious signals that appear under low-bacterial-biomass conditions. Here, we demonstrate that contamination can be separated from another, random signal generated during low-biomass-sample sequencing. This stochastic noise is not reproduced between technical replicates; however, results for any one replicate taken alone could look like a microbial community different from the controls. Using this information, we investigated respiratory samples from healthy humans and determined the narrow range of bacterial biomass where samples transition from producing reproducible microbial sequences to ones dominated by noise. We present a rigorous approach to studies involving low-bacterial-biomass samples to detect this source of noise and provide a framework for deciding if a sample is likely to be dominated by noise. We anticipate that this work will facilitate increased reproducibility in the characterization of potentially important low-biomass communities.

摘要: 人体部位的细菌微生物组（以前被认为是无菌的）仍然存在很大争议，因为在分析低生物量样品时，将信号与噪声隔离可能是一项挑战。我们测试了以下假设：当DNA输入低于临界阈值时，在IlluminaMiSeq平台上进行测序时会产生与试剂污染分离的随机测序噪声。我们首先使用三种DNA纯化试剂盒从铜绿假单胞菌的系列稀释液和阴性对照中纯化DNA，然后使用液滴数字PCR定量输入，然后在四个技术重复中对16SrRNA基因进行测序。该过程确定了可再现的污染物信号，该信号与不可再现的随机噪声是可分离的，随机噪声随着样品细菌生物量的减少而发生。然后将该方法应用于健康个体（n=22）的真实呼吸样本，样本的细菌生物量范围从高到超低。使用口腔冲洗液，支气管肺泡灌洗液（BAL）和呼出气冷凝物（EBC）样品以及相匹配的对照，我们能够证明（i）随机噪声在实际的低细菌生物量样品中的测序中占主导地位，而该样品中的细菌少于每个样本104个拷贝的16SrRNA基因，（ii）对技术复制品的群落组成进行严格检查可以将信号与噪声分离，并且（iii）EBC是不可复制的采样方式，用于采样低级微生物群气道。我们预期这些结果与建议的识别和处理嘈杂社区的方法相结合，将有助于提高重现性，同时允许表征潜在的重要低生物量社区。重要信息外部来源（试剂，环境，操作人员等）的DNA污染已由来已久被认为是在低细菌生物量条件下出现的虚假信号的主要原因。在这里，我们证明了污染可以与低生物量样品测序过程中产生的另一个随机信号分离。在技​​术复制之间不会复制这种随机噪声。但是，单独进行任何一次重复的结果看起来都像是与对照不同的微生物群落。利用这些信息，我们调查了来自健康人类的呼吸道样本，并确定了细菌生物量的狭窄范围，其中样本从产生可重现的微生物序列过渡到以噪声为主的微生物序列。我们提出了一种严格的研究方法，涉及低细菌生物量样品，以检测这种噪声源，并为确定样品是否可能受噪声支配提供框架。我们预计这项工作将有助于在潜在重要的低生物量社区的表征中提高可重复性。

Pubmed_ID: 32515683

Gut microbiota remodeling reverses aging-associated inflammation and dysregulation of systemic bile acid homeostasis in mice sex-specifically

肠道菌群重塑可逆转性别相关的小鼠衰老相关的炎症和全身胆汁酸稳态失调

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1763770

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32515683/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Aging is usually characterized with inflammation and disordered bile acids (BAs) homeostasis, as well as gut dysbiosis. The pathophysiological changes during aging are also sexual specific. However, it remains unclear about the modulating process among gut microbiota, BA metabolism, and inflammation during aging. In this study, we established a direct link between gut microbiota and BA profile changes in the liver, serum, and four intestinal segments of both sexes during aging and gut microbiota remodeling by co-housing old mice with young ones. We found aging reduced Actinobacteria in male mice but increased Firmicutes in female mice. Among the top 10 altered genera with aging, 4 genera changed oppositely between male and female mice, and most of the changes were reversed by co-housing in both sexes. Gut microbiota remodeling by co-housing partly rescued the systemically dysregulated BA homeostasis induced by aging in a sex- and tissue-specific manner. Aging had greater impacts on hepatic BA profile in females, but intestinal BA profile in males. In addition, aging increased hepatic and colonic deoxycholic acid in male mice, but reduced them in females. Moreover, muricholic acids shifted markedly in the intestine, especially in old male mice, and partially reversed by co-housing. Notably, the ratios of primary to secondary BAs in the liver, serum, and all four intestinal segments were increased in old mice and reduced by co-housing in both sexes. Together, the presented data revealed that sex divergent changes of gut microbiota and BA profile in multiple body compartments during aging and gut microbiota remodeling, highlighting the sex-specific prevention and treatment of aging-related disorders by targeting gut microbiota-regulated BA metabolism should particularly be given more attention.

摘要: 衰老通常以炎症和胆汁酸（BAs）稳态失调以及肠道营养不良为特征。衰老过程中的病理生理变化也具有性别特异性。但是，尚不清楚肠道微生物群，BA代谢和衰老过程中的炎症之间的调节过程。在这项研究中，我们建立了肠道菌群与衰老和肠道菌群重塑过程中男女肝脏，血清和四个肠道区段在肝脏，血清和四个肠道区段变化之间的直接联系，方法是将老小鼠与年轻小鼠共居。我们发现衰老减少了雄性小鼠的放线菌，但增加了雌性小鼠的Fimicutes。在随着年龄增长而变化的前十大属中，雄性和雌性小鼠中有四个属相反地变化，并且大多数变化通过男女同居而被逆转。通过共寄居对肠道菌群进行重塑可以部分挽救因衰老而导致的系统失调的BA动态平衡。衰老对女性的肝BA分布影响更大，但对男性的肠道BA分布影响更大。另外，衰老增加了雄性小鼠的肝和结肠脱氧胆酸，但是降低了雌性小鼠的肝和结肠脱氧胆酸。此外，粘液酸在肠中明显转移，尤其是在老年雄性小鼠中，并通过共同寄养而部分逆转。值得注意的是，在老年小鼠中，肝脏，血清和所有四个肠段中原发性与继发性BA的比率增加，而男女同居则降低了这些比率。总之，所提供的数据表明，在衰老和肠道菌群重塑过程中，肠道菌群和BA分布在多个身体部位的性别差异有所变化，特别是通过针对肠道菌群调节的BA代谢，性别特异性预防和治疗与衰老相关的疾病应该特别重要。得到更多的关注。

Pubmed_ID: 32515657

Human resident gut microbe Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron regulates colonic neuronal innervation and neurogenic function

人体常驻肠道微生物拟杆菌（Theactotaides thetaiotaomicron）调节结肠神经元神经支配和神经源性功能

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1766936

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32515657/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/01/2020

Abstract: Background and aims: As the importance of gut-brain interactions increases, understanding how specific gut microbes interact with the enteric nervous system (ENS), which is the first point of neuronal exposure becomes critical. Our aim was to understand how the dominant human gut bacterium Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron (Bt) regulates anatomical and functional characteristics of the ENS. Methods: Neuronal cell populations, as well as enteroendocrine cells, were assessed in proximal colonic sections using fluorescent immunohistochemistry in specific pathogen-free (SPF), germ-free (GF) and Bt conventionalized-germ-free mice (Bt-CONV). RNA expression of tight junction proteins and toll-like receptors (TLR) were measured using qPCR. Colonic motility was analyzed using in vitro colonic manometry. Results: Decreased neuronal and vagal afferent innervation observed in GF mice was normalized by Bt-CONV with increased neuronal staining in mucosa and myenteric plexus. Bt-CONV also restored expression of nitric oxide synthase expressing inhibitory neurons and of choline acetyltransferase and substance P expressing excitatory motor neurons comparable to those of SPF mice. Neurite outgrowth and glial cells were upregulated by Bt-CONV. RNA expression of tight junction protein claudin 3 was downregulated while TLR2 was upregulated by Bt-CONV. The enteroendocrine cell subtypes L-cells and enterochromaffin cells were reduced in GF mice, with Bt-CONV restoring L-cell numbers. Motility as measured by colonic migrating motor complexes (CMMCs) increased in GF and Bt-CONV. Conclusion: Bt, common gut bacteria, is critical in regulating enteric neuronal and enteroendocrine cell populations, and neurogenic colonic activity. This highlights the potential use of this resident gut bacteria for maintaining healthy gut function.

摘要: 背景和目的：随着肠脑相互作用的重要性不断提高，了解特定肠道微生物如何与肠道神经系统（ENS）相互作用（肠道神经系统暴露的第一步）变得至关重要。我们的目的是了解人类的肠道细菌细菌拟杆菌（Bteroidesthetaiotaomicron）（Bt）如何调节ENS的解剖学和功能特征。方法：在特定的无病原体（SPF），无细菌（GF）和Bt常规无菌的小鼠（Bt-CONV）中，使用荧光免疫组织化学方法在近端结肠切片中评估神经元细胞群和肠内分泌细胞。使用qPCR测量紧密连接蛋白和toll样受体（TLR）的RNA表达。使用体外结肠测压法分析结肠运动性。结果：通过Bt-CONV可以使GF小鼠神经元和迷走神经传入神经减少，并使粘膜和肌间神经丛的神经元染色增加。与SPF小鼠相比，Bt-CONV还可以恢复表达一氧化氮合酶的抑制性神经元以及表达胆碱乙酰转移酶和P物质的兴奋性运动神经元的表达。Bt-CONV上调了神经突的生长和神经胶质细胞。Bt-CONV下调紧密连接蛋白claudin3的RNA表达，而TLR2上调。GF小鼠的肠内分泌细胞亚型L细胞和嗜铬细胞减少，Bt-CONV恢复L细胞数量。通过结肠迁移运动复合物（CMMC）测得的运动能力在GF和Bt-CONV中增加。结论：Bt是常见的肠道细菌，在调节肠道神经元和肠内分泌细胞的数量以及神经原性结肠活性中至关重要。这突出了这种常驻肠道细菌在维持健康肠道功能方面的潜在用途。

Pubmed_ID: 32514117

Division of functional roles for termite gut protists revealed by single-cell transcriptomes

单细胞转录组揭示白蚁肠原虫功能角色的划分

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-0698-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32514117/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 06/08/2020

Abstract: The microbiome in the hindgut of wood-feeding termites comprises various species of bacteria, archaea, and protists. This gut community is indispensable for the termite, which thrives solely on recalcitrant and nitrogen-poor wood. However, the difficulty in culturing these microorganisms has hindered our understanding of the function of each species in the gut. Although protists predominate in the termite gut microbiome and play a major role in wood digestion, very few culture-independent studies have explored the contribution of each species to digestion. Here, we report single-cell transcriptomes of four protists species comprising the protist population in worldwide pest Coptotermes formosanus. Comparative transcriptomic analysis revealed that the expression patterns of the genes involved in wood digestion were different among species, reinforcing their division of roles in wood degradation. Transcriptomes, together with enzyme assays, also suggested that one of the protists, Cononympha leidyi, actively degrades chitin and assimilates it into amino acids. We propose that C. leidyi contributes to nitrogen recycling and inhibiting infection from entomopathogenic fungi through chitin degradation. Two of the genes for chitin degradation were further revealed to be acquired via lateral gene transfer (LGT) implying the importance of LGT in the evolution of symbiosis. Our single-cell-based approach successfully characterized the function of each protist in termite hindgut and explained why the gut community includes multiple species.

摘要: 喂食白蚁的后肠中的微生物组包括各种细菌，古细菌和原生生物。这个肠道群落对于白蚁是必不可少的，白蚁仅靠顽固和贫氮的木材生长。但是，培养这些微生物的困难阻碍了我们对肠道中每个物种功能的理解。尽管原生生物在白蚁肠道微生物组中占主导地位，并在木材消化中起主要作用，但很少有与文化无关的研究探索每种物种对消化的贡献。在这里，我们报告了四种原生生物物种的单细胞转录组，其中包括世界范围内有害生物白蚁（Coptotermesformosanus）的原生生物种群。比较转录组学分析显示，与木材消化有关的基因的表达模式在物种之间是不同的，从而加强了它们在木材降解中的作用划分。转录组以及酶测定结果也表明，其中一个原生生物Cononymphaleidyi会积极降解几丁质并将其同化为氨基酸。我们建议C.leidyi有助于氮的循环利用，并通过甲壳质降解抑制昆虫病原真菌的感染。进一步显示，通过侧向基因转移（LGT）获得了几丁质降解的两个基因，这暗示了LGT在共生进化中的重要性。我们基于单细胞的方法成功地描述了白蚁后肠中每个原生生物的功能，并解释了肠道菌群为何包含多种物种的原因。

Pubmed_ID: 32514023

The search for microbial dark matter

寻找微生物暗物质

DOI: 10.1038/d41586-020-01684-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32514023/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: No abstract

Pubmed_ID: 32513940

Animal biosynthesis of complex polyketides in a photosynthetic partnership

光合作用中复杂聚酮化合物的动物生物合成

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16376-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32513940/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 06/08/2020

Abstract: Complex polyketides are typically associated with microbial metabolism. Here, we report that animals also make complex, microbe-like polyketides. We show there is a widespread branch of fatty acid synthase- (FAS)-like polyketide synthase (PKS) proteins, which sacoglossan animals use to synthesize complex products. The purified sacogolassan protein EcPKS1 uses only methylmalonyl-CoA as a substrate, otherwise unknown in animal lipid metabolism. Sacoglossans are sea slugs, some of which eat algae, digesting the cells but maintaining functional chloroplasts. Here, we provide evidence that polyketides support this unusual photosynthetic partnership. The FAS-like PKS family represents an uncharacterized branch of polyketide and fatty acid metabolism, encoding a large diversity of biomedically relevant animal enzymes and chemicals awaiting discovery. The biochemical characterization of an intact animal polyketide biosynthetic enzyme opens the door to understanding the immense untapped metabolic potential of metazoans.

摘要: 复杂的聚酮化合物通常与微生物代谢有关。在这里，我们报道动物还可以制造复杂的微生物状聚酮化合物。我们显示，脂肪酸合酶（FAS）样的聚酮合酶（PKS）蛋白存在广泛的分支，而猴动物则用它来合成复杂的产品。纯化的sacogolassan蛋白EcPKS1仅使用甲基丙二酰辅酶A作为底物，否则在动物脂质代谢中是未知的。Sacoglossan是海参，其中一些以藻类为食，可以消化细胞，但仍能维持叶绿体的功能。在这里，我们提供了证明聚酮化合物支持这种不同寻常的光合作用的证据。类似于FAS的PKS家族代表了聚酮化合物和脂肪酸代谢的未表征分支，编码了待发现的多种生物医学相关动物酶和化学物质。完整的动物聚酮化合物生物合成酶的生化特性为了解后生动物巨大的尚未开发的代谢潜力打开了大门。

Pubmed_ID: 32513310

Re-evaluating the relationship between missing heritability and the microbiome

重新评估缺失遗传力与微生物组之间的关系

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00839-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32513310/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/08/2020

Abstract: Human genome-wide association studies (GWASs) have recurrently estimated lower heritability estimates than familial studies. Many explanations have been suggested to explain these lower estimates, including that a substantial proportion of genetic variation and gene-by-environment interactions are unmeasured in typical GWASs. The human microbiome is potentially related to both of these explanations, but it has been more commonly considered as a source of unmeasured genetic variation. In particular, it has recently been argued that the genetic variation within the human microbiome should be included when estimating trait heritability. We outline issues with this argument, which in its strictest form depends on the holobiont model of human-microbiome interactions. Instead, we argue that the microbiome could be leveraged to help control for environmental variation across a population, although that remains to be determined. We discuss potential approaches that could be explored to determine whether integrating microbiome sequencing data into GWASs is useful. Video abstract.

摘要: 与家族研究相比，人类全基因组关联研究（GWAS）的反复估计的遗传力估计值较低。已经提出了许多解释来解释这些较低的估计值，包括在典型的GWAS中无法测量很大比例的遗传变异和基因与环境之间的相互作用。人类微生物组可能与这两种解释有关，但人们更普遍认为它是无法测量的遗传变异的来源。特别是，最近有人争辩说，在估计性状遗传力时应包括人类微生物组内的遗传变异。我们用这个论点来概述问题，其最严格的形式取决于人-微生物组相互作用的全息模型。相反，我们认为可以利用微生物组来帮助控制整个人群的环境变化，尽管这还有待确定。我们讨论了可以探索的潜在方法，以确定将微生物组测序数据整合到GWAS中是否有用。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32513301

Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron-derived outer membrane vesicles promote regulatory dendritic cell responses in health but not in inflammatory bowel disease

源自细菌的拟杆菌属外膜小泡在健康中促进树突状细胞的调节反应，但在炎症性肠病中则不起作用

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00868-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32513301/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/08/2020

Abstract: Background: Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron (Bt) is a prominent member of the human intestinal microbiota that, like all gram-negative bacteria, naturally generates nanosized outer membrane vesicles (OMVs) which bud off from the cell surface. Importantly, OMVs can cross the intestinal epithelial barrier to mediate microbe-host cell crosstalk involving both epithelial and immune cells to help maintain intestinal homeostasis. Here, we have examined the interaction between Bt OMVs and blood or colonic mucosa-derived dendritic cells (DC) from healthy individuals and patients with Crohn's disease (CD) or ulcerative colitis (UC). Results: In healthy individuals, Bt OMVs stimulated significant (p < 0.05) IL-10 expression by colonic DC, whereas in peripheral blood-derived DC they also stimulated significant (p < 0.001 and p < 0.01, respectively) expression of IL-6 and the activation marker CD80. Conversely, in UC Bt OMVs were unable to elicit IL-10 expression by colonic DC. There were also reduced numbers of CD103+ DC in the colon of both UC and CD patients compared to controls, supporting a loss of regulatory DC in both diseases. Furthermore, in CD and UC, Bt OMVs elicited a significantly lower proportion of DC which expressed IL-10 (p < 0.01 and p < 0.001, respectively) in blood compared to controls. These alterations in DC responses to Bt OMVs were seen in patients with inactive disease, and thus are indicative of intrinsic defects in immune responses to this commensal in inflammatory bowel disease (IBD). Conclusions: Overall, our findings suggest a key role for OMVs generated by the commensal gut bacterium Bt in directing a balanced immune response to constituents of the microbiota locally and systemically during health which is altered in IBD patients. Video Abstract.

摘要: 背景：拟杆菌是人类肠道菌群中的重要成员，与所有革兰氏阴性细菌一样，它自然产生从细胞表面萌芽的纳米级外膜囊泡（OMV）。重要的是，OMV可以穿越肠道上皮屏障，介导涉及上皮细胞和免疫细胞的微生物-宿主细胞串扰，以帮助维持肠道稳态。在这里，我们检查了BtOMV与健康个体和克罗恩病（CD）或溃疡性结肠炎（UC）患者的血液或结肠黏膜来源的树突状细胞（DC）之间的相互作用。结果：在健康个体中，BtOMV通过结肠DC刺激了IL-10的显着表达（p<0.05），而在外周血源DC中，它们也刺激了IL-6的显着表达（分别为p<0.001和p<0.01）。和激活标记CD80。相反，在UCBt中，OMV无法通过结肠DC诱导IL-10表达。与对照组相比，UC和CD患者结肠中CD103+DC的数量也减少了，这支持了这两种疾病中调节DC的丧失。此外，与对照相比，在CD和UC中，BtOMV引起的血液中表达IL-10的DC比例要低得多（分别为p<0.01和p<0.001）。在非活动性疾病患者中观察到了对BtOMV的DC反应的这些改变，因此表明在炎症性肠病（IBD）中对这种症状的免疫反应存在固有缺陷。结论：总的来说，我们的发现表明，共生肠道细菌Bt产生的OMV在指导健康人群中对局部和全身微生物群组成成分的平衡免疫反应（这在IBD患者中有所改变）中起着关键作用。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32513256

Temporal variations in bacterial community diversity and composition throughout intensive care unit renovations

重症监护病房整修过程中细菌群落多样性和组成的时间变化

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00852-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32513256/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/08/2020

Abstract: Background: Inanimate surfaces within a hospital serve as a reservoir of microbial life that may colonize patients and ultimately result in healthcare associated infections (HAIs). Critically ill patients in intensive care units (ICUs) are particularly vulnerable to HAIs. Little is known about how the microbiome of the ICU is established or what factors influence its evolution over time. A unique opportunity to bridge the knowledge gap into how the ICU microbiome evolves emerged in our health system, where we were able to characterize microbial communities in an established hospital ICU prior to closing for renovations, during renovations, and then after re-opening. Results: We collected swab specimens from ICU bedrails, computer keyboards, and sinks longitudinally at each renovation stage, and analyzed the bacterial compositions on these surfaces by 16S rRNA gene sequencing. Specimens collected before ICU closure had the greatest alpha diversity, while specimens collected after the ICU had been closed for over 300 days had the least. We sampled the ICU during the 45 days after re-opening; however, within that time frame, the alpha diversity never reached pre-closure levels. There were clear and significant differences in microbiota compositions at each renovation stage, which was driven by environmental bacteria after closure and human-associated bacteria after re-opening and before closure. Conclusions: Overall, we identified significant differences in microbiota diversity and community composition at each renovation stage. These data help to decipher the evolution of the microbiome in the most critical part of the hospital and demonstrate the significant impacts that microbiota from patients and staff have on the evolution of ICU surfaces. Video Abstract.

摘要: 背景：医院内无生命的表面充当微生物生活的库，可能使患者定居，并最终导致医疗保健相关感染（HAIs）。重症监护病房（ICU）的重症患者特别容易感染HAI。关于ICU的微生物组如何建立或哪些因素会影响其随着时间的演变，人们所知甚少。在我们的卫生系统中，出现了一个独特的机会来弥合知识鸿沟，以了解ICU微生物组的演变方式，在此之前，我们能够在关闭进行翻修之前，翻修期间以及重新开放之后，对既有医院ICU中的微生物群落进行表征。结果：我们从ICU床栏杆，计算机键盘收集拭子标本，并在每个翻新阶段纵向下沉，并通过16SrRNA基因测序分析这些表面上的细菌组成。在关闭ICU之前收集的标本具有最大的alpha多样性，而在关闭ICU300天以上之后收集的标本最少。我们在重新开放后的45天内对ICU进行了采样；但是，在该时间段内，alpha分集从未达到关闭前的水平。在每个翻新阶段，微生物群组成存在明显而显着的差异，这是由封闭后的环境细菌和重新开放后以及封闭前的人类相关细菌驱动的。结论：总体而言，我们确定了每个翻新阶段微生物群落多样性和群落组成的显着差异。这些数据有助于破译医院最关键部分的微生物组，并证明来自患者和医务人员的微生物群对ICU表面的演变具有重大影响。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32507008

Alteration in gut microbiota is associated with dysregulation of cytokines and glucocorticoid therapy in systemic lupus erythematosus

肠道菌群的改变与系统性红斑狼疮的细胞因子调节异常和糖皮质激素治疗有关

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1768644

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32507008/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/01/2020

Abstract: A growing corpus of evidence implicates the involvement of the commensal microbiota and immune cytokines in the initiation and progression of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE). Glucocorticoids have been widely used in the treatment of SLE patients, however, glucocorticoid treatment carries a higher risk of other diseases. Using the 16S rRNA technique, we investigated the differences between the gut microbiota associated with the immune cytokines of SLE and relevant glucocorticoid treatment in a female cohort of 20 healthy control subjects (HC), 17 subjects with SLE (SLE-G), and 20 SLE patients having undergone glucocorticoid treatment (SLE+G). We observed that the diversity and structure of the microbial community in SLE+G patients were significantly changed compared to that of SLE-G patients, whereas the gut microbial community of the SLE+G group showed a similarity with the HC group, which implicate that the shift in the gut microbiome could represent a return to homeostasis. Furthermore, the up-regulations of immune cytokines in SLE-G were identified as closely related to gut dysbiosis, which indicates that the overrepresented genera in SLE patients may play roles in regulating expression level of these immune cytokines. This associated analysis of gut microbiota, glucocorticoid therapy, and immune factors might provide novel and insightful clues revealing the pathogenesis of SLE patients.

摘要: 越来越多的证据表明共生微生物和免疫细胞因子参与系统性红斑狼疮（SLE）的发生和发展。糖皮质激素已广泛用于SLE患者的治疗中，但是，糖皮质激素治疗具有其他疾病的较高风险。我们使用16SrRNA技术，在20名健康对照受试者（HC），17例SLE（GLE）和20名女性受试者中研究了与SLE免疫细胞因子相关的肠道菌群和相关糖皮质激素治疗之间的差异接受糖皮质激素治疗（SLE+G）的SLE患者。我们观察到，与SLE-G患者相比，SLE+G患者的微生物群落的多样性和结构发生了显着变化，而SLE+G组的肠道微生物群落与HC组相似，这表明肠道微生物组的转变可能意味着体内稳态的恢复。此外，SLE-G中免疫细胞因子的上调与肠道营养不良密切相关，这表明SLE患者中过高的属可能在调节这些免疫细胞因子的表达水平中发挥作用。肠道微生物群，糖皮质激素治疗和免疫因子的相关分析可能会提供新颖而有见地的线索，揭示SLE患者的发病机理。

Pubmed_ID: 32503844

Neither black nor white: do altered intestinal microbiota reflect chronic liver disease severity?

黑人和白人都不：肠道菌群的改变是否反映了慢性肝病的严重程度？

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2020-321424

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32503844/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 06/05/2020

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 32503672

Skin microbiota analysis-inspired development of novel anti-infectives

皮肤微生物群分析启发的新型抗感染药开发

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00866-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32503672/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/05/2020

Abstract: Background: The alarming spread of antimicrobial resistance requires the development of novel anti-infective drugs. Despite the recent research focus on the human microbiome and its likely value to understand and exploit inter-bacterial inhibitory phenomena as a source for antimicrobial strategies, the human microbiota has barely been investigated for the purpose of drug development. Results: We performed a large screen analyzing over 3000 human skin isolates to evaluate bacterial competition within the human skin microbiota as a basis for the development of anti-infective therapeutics. We discovered a Staphylococcus hominis strain with strong and broad activity against Gram-positive pathogens that was mediated by the bacteriocin micrococcin P1 (MP1). In "probiotic" approaches, this strain led to reduced Staphylococcus aureus infection and accelerated closure of S. aureus-infected wounds. Furthermore, we used a nanoparticle strategy to overcome the physico-chemical limitations often encountered with natural substances such as MP1 and demonstrate a significant reduction of S. aureus infection by MP1-loaded nanoparticles. Conclusions: Our study gives examples of how analysis of bacterial interactions in the human microbiota can be explored for the development of novel, effective anti-infective strategies. Video Abstract.

摘要: 背景：令人担忧的抗菌素耐药性扩散要求开发新型抗感染药。尽管最近的研究集中在人类微生物组及其理解和利用细菌间抑制现象作为抗菌策略来源的可能价值上，但出于药物开发的目的，人类微生物群几乎没有被研究过。结果：我们进行了大屏幕分析，分析了3000多种人类皮肤分离物，以评估人类皮肤微生物群中的细菌竞争，以此作为开发抗感染疗法的基础。我们发现了由细菌素微球菌素P1（MP1）介导的对革兰氏阳性病原体具有强而广泛活性的人葡萄球菌菌株。在“益生菌”方法中，该菌株导致金黄色葡萄球菌感染减少，并加速了金黄色葡萄球菌感染伤口的闭合。此外，我们使用了一种纳米粒子策略来克服天然物质（例如MP1）经常遇到的物理化学限制，并证明了装载MP1的纳米粒子可大大减少金黄色葡萄球菌感染。结论：我们的研究给出了如何探索人类微生物群中细菌相互作用的分析方法，以开发新颖，有效的抗感染策略的实例。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32501768

Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis and intestinal microbiota-toward establishing cause and effect

肌萎缩性侧索硬化症和肠道菌群朝着确定因果关系

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1767464

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32501768/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 11/01/2020

Abstract: The intestinal microbiota may be involved, through metabolic gut-brain interactions, in a variety of neurological conditions. In this addendum, we summarize the findings of our recent study investigating the potentially modulatory influence of the microbiome in a transgenic ALS mouse model, and the possible application to human disease. We found that transgenic mice show evidence of dysbiosis, even at the pre-symptomatic stage, and have a more severe disease course under germ-free conditions or after receiving broad-spectrum antibiotics. We demonstrated that Akkermansia muciniphila ameliorated the disease in mice and that this may be due to the production of nicotinamide. We then conducted a preliminary study in human ALS and identified functionally similar alterations within the metagenome. Furthermore, we found that patients with ALS had lower systemic and CSF levels of nicotinamide, suggesting that the changes observed in the mouse model may be relevant to human disease.

摘要: 在各种神经系统疾病中，肠道微生物区可能通过代谢性肠脑相互作用而参与。在此附录中，我们总结了我们最近的研究结果，该研究调查了微生物组在转基因ALS小鼠模型中的潜在调节作用，以及对人类疾病的可能应用。我们发现，转基因小鼠即使在有症状的前期也显示出营养不良的迹象，并且在无菌条件下或接受广谱抗生素治疗后病情更严重。我们证明了Akkermansiamuciniphila改善了小鼠的疾病，这可能是由于烟酰胺的产生。然后，我们对人ALS进行了初步研究，并确定了基因组中功能相似的改变。此外，我们发现ALS患者的烟酰胺的全身和脑脊液水平较低，这表明在小鼠模型中观察到的变化可能与人类疾病有关。

Pubmed_ID: 32501140

Freeze-dried fecal samples are biologically active after long-lasting storage and suited to fecal microbiota transplantation in a preclinical murine model of Clostridioides difficile infection

冷冻干燥的粪便样品经过长期保存后具有生物活性，适合于艰难梭菌感染的临床前鼠模型中的粪便微生物群移植。

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2020.1759489

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32501140/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Fecal microbiota transplantation is now recommended for treating recurrent forms of Clostridioides difficile infection. Recent studies have reported protocols using capsules of either frozen or freeze-dried stool allowing oral administration in in- and out-patient settings. However, a central question remains the viability, engraftment, and efficacy of the microbiome over time during storage life. This study shows that both the freeze-drying and freezing procedures for fecal samples allowed preserving viability, short-chain fatty acids concentration, and anti-Clostridioides difficile properties of microbiota without significant alteration after storage for 12 months. Fecal transplantation with freeze-dried microbiota allowed engraftment of microbiota leading to clearance of Clostridioides difficile infection in a preclinical murine model with a survival rate of 70% versus 53-60% in mice treated with frozen inocula, and 20% in the untreated group. Moreover, the freeze-dried powder can be used to fill oral hard capsules using a very low amount (0.5%) of glidant excipient, allowing oral formulation. Altogether, this study showed that freeze-dried inocula can be used for the treatment of Clostridioides difficile infection with long-lasting stability of the fecal microbiota. This formulation facilitates biobanking and allows the use of hard capsules, an essential step to simplify patient access to treatment.

摘要: 现在建议粪便菌群移植治疗复发形式的艰难梭菌感染。最近的研究报道了使用冷冻或冻干粪便胶囊的方案，允许在住院和门诊患者中口服。但是，一个核心问题仍然是微生物组在储存期内随时间推移的生存力，植入和功效。这项研究表明，粪便样品的冷冻干燥和冷冻程序都可以保留微生物的生存力，短链脂肪酸浓度和微生物菌丝体抗艰难梭菌的特性，在储存12个月后不会发生明显变化。用冻干菌群进行粪便移植可以使菌群移入，从而在临床前鼠模型中清除难辨梭状芽胞杆菌感染，其存活率为70％，而冷冻接种的小鼠为53-60％，未治疗组为20％。此外，冻干粉可使用极少量（0.5％）的助流剂赋形剂填充口服硬胶囊，从而制成口服制剂。总而言之，这项研究表明冻干接种物可用于艰难梭菌感染，并具有持久的粪便微生物群稳定性。这种配方有助于生物储备，并允许使用硬胶囊，这是简化患者获得治疗的重要步骤。

Pubmed_ID: 32499646

BCR selection and affinity maturation in Peyer's patch germinal centres

Peyer修补生发中心的BCR选择和亲和力成熟

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2262-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32499646/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: The antigen-binding variable regions of the B cell receptor (BCR) and of antibodies are encoded by exons that are assembled in developing B cells by V(D)J recombination1. The BCR repertoires of primary B cells are vast owing to mechanisms that create diversity at the junctions of V(D)J gene segments that contribute to complementarity-determining region 3 (CDR3), the region that binds antigen1. Primary B cells undergo antigen-driven BCR affinity maturation through somatic hypermutation and cellular selection in germinal centres (GCs)2,3. Although most GCs are transient3, those in intestinal Peyer's patches (PPs)-which depend on the gut microbiota-are chronic4, and little is known about their BCR repertoires or patterns of somatic hypermutation. Here, using a high-throughput assay that analyses both V(D)J segment usage and somatic hypermutation profiles, we elucidate physiological BCR repertoires in mouse PP GCs. PP GCs from different mice expand public BCR clonotypes (clonotypes that are shared between many mice) that often have canonical CDR3s in the immunoglobulin heavy chain that, owing to junctional biases during V(D)J recombination, appear much more frequently than predicted in naive B cell repertoires. Some public clonotypes are dependent on the gut microbiota and encode antibodies that are reactive to bacterial glycans, whereas others are independent of gut bacteria. Transfer of faeces from specific-pathogen-free mice to germ-free mice restored germ-dependent clonotypes, directly implicating BCR selection. We identified somatic hypermutations that were recurrently selected in such public clonotypes, indicating that affinity maturation occurs in mouse PP GCs under homeostatic conditions. Thus, persistent gut antigens select recurrent BCR clonotypes to seed chronic PP GC responses.

摘要: B细胞受体（BCR）和抗体的抗原结合可变区由外显子编码，该外显子通过V（D）J重组在发育中的B细胞中组装。由于在V（D）J基因片段的连接处产生多样性的机制，原代B细胞的BCR曲目非常丰富，这些片段有助于互补决定区域3（CDR3），即与抗原1结合的区域。通过体细胞超突变和生发中心（GCs）2,3中的细胞选择，原代B细胞经历抗原驱动的BCR亲和力成熟。尽管大多数GC是短暂的3，但依赖于肠道菌群的肠道Peyer's贴片（PPs）中的GC却是慢性的4，对其BCR组成或体细胞超突变的模式知之甚少。在这里，我们使用高通量分析方法来分析V（D）J片段的使用情况和体细胞超突变谱，我们阐明了小鼠PPGC中的生理BCR组成。来自不同小鼠的PPGC扩展了公共BCR克隆型（许多小鼠之间共享的克隆型），这些免疫球蛋白重链中经常具有规范的CDR3，由于V（D）J重组过程中的连接偏倚，其出现的频率比幼稚时预测的要频繁得多B细胞库。一些公共克隆型依赖于肠道菌群并编码对细菌聚糖具有反应性的抗体，而另一些则不依赖于肠道细菌。粪便从无特定病原体的小鼠转移到无菌小鼠中恢复了细菌依赖性克隆型，直接暗示了BCR选择。我们确定了在此类公共克隆型中反复选择的体细胞超突变，表明亲和力成熟在稳态条件下在小鼠PPGC中发生。因此，持久性肠道抗原选择复发性BCR克隆型来播种慢性PPGC反应。

Pubmed_ID: 32498714

Earth microbial co-occurrence network reveals interconnection pattern across microbiomes

地球微生物共生网络揭示了跨微生物群落的互连模式

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00857-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32498714/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/04/2020

Abstract: Background: Microbial interactions shape the structure and function of microbial communities; microbial co-occurrence networks in specific environments have been widely developed to explore these complex systems, but their interconnection pattern across microbiomes in various environments at the global scale remains unexplored. Here, we have inferred an Earth microbial co-occurrence network from a communal catalog with 23,595 samples and 12,646 exact sequence variants from 14 environments in the Earth Microbiome Project dataset. Results: This non-random scale-free Earth microbial co-occurrence network consisted of 8 taxonomy distinct modules linked with different environments, which featured environment specific microbial co-occurrence relationships. Different topological features of subnetworks inferred from datasets trimmed into uniform size indicate distinct co-occurrence patterns in the microbiomes of various environments. The high number of specialist edges highlights that environmental specific co-occurrence relationships are essential features across microbiomes. The microbiomes of various environments were clustered into two groups, which were mainly bridged by the microbiomes of plant and animal surface. Acidobacteria Gp2 and Nisaea were identified as hubs in most of subnetworks. Negative edges proportions ranged from 1.9% in the soil subnetwork to 48.9% the non-saline surface subnetwork, suggesting various environments experience distinct intensities of competition or niche differentiation. Video abstract CONCLUSION: This investigation highlights the interconnection patterns across microbiomes in various environments and emphasizes the importance of understanding co-occurrence feature of microbiomes from a network perspective.

摘要: 背景：微生物相互作用决定了微生物群落的结构和功能。特定环境中的微生物共生网络已得到广泛开发，以探索这些复杂的系统，但是在全球范围内，它们在各种环境中的微生物群落之间的互连模式尚未得到探索。在这里，我们从一个公共目录中推断出一个地球微生物共生网络，其中包含来自地球微生物组项目数据集中14个环境的23,595个样本和12,646个确切的序列变体。结果：这个非随机，无标度的地球微生物共生网络由与不同环境链接的8个分类学不同模块组成，这些模块具有特定于环境的微生物共生关系。从修剪成统一大小的数据集推断出的子网的不同拓扑特征表明，在各种环境的微生物群落中，不同的共现模式。专家优势的高数量表明，特定于环境的共现关系是整个微生物群落的基本特征。各种环境的微生物群被分为两组，主要是由植物和动物表面的微生物群桥接。在大多数子网络中，酸性细菌Gp2和Nisaea被确定为中心。负边缘比例范围从土壤子网中的1.9％到非盐表面子网中的48.9％，这表明各种环境经历的竞争或生态位分化强度不同。视频摘要结论：本研究突出了各种环境中微生物群落的互连模式，并强调了从网络角度了解微生物群落共现特征的重要性。

Pubmed_ID: 32498703

Mechanistic insights into the attenuation of intestinal inflammation and modulation of the gut microbiome by krill oil using in vitro and in vivo models

使用磷虾油使用体外和体内模型来减轻肠道炎症和调节肠道微生物组的机制的见解

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00843-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32498703/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/04/2020

Abstract: Background: The anti-inflammatory property of ω-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFA) has been exploited in the management of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) with promising results. However, it remains unclear if PUFA play a significant role in the resolution of inflammation and promotion of mucosal healing. Krill oil (KO) is a natural product rich in PUFA and the potent antioxidant, astaxanthin. In this study, we attempted to understand the mechanisms through which KO modulates the gut microbiome and metabolome using in vitro and in vivo colitis models and a multi-omics based approach. Results: KO significantly decreased LPS-induced IL1β and TNFα expression in human macrophages in vitro in a dose-dependent manner by regulating a broad spectrum of signaling pathways, including NF-κB and NOD-like receptor signaling, and displayed a synergistic effect with COX2 and IKK2 inhibitors in attenuating inflammatory pathways. Moreover, KO was involved in the resolution of inflammation by promoting M2 polarization and enhancing macrophage-mediated intracellular bacterial killing. Parasite-dependent intestinal mucosal damage and microbial dysbiosis induced by Trichuris suis infection in pigs were partially restored by feeding KO. KO supplementation reduced the abundance of Rickettsiales and several species of Lactobacillus, which were among the important features identified by random forests analysis contributing to classification accuracy for KO supplementation. Several microbial signatures with strong predictive power for the status of both infection and supplementation were identified. The inhibitory effect of KO on histidine metabolism was identified using untargeted metabolomics. KO supplementation reduced several key metabolites related to histamine metabolism by suppressing the expression of a gene encoding L-histidine decarboxylase in the colon mucosa and reducing histamine biosynthesis of microbial origin. Moreover, the pro-resolving properties of KO were validated using a Citrobacter rodentium-induced Th1-dependent colitis murine model. Further, microbial signatures with high prediction accuracy for colitis-related pathophysiological traits were identified in mice. Conclusion: The findings from this study provided a mechanistic basis for optimizing microbiome-inspired alternative therapeutics in the management of IBD. The microbial signatures identified, particularly those with strong predictive accuracy for colitis phenotypes, will facilitate the development of biomarkers associated with appropriate dietary intervention to manage intestinal inflammation. Video abstract.

摘要: 背景：ω-3多不饱和脂肪酸（PUFA）的抗炎特性已在炎症性肠病（IBD）的治疗中得到了广泛应用。但是，尚不清楚PUFA是否在消炎和促进粘膜愈合中起重要作用。磷虾油（KO）是富含PUFA和有效的抗氧化剂虾青素的天然产物。在这项研究中，我们试图了解使用体外和体内结肠炎模型以及基于多组学的方法，KO调节肠道微生物组和代谢组的机制。结果：KO通过调节广谱的信号通路，包括NF-κB和NOD样受体信号转导，以剂量依赖的方式显着降低了LPS诱导的人巨噬细胞中IL1β和TNFα的表达，并显示出与COX2的协同作用和IKK2抑制剂可减轻炎症途径。而且，KO通过促进M2极化和增强巨噬细胞介导的细胞内细菌杀伤而参与炎症的解决。通过喂猪KO可以部分恢复猪Tritricrissuis感染引起的寄生虫依赖性肠粘膜损伤和微生物营养不良。KO补充减少了立克次氏体和几种乳酸杆菌的丰度，这是通过随机森林分析确定的重要特征之一，有助于提高KO补充的分类准确性。鉴定了几种对感染和补充状态具有强大预测能力的微生物特征。使用非靶向代谢组学确定了KO对组氨酸代谢的抑制作用。KO补充通过抑制结肠粘膜中编码L-组氨酸脱羧酶的基因的表达并减少微生物来源的组胺生物合成，减少了与组胺代谢有关的几种关键代谢物。此外，KO的亲解析属性已使用柠檬酸杆菌诱导的Th1依赖性结肠炎鼠模型进行了验证。此外，在小鼠中鉴定出对结肠炎相关病理生理特征具有高预测准确性的微生物特征。结论：这项研究的发现为IBD治疗中优化微生物学启发的替代疗法提供了机械基础。鉴定出的微生物特征，尤其是对结肠炎表型具有很强预测准确性的微生物特征，将促进与适当饮食干预以控制肠道炎症相关的生物标志物的发展。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32493511

Engineering CRISPR/Cas9 to mitigate abundant host contamination for 16S rRNA gene-based amplicon sequencing

工程CRISPR / Cas9为基于16S rRNA基因的扩增子测序减轻大量宿主污染

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00859-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32493511/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/03/2020

Abstract: Background: High-throughput sequencing of bacterial 16S rRNA gene (16S-seq) is a useful and common method for studying bacterial community structures. However, contamination of the 16S rRNA genes from the mitochondrion and plastid hinders the sensitive bacterial 16S-seq in plant microbiota profiling, especially for some plant species such as rice. To date, efficiently mitigating such host contamination without a bias is challenging in 16S rRNA gene-based amplicon sequencing. Results: We developed Cas-16S-seq method to reduce abundant host contamination for plant microbiota profiling. This method utilizes the Cas9 nuclease and specific guide RNA (gRNA) to cut 16S rRNA targets during library construction, thereby removing host contamination in 16S-seq. We used rice as an example to validate the feasibility and effectiveness of Cas-16S-seq. We established a bioinformatics pipeline to design gRNAs that specifically target rice 16S rRNA genes without bacterial 16S rRNA off-targets. We compared the effectiveness of Cas-16S-seq with that of the commonly used 16S-seq method for artificially mixed 16S rRNA gene communities, paddy soil, rice root, and phyllosphere samples. The results showed that Cas-16S-seq substantially reduces the fraction of rice 16S rRNA gene sequences from 63.2 to 2.9% in root samples and from 99.4 to 11.6% in phyllosphere samples on average. Consequently, Cas-16S-seq detected more bacterial species than the 16S-seq in plant samples. Importantly, when analyzing soil samples, Cas-16S-seq and 16S-seq showed almost identical bacterial communities, suggesting that Cas-16S-seq with host-specific gRNAs that we designed has no off-target in rice microbiota profiling. Conclusion: Our Cas-16S-seq can efficiently remove abundant host contamination without a bias for 16S rRNA gene-based amplicon sequencing, thereby enabling deeper bacterial community profiling with a low cost and high flexibility. Thus, we anticipate that this method would be a useful tool for plant microbiomics. Video Abstract.

摘要: 背景：细菌16SrRNA基因（16S-seq）的高通量测序是研究细菌群落结构的有用且常用的方法。但是，线粒体和质体中16SrRNA基因的污染阻碍了植物微生物区系分析中细菌16S-seq的敏感性，特别是对于某些植物物种，例如水稻。迄今为止，在基于16SrRNA基因的扩增子测序中，有效地减轻宿主宿主污染而无偏倚是一项挑战。结果：我们开发了Cas-16S-seq方法，以减少植物微生物群分析中大量宿主污染。此方法利用Cas9核酸酶和特定的指导RNA（gRNA）在文库构建过程中切割16SrRNA靶标，从而消除了16S-seq中的宿主污染。我们以大米为例，验证了Cas-16S-seq的可行性和有效性。我们建立了一条生物信息学流水线，以设计专门针对水稻16SrRNA基因的gRNA，而不会使细菌16SrRNA脱靶。我们比较了Cas-16S-seq与通常使用的16S-seq方法对人工混合的16SrRNA基因群落，水稻土，水稻根系和叶球样品的有效性。结果表明，Cas-16S-seq显着降低了水稻16SrRNA基因序列在根样品中的比例，从63.2％降低到2.9％，在叶球样品中平均从99.4％降低到11.6％。因此，Cas-16S-seq在植物样品中检测到的细菌种类比16S-seq多。重要的是，在分析土壤样品时，Cas-16S-seq和16S-seq显示几乎相同的细菌群落，这表明我们设计的带有宿主特异性gRNA的Cas-16S-seq在水稻微生物群谱分析中没有目标。结论：我们的Cas-16S-seq可以有效去除大量宿主污染，而不会偏向基于16SrRNA基因的扩增子测序，从而以低成本和高灵活性实现更深的细菌群落图谱分析。因此，我们预期该方法将是用于植物微生物学的有用工具。录像摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32492369

Functional and Genomic Variation between Human-Derived Isolates of Lachnospiraceae Reveals Inter- and Intra-Species Diversity

人鞭毛科分离株之间的功能和基因组变异揭示了物种间和物种内的多样性。

DOI: 10.1016/j.chom.2020.05.005

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32492369/

Journal: Cell host & microbe {'ISSN': '1931-3128', 'Name': 'cell host & microbe', '2015': '12.552', '2016': '14.946', '2017': '17.872', '2018': '15.753', '2019': '15.923'}

Date: 07/08/2020

Abstract: Bacteria belonging to the Lachnospiraceae family are abundant, obligate anaerobic members of the microbiota in healthy humans. Lachnospiraceae impact their hosts by producing short-chain fatty acids, converting primary to secondary bile acids, and facilitating colonization resistance against intestinal pathogens. To increase our understanding of genomic and functional diversity between members of this family, we cultured 273 Lachnospiraceae isolates representing 11 genera and 27 species from human donors and performed whole-genome sequencing assembly and annotation. This analysis revealed substantial inter- and intra-species diversity in pathways that likely influence an isolate's ability to impact host health. These differences are likely to impact colonization resistance through lantibiotic expression or intestinal acidification, influence host mucosal immune cells and enterocytes via butyrate production, or contribute to synergism within a consortium by heterogenous polysaccharide metabolism. Identification of these specific functions could facilitate development of probiotic bacterial consortia that drive and/or restore in vivo microbiome functions.

摘要: 属于钩端螺旋体科的细菌是健康人中微生物群落中丰富的专性厌氧成员。漆螺科通过产生短链脂肪酸，将伯胆汁酸转化为仲胆汁酸并促进对肠道病原体的定植抗性而影响宿主。为了增进我们对该家族成员之间基因组和功能多样性的了解，我们培养了来自人类供体的代表11个属和27个种的273钩毛藻科分离株，并进行了全基因组测序组装和注释。这项分析表明，物种间和物种间的途径存在很大差异，这很可能影响分离株影响寄主健康的能力。这些差异可能通过羊毛硫抗生素表达或肠道酸化影响定居抗性，通过丁酸产生影响宿主粘膜免疫细胞和肠上皮细胞，或通过异质多糖代谢促进财团内部的协同作用。这些特定功能的鉴定可以促进益生菌菌群的发展，所述益生菌菌群驱动和/或恢复体内微生物组功能。

Pubmed_ID: 32490353

Putative modulation of the gut microbiome by probiotics enhances preference for novelty in a preliminary double-blind placebo-controlled study in ferrets

益生菌对肠道微生物组的可能调节作用增强了对雪貂的双盲安慰剂对照研究的新颖性

DOI: 10.1186/s42523-020-00030-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32490353/

Journal: Animal microbiome ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020

Abstract: Background: Increasing evidence suggests a causal relationship between the gut microbiome and psychiatric illnesses. In particular, autism spectrum disorder is associated with gastrointestinal symptoms and alterations in the gut microbiome. Administration of probiotics is a commonly used strategy by caregivers of people with neurodevelopmental illness. However, evidence for successful improvement in gut microbiome and (behavioral) symptoms has been lacking. Results: Here, we use a novel ferret model of maternal immune activation to show that high-dose probiotic administration in a placebo-controlled study design causes changes in the gut microbiome in the form of a transient increase in the administered bacterial species. In contrast, we found no differences in baseline microbiome composition or changes induced by probiotic administration between animals exposed in utero to maternal immune activation and control animals. However, the relative presence of several bacterial species correlated with an increased preference for novelty (object and conspecific). Intriguingly, several of the hits in this screen are species that have previously emerged in the literature as being associated with autism and anxiety. Conclusions: Together, our results suggest that high-dose probiotic interventions may be beneficial for the adjunct treatment of psychiatric illnesses. Placebo-controlled clinical trials in humans are urgently needed.

摘要: 背景：越来越多的证据表明肠道微生物组与精神疾病之间存在因果关系。特别地，自闭症谱系障碍与胃肠道症状和肠道微生物组改变有关。益生菌的给药是神经发育疾病患者的照料者的常用策略。但是，缺乏成功改善肠道微生物组和（行为）症状的证据。结果：在这里，我们使用了一种新的母源性免疫激活的雪貂模型，表明在安慰剂对照研究设计中高剂量益生菌的施用会导致肠道微生物组的改变，其形式是所施用细菌种类的短暂增加。相反，我们发现在子宫内暴露于母体免疫激活的动物与对照动物之间，基线微生物组组成没有差异，也没有发现益生菌引起的变化。但是，几种细菌种类的相对存在与对新颖性（客体和同种物种）的偏好增加有关。有趣的是，该屏幕上的几本热门新闻都是以前在文献中出现的与自闭症和焦虑症相关的物种。结论：总之，我们的结果表明，大剂量益生菌干预措施可能有益于精神疾病的辅助治疗。迫切需要在人体中进行安慰剂对照的临床试验。

Pubmed_ID: 32488167

Ecological succession in the vaginal microbiota during pregnancy and birth

妊娠和分娩期间阴道菌群的生态演替

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-020-0686-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32488167/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: The mother's vaginal microbiota represents the first microbes to which a child is exposed when delivered vaginally. However, little is known about the composition and development of the vaginal microbiota during pregnancy and birth. Here, we analyzed the vaginal microbiota of 57 women in pregnancy week 24, 36 and at birth after rupture of membranes but before delivery, and further compared the composition with that of the gut and airways of the 1-week-old child. The vaginal community structure had dramatic changes in bacterial diversity and taxonomic distribution, yet carried an individual-specific signature. The relative abundance of most bacterial taxa increased stepwise from week 24 of pregnancy until birth, with a gradual decline of Lactobacillus. Mother-to-child vertical transfer, as suggested by sharing, was modest, with the strongest transfer being for Clostridiales followed by Lactobacillales and Enterobacteriales. In conclusion, late gestation is associated with an increase in maternal vaginal microbiota diversity, and vaginal bacteria at birth only modestly predict the composition of the neonatal microbiota.

摘要: 母亲的阴道微生物群代表了孩子通过阴道分娩时所接触的第一个微生物。然而，对于怀孕和分娩期间阴道微生物群的组成和发育知之甚少。在这里，我们分析了57名妇女在怀孕第24、36周以及胎膜破裂后但在分娩前出生时的阴道微生物群，并进一步与1周龄儿童的肠道和气道成分进行了比较。阴道群落结构在细菌多样性和分类学分布方面发生了巨大变化，但具有个体特异性特征。从怀孕的第24周到出生，大多数细菌类群的相对丰度逐步增加，而乳酸杆菌逐渐减少。共享建议，母婴垂直转移适度，梭状芽孢杆菌，乳杆菌和肠杆菌的转移最强。总之，妊娠后期与孕产妇阴道微生物群多样性的增加有关，出生时的阴道细菌只能适度地预测新生儿微生物群的组成。

Pubmed_ID: 32487762

Alterations in Vaginal Microbiota and Associated Metabolome in Women with Recurrent Implantation Failure

反复植入失败妇女的阴道菌群和相关代谢组的改变

DOI: 10.1128/mBio.03242-19

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32487762/

Journal: mBio {'ISSN': '2150-7511', 'Name': 'mbio', '2015': '6.975', '2016': '6.956', '2017': '6.689', '2018': '6.747', '2019': '6.784'}

Date: 06/02/2020

Abstract: Recurrent implantation failure (RIF) refers to repeated failure to become pregnant after transferring embryos with normal morphology. However, the pathogenesis of RIF remains unrevealed, especially for those without any pathological features. In this study, we characterized the vaginal microbiota and metabolomes of patients with unexplained RIF, while patients who achieved clinical pregnancy in the first frozen embryo transfer (FET) cycle were used as controls. Based on 16S rRNA gene sequencing of the vaginal microbiota, the vaginal Lactobacillus showed a significant positive correlation with the pregnancy rate, and the RIF group presented higher microbial α-diversity than the control group (P value = 0.016). The metabolomic profile identified 2,507 metabolites, of which 37 were significantly different between the two groups (P value < 0.05, variable importance for the projection [VIP] > 1). Among them, 2',3-cyclic UMP and inositol phosphate were the top two metabolites that were higher in the RIF group, while glycerophospholipids and benzopyran were important metabolites that were lower in the RIF group. A lack of lysobisphosphatidic acid and prostaglandin metabolized from glycerophospholipids will lead to deferred implantation and embryo crowding. Benzopyran, as a selective estrogen receptor modulator, may affect the outcome of pregnancy. All of the changes in metabolite profiles may result in or from the differential microbiota compositions in RIF patients. In conclusion, significant differences were presented in the vaginal microbiota and metabolomes between patients with unexplained RIF and women who became pregnant in the first FET cycle. For the first time, this study elaborates the possible pathogenesis of RIF by investigating the vaginal microbiota and metabolites in RIF patients.IMPORTANCE In vitro fertilization-embryo transfer (IVF-ET) is now widely applied for treating infertility, and unexplained recurrent implantation failure (RIF) has become a substantial challenge. We hypothesize that vaginal microbial dysbiosis is associated with RIF, as it is linked to many female reproductive diseases. In this study, we characterized the vaginal microbiota and metabolomes of patients with unexplained RIF, while patients who achieved clinical pregnancy in the first IVF cycle were set as controls. In general, significant differences were discovered in the vaginal microbiota and metabolomes between the two groups. This study is the first detailed elaboration of the vaginal microbiota and metabolites associated with RIF. We believe that our findings will inspire researchers to consider the dynamics of microbiomes related to the microenvironment as a critical feature for future studies of nosogenesis not only for RIF but also for other reproductive diseases.

摘要: 反复植入失败（RIF）是指在转移具有正常形态的胚胎后反复无法怀孕。但是，RIF的发病机制仍然没有发现，特别是对于那些没有任何病理特征的人。在这项研究中，我们表征了无法解释的RIF患者的阴道微生物群和代谢组，而在第一个冷冻胚胎移植（FET）周期中获得临床妊娠的患者被用作对照。根据阴道菌群的16SrRNA基因测序，阴道乳酸杆菌与妊娠率呈显着正相关，RIF组的微生物α多样性高于对照组（P值=0.016）。代谢组学特征确定了2,507种代谢物，其中两组之间有37种显着不同（P值<0.05，预测的重要程度[VIP]>1）。其中，2'，3-环UMP和肌醇磷酸酯是RIF组中较高的两个代谢产物，而甘油磷脂和苯并吡喃是RIF组中较低的重要代谢产物。缺乏从甘油磷脂代谢的溶血双磷脂酸和前列腺素会导致推迟植入和胚胎拥挤。苯并吡喃作为选择性雌激素受体调节剂，可能会影响妊娠结局。RIF患者体内代谢物谱的所有变化都可能导致微生物群组成的差异或由微生物群组成的差异引起。总之，在无法解释的RIF患者和在第一个FET周期中怀孕的妇女之间，阴道微生物群和代谢组存在显着差异。这项研究首次通过研究RIF患者的阴道微生物群和代谢产物来阐明RIF的可能发病机理。重要提示体外受精-胚胎移植（IVF-ET）现在被广泛用于治疗不育症和无法解释的复发性植入失败（RIF）已成为一项重大挑战。我们假设阴道微生物营养不良与RIF有关，因为它与许多女性生殖疾病有关。在这项研究中，我们表征了无法解释的RIF患者的阴道微生物群和代谢组，同时将在第一个IVF周期中获得临床妊娠的患者作为对照。通常，两组之间的阴道微生物群和代谢组之间存在显着差异。这项研究是首次详细阐述与RIF相关的阴道微生物群和代谢产物。我们相信，我们的发现将激发研究人员将与微环境有关的微生物组的动力学视为未来研究致死现象的重要特征，不仅针对RIF，而且针对其他生殖疾病。

Pubmed_ID: 32483373

C9orf72 suppresses systemic and neural inflammation induced by gut bacteria

C9orf72抑制肠道细菌引起的全身和神经炎症

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2288-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32483373/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: A hexanucleotide-repeat expansion in C9ORF72 is the most common genetic variant that contributes to amyotrophic lateral sclerosis and frontotemporal dementia1,2. The C9ORF72 mutation acts through gain- and loss-of-function mechanisms to induce pathways that are implicated in neural degeneration3-9. The expansion is transcribed into a long repetitive RNA, which negatively sequesters RNA-binding proteins5 before its non-canonical translation into neural-toxic dipeptide proteins3,4. The failure of RNA polymerase to read through the mutation also reduces the abundance of the endogenous C9ORF72 gene product, which functions in endolysosomal pathways and suppresses systemic and neural inflammation6-9. Notably, the effects of the repeat expansion act with incomplete penetrance in families with a high prevalence of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis or frontotemporal dementia, indicating that either genetic or environmental factors modify the risk of disease for each individual. Identifying disease modifiers is of considerable translational interest, as it could suggest strategies to diminish the risk of developing amyotrophic lateral sclerosis or frontotemporal dementia, or to slow progression. Here we report that an environment with reduced abundance of immune-stimulating bacteria10,11 protects C9orf72-mutant mice from premature mortality and significantly ameliorates their underlying systemic inflammation and autoimmunity. Consistent with C9orf72 functioning to prevent microbiota from inducing a pathological inflammatory response, we found that reducing the microbial burden in mutant mice with broad spectrum antibiotics-as well as transplanting gut microflora from a protective environment-attenuated inflammatory phenotypes, even after their onset. Our studies provide further evidence that the microbial composition of our gut has an important role in brain health and can interact in surprising ways with well-known genetic risk factors for disorders of the nervous system.

摘要: C9ORF72中的六核苷酸重复扩增是导致肌萎缩性侧索硬化和额颞叶痴呆症1,2的最常见遗传变异。C9ORF72突变通过功能获得和丧失的功能起作用，以诱导与神经退行性病变有关的通路3-9。扩增被转录成一个长的重复RNA，在非规范翻译为神经毒性二肽蛋白3之前，它会负面隔离RNA结合蛋白5。RNA聚合酶无法读取突变也降低了内源C9ORF72基因产物的丰度，该产物在溶酶体途径中起作用并抑制全身和神经炎症6-9。值得注意的是，在肌萎缩性侧索硬化或额颞痴呆患病率较高的家庭中，重复扩展的作用表现出不完全的外显性，表明遗传因素或环境因素都会改变每个人的疾病风险。识别疾病修饰剂具有相当大的转化意义，因为它可以建议降低患肌萎缩性侧索硬化或额颞痴呆或减缓进展风险的策略。在这里，我们报告说，免疫刺激细菌数量减少的环境10,11可保护C9orf72突变小鼠免于过早死亡，并显着改善其潜在的全身性炎症和自身免疫性。与C9orf72发挥功能以防止微生物群引起病理性炎症反应相一致，我们发现减少了广谱抗生素突变小鼠的微生物负担，并从保护性环境减弱的炎症表型移植了肠道菌群，即使它们发作后也是如此。我们的研究提供了进一步的证据，证明我们肠道的微生物成分在大脑健康中具有重要作用，并且可以与神经系统疾病的众所周知的遗传危险因素以令人惊讶的方式相互作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32483147

Analysis of immune, microbiota and metabolome maturation in infants in a clinical trial of Lactobacillus paracasei CBA L74-fermented formula

副干酪乳杆菌CBA L74发酵配方食品的临床试验分析婴儿的免疫，微生物和代谢组成熟

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16582-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32483147/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 06/01/2020

Abstract: Mother's milk is the best choice for infants nutrition, however when it is not available or insufficient to satisfy the needs of the infant, formula is proposed as an effective substitute. Here, we report the results of a randomized controlled clinical trial (NCT03637894) designed to evaluate the effects of two different dietary regimens (standard formula and Lactobacillus paracasei CBA L74-fermented formula) versus breastfeeding (reference group) on immune defense mechanisms (primary endpoint: secretory IgA, antimicrobial peptides), the microbiota and its metabolome (secondary outcomes), in healthy full term infants according to the type of delivery (n = 13/group). We show that the fermented formula, safe and well tolerated, induces an increase in secretory IgA (but not in antimicrobial peptides) and reduces the diversity of the microbiota, similarly, but not as much as, breastmilk. Metabolome analysis allowed us to distinguish subjects based on their dietary regimen and mode of delivery. Together, these results suggest that a fermented formula favors the maturation of the immune system, microbiota and metabolome.

摘要: 母乳是婴儿营养的最佳选择，但是，当无法获得或不足以满足婴儿需求时，建议将其作为一种有效的替代品。在这里，我们报告了一项随机对照临床试验（NCT03637894）的结果，该试验旨在评估两种不同饮食方案（标准配方和副干酪乳杆菌CBAL74发酵配方）与母乳喂养（参考组）对免疫防御机制（主要终点）的影响：根据分娩类型（n=13/组），在健康的足月婴儿中分泌型IgA，抗菌肽），微生物群及其代谢组（继发结局）。我们显示，安全且耐受性良好的发酵配方可诱导分泌型IgA的增加（但不能抑制抗菌肽），并降低了微生物群的多样性，这与母乳相似，但幅度不大。代谢组学分析使我们能够根据其饮食习惯和分娩方式来区分受试者。总之，这些结果表明，发酵配方有助于免疫系统，微生物群和代谢组的成熟。

Pubmed_ID: 32482859

A multiomic analysis of in situ coral-turf algal interactions

珊瑚草皮藻相互作用的多组学分析

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1915455117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32482859/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 06/16/2020

Abstract: Viruses, microbes, and host macroorganisms form ecological units called holobionts. Here, a combination of metagenomic sequencing, metabolomic profiling, and epifluorescence microscopy was used to investigate how the different components of the holobiont including bacteria, viruses, and their associated metabolites mediate ecological interactions between corals and turf algae. The data demonstrate that there was a microbial assemblage unique to the coral-turf algae interface displaying higher microbial abundances and larger microbial cells. This was consistent with previous studies showing that turf algae exudates feed interface and coral-associated microbial communities, often at the detriment of the coral. Further supporting this hypothesis, when the metabolites were assigned a nominal oxidation state of carbon (NOSC), we found that the turf algal metabolites were significantly more reduced (i.e., have higher potential energy) compared to the corals and interfaces. The algae feeding hypothesis was further supported when the ecological outcomes of interactions (e.g., whether coral was winning or losing) were considered. For example, coral holobionts losing the competition with turf algae had higher Bacteroidetes-to-Firmicutes ratios and an elevated abundance of genes involved in bacterial growth and division. These changes were similar to trends observed in the obese human gut microbiome, where overfeeding of the microbiome creates a dysbiosis detrimental to the long-term health of the metazoan host. Together these results show that there are specific biogeochemical changes at coral-turf algal interfaces that predict the competitive outcomes between holobionts and are consistent with algal exudates feeding coral-associated microbes.

摘要: 病毒，微生物和宿主大微生物形成称为全生命周期的生态单位。在这里，结合了宏基因组测序，代谢组学谱分析和落射荧光显微镜技术，研究了全卤虫的不同成分（包括细菌，病毒及其相关代谢产物）如何介导珊瑚与草皮藻类之间的生态相互作用。数据表明，珊瑚草海藻界面存在独特的微生物组合，显示出更高的微生物丰度和更大的微生物细胞。这与以前的研究一致，后者表明草皮藻类会渗入饲料界面和与珊瑚有关的微生物群落，这经常损害珊瑚。进一步支持该假设的是，当将代谢物指定为碳的名义氧化态（NOSC）时，我们发现，与珊瑚和界面相比，草皮藻类代谢物的还原度大大降低（即具有更高的势能）。当考虑到相互作用的生态结果（例如，珊瑚是赢还是输）时，进一步支持了藻类摄食假说。例如，失去与草皮藻类竞争的珊瑚类生物的拟杆菌与拟杆菌比例更高，并且涉及细菌生长和分裂的基因丰度更高。这些变化与在肥胖的人类肠道微生物组中观察到的趋势相似，微生物组的过量喂养会造成对后生动物宿主长期健康有害的营养不良。这些结果加在一起表明，珊瑚草皮-藻类界面处发生了特定的生物地球化学变化，这些变化预测了嗜盐菌之间的竞争结果，并且与喂食与珊瑚相关的微生物的藻类渗出物一致。

Pubmed_ID: 32482169

Novel insights into the Thaumarchaeota in the deepest oceans: their metabolism and potential adaptation mechanisms

对最深海的Thaumarchaeota的新颖见解：它们的新陈代谢和潜在的适应机制

DOI: 10.1186/s40168-020-00849-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32482169/

Journal: Microbiome {'ISSN': '2049-2618', 'Name': 'microbiome', '2015': '9', '2016': '9.133', '2017': '9.133', '2018': '10.465', '2019': '11.607'}

Date: 06/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Marine Group I (MGI) Thaumarchaeota, which play key roles in the global biogeochemical cycling of nitrogen and carbon (ammonia oxidizers), thrive in the aphotic deep sea with massive populations.
