摘要: 硝化微生物在4至84°C的宽温度范围内发生，以前在地热系统中的研究表明它们在极端条件下具有活性。已检测到古细菌负责硝化的第一步，但要弄清耐热亚硝酸盐氧化剂的身份仍然是一个具有挑战性的问题。在长期的耕作方法中，我们在美国黄石国家公园的两个温泉中接种了以铵盐和亚硝酸盐为底物的矿物质培养基，并覆盖了两个温泉的生物膜和沉积物。如宏基因组测序所揭示的，在70°C下获得的硝化联合体主要由新的Chloroflexi组成。其中，由于亚硝酸盐氧化还原酶编码基因组中存在亚硝酸盐氧化还原酶编码基因，因此将其两种深分支的新型叶绿藻（Cloroflexi）鉴定为推定的亚硝酸盐氧化细菌（NOB）。亚硝酸盐在自养营养条件下发生化学计量氧化为硝酸盐，但受到有机物的刺激。两种NOB候选物都可以长期饿死，并且其中一种更为丰富，可以形成小型细胞，并且具有耐热性。对新型嗜热NOB的检测证明了我们对硝化作用的知识还不完全，并表明亚硝酸盐氧化可能是古老且广泛使用的节能形式。

Pubmed_ID: 31611653

Global ecotypes in the ubiquitous marine clade SAR86

普遍存在的海洋进化枝SAR86中的全球生态型

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-019-0516-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31611653/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: SAR86 is an abundant and ubiquitous heterotroph in the surface ocean that plays a central role in the function of marine ecosystems. We hypothesized that despite its ubiquity, different SAR86 subgroups may be endemic to specific ocean regions and functionally specialized for unique marine environments. However, the global biogeographical distributions of SAR86 genes, and the manner in which these distributions correlate with marine environments, have not been investigated. We quantified SAR86 gene content across globally distributed metagenomic samples and modeled these gene distributions as a function of 51 environmental variables. We identified five distinct clusters of genes within the SAR86 pangenome, each with a unique geographic distribution associated with specific environmental characteristics. Gene clusters are characterized by the strong taxonomic enrichment of distinct SAR86 genomes and partial assemblies, as well as differential enrichment of certain functional groups, suggesting differing functional and ecological roles of SAR86 ecotypes. We then leveraged our models and high-resolution, remote sensing-derived environmental data to predict the distributions of SAR86 gene clusters across the world's oceans, creating global maps of SAR86 ecotype distributions. Our results reveal that SAR86 exhibits previously unknown, complex biogeography, and provide a framework for exploring geographic distributions of genetic diversity from other microbial clades.

摘要: SAR86是表层海洋中大量存在的异养生物，在海洋生态系统的功能中起着核心作用。我们假设，尽管它无处不在，但不同的SAR86子群可能是特定海洋区域特有的，并且在功能上专门针对独特的海洋环境。但是，尚未研究SAR86基因的全球生物地理分布以及这些分布与海洋环境的关联方式。我们量化了全球分布的宏基因组样本中的SAR86基因含量，并根据51个环境变量对这些基因分布进行了建模。我们在SAR86全景基因组中鉴定了五个不同的基因簇，每个簇具有与特定环境特征相关的独特地理分布。基因簇的特征在于不同SAR86基因组和部分装配体的强大分类学富集，以及某些功能基团的差异富集，这表明SAR86生态型具有不同的功能和生态作用。然后，我们利用我们的模型和高分辨率的遥感环境数据来预测SAR86基因簇在全球海洋中的分布，从而绘制出SAR86生态型分布的全球地图。我们的研究结果表明，SAR86展现了以前未知的复杂生物地理环境，并为探索其他微生物进化枝的遗传多样性的地理分布提供了框架。

Pubmed_ID: 31611298

Scientific frontiers in faecal microbiota transplantation: joint document of Asia-Pacific Association of Gastroenterology (APAGE) and Asia-Pacific Society for Digestive Endoscopy (APSDE)

粪便微生物群移植的科学前沿：亚太胃肠病学协会（APAGE）和亚太消化内窥镜学会（APSDE）的联合文件

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-319407

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31611298/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: Objective: The underlying microbial basis, predictors of therapeutic outcome and active constituent(s) of faecal microbiota transplantation (FMT) mediating benefit remain unknown. An international panel of experts presented key elements that will shape forthcoming FMT research and practice. Design: Systematic search was performed, FMT literature was critically appraised and a 1-day round-table discussion was conducted to derive expert consensus on key issues in FMT research. Results: 16 experts convened and discussed five questions regarding (1) the role of donor and recipient microbial (bacteria, viruses, fungi) parameters in FMT; (2) methods to assess microbiota alterations; (3) concept of keystone species and microbial predictors of FMT, (4) influence of recipient profile and antibiotics pretreatment on FMT engraftment and maintenance and (5) new developments in FMT formulations and delivery. The panel considered that variable outcomes of FMT relate to compositional and functional differences in recipient's microbiota, and likely donor-associated and recipient-associated physiological and genetic factors. Taxonomic composition of donor intestinal microbiota may influence the efficacy of FMT in recurrent Clostridioides difficile infections and UC. FMT not only alters bacteria composition but also establishes trans-kingdom equilibrium between gut fungi, viruses and bacteria to promote the recovery of microbial homeostasis. FMT is not a one size fits all and studies are required to identify microbial components that have specific effects in patients with different diseases. Conclusion: FMT requires optimisation before their therapeutic promise can be evaluated for different diseases. This summary will guide future directions and priorities in advancement of the science and practice of FMT.

摘要: 目的：粪便微生物群移植（FMT）介导益处的潜在微生物基础，治疗效果的预测因素和有效成分仍然未知。一个国际专家小组介绍了将影响即将开展的FMT研究和实践的关键要素。设计：进行系统搜索，对FMT文献进行严格评估，并进行了为期1天的圆桌讨论，以就FMT研究中的关键问题达成专家共识。结果：16位专家召集并讨论了以下五个问题：（1）供体和受体微生物（细菌，病毒，真菌）参数在FMT中的作用；（2）评估微生物群变化的方法；（3）FMT的主要种类和微生物预测因子的概念，（4）受者概况和抗生素预处理对FMT植入和维持的影响，以及（5）FMT制剂和给药的新发展。专家组认为，FMT的可变结局与受体微生物群的组成和功能差异以及可能与供体相关和与受体相关的生理和遗传因素有关。供体肠道微生物群的生物分类组成可能会影响FMT在艰难梭菌感染和UC复发中的功效。FMT不仅改变细菌组成，而且在肠道真菌，病毒和细菌之间建立跨王国平衡，从而促进微生物体内平衡的恢复。FMT并非千篇一律，需要进行研究以鉴定对不同疾病患者具有特定作用的微生物成分。结论：需要对FMT进行优化，然后才能评估其对不同疾病的治疗前景。本摘要将指导FMT科学和实践的未来发展方向和重点。

Pubmed_ID: 31611297

Gut microbiota of obese subjects with Prader-Willi syndrome is linked to metabolic health

患有Prader-Willi综合征的肥胖受试者的肠道菌群与代谢健康有关

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-319322

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31611297/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: Objective: The gut microbiota has been implicated in the aetiology of obesity and associated comorbidities. Patients with Prader-Willi syndrome (PWS) are obese but partly protected against insulin resistance. We hypothesised that the gut microbiota of PWS patients differs from that of non-genetically obese controls and correlate to metabolic health. Therefore, here we used PWS as a model to study the role of gut microbiota in the prevention of metabolic complications linked to obesity. Design: We conducted a case-control study with 17 adult PWS patients and 17 obese subjects matched for body fat mass index, gender and age. The subjects were metabolically characterised and faecal microbiota was profiled by 16S ribosomal RNA gene sequencing. The patients' parents were used as a non-obese control group. Stool samples from two PWS patients and two obese controls were used for faecal microbiota transplantations in germ-free mice to examine the impact of the microbiota on glucose metabolism. Results: The composition of the faecal microbiota in patients with PWS differed from that of obese controls, and was characterised by higher phylogenetic diversity and increased abundance of several taxa such as Akkermansia, Desulfovibrio and Archaea, and decreased abundance of Dorea. Microbial taxa prevalent in the PWS microbiota were associated with markers of insulin sensitivity. Improved insulin resistance of PWS was partly transmitted by faecal microbiota transplantations into germ-free mice. Conclusion: The gut microbiota of PWS patients is similar to that of their non-obese parents and might play a role for the protection of PWS patients from metabolic complications.

摘要: 目的：肠道菌群与肥胖及相关合并症的病因有关。患有Prader-Willi综合征（PWS）的患者肥胖，但部分受到胰岛素抵抗的保护。我们假设PWS患者的肠道菌群不同于非遗传性肥胖对照者，并且与代谢健康相关。因此，在这里我们以PWS为模型研究肠道菌群在预防与肥胖有关的代谢并发症中的作用。设计：我们对17名成年PWS患者和17名肥胖受试者进行了病例对照研究，这些受试者的体脂指数，性别和年龄相匹配。对受试者进行代谢表征，并通过16S核糖体RNA基因测序分析粪便微生物群。患者的父母被用作非肥胖对照组。将来自两名PWS患者和两名肥胖对照的粪便样本用于无菌小鼠的粪便微生物群移植，以检查微生物群对葡萄糖代谢的影响。结果：PWS患者的粪便菌群组成与肥胖对照组不同，其特征是系统发育多样性更高，如Akkermansia，Desulfovibrio和Archaea等几种分类群的丰度增加，Dorea的丰度降低。PWS微生物群中普遍存在的微生物分类群与胰岛素敏感性标记物相关。粪便微生物群移植到无菌小鼠中后，PWS胰岛素抵抗的改善部分被传递。结论：PWS患者的肠道菌群与非肥胖父母的肠道菌群相似，可能在保护PWS患者免于代谢并发症方面发挥作用。

Pubmed_ID: 31601615

No distinct microbiome signature of irritable bowel syndrome found in a Swedish random population

在瑞典随机人群中未发现肠易激综合征的独特微生物组特征

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-318717

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31601615/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: Objective: The ethiopathogenesis of irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is unknown. While a link to the gut microbiome is postulated, the heterogeneity of the healthy gut makes it difficult to draw definitive conclusions. We aimed to describe the faecal and mucosa-associated microbiome (MAM) and health correlates on a community cohort of healthy and IBS individuals with no colonoscopic findings. Design: The PopCol study recruited a random sample of 3556 adults; 745 underwent colonoscopy. IBS was defined by Rome IV criteria and organic disease excluded. 16S rRNA gene sequencing was conducted on sigmoid biopsy samples from 376 representative individuals (63 IBS cases) and faecal samples from 185 individuals (32 IBS cases). Results: While sigmoid MAM was dominated by Lachnospiraceae, faeces presented a higher relative abundance of Ruminococcaceae. Microbial richness in MAM was linearly correlated to that in faeces from the same individual (R²=0.255, p<3E-11) as was diversity (R²=0.06, p=0.0022). MAM diversity decreased with increasing body mass index (BMI; Pearson's r=-0.1, p=0.08) and poorer self-rated health (r=-0.15, p=0.007), but no other health correlates. Faecal microbiome diversity was correlated to stool consistency (r=-0.16, p=0.043). Several taxonomic groups were correlated to age, BMI, depression and self-reported health, including Coprococcus catus associated with lower levels of depression (r=-0.003, p=0.00017). The degree of heterogeneity observed between IBS patients is higher than that observed between healthy individuals. Conclusions: No distinct microbial signature was observed in IBS. Individuals presenting with low self-rated health or high BMI have lower gut microbiome richness.

摘要: 目的：肠易激综合征（IBS）的致病性尚不清楚。虽然假定与肠道微生物组有关，但是健康肠道的异质性使得很难得出明确的结论。我们旨在描述没有结肠镜检查结果的健康和IBS个体的社区队列中的粪便和与黏膜相关的微生物组（MAM）和健康相关性。设计：PopCol研究随机抽取了3556名成年人作为样本；745接受了结肠镜检查。IBS由罗马IV标准定义，不包括器质性疾病。对来自376个代表性个体（63个IBS病例）和185个个体（32个IBS病例）的乙状结肠活检样品进行16SrRNA基因测序。结果：乙状结肠MAM主要由链霉菌科组成，粪便呈现出相对较高的瘤胃球菌科。MAM中微生物的丰富度与同一个人的粪便中的微生物丰富度（R²=0.255，p<3E-11）线性相关（R²=0.06，p=0.0022）。MAM多样性随体重指数（BMI;Pearson'sr=-0.1，p=0.08）和自评健康状况较差（r=-0.15，p=0.007）的增加而降低，但其他健康状况没有相关性。粪便微生物组多样性与粪便稠度相关（r=-0.16，p=0.043）。几个分类学组与年龄，BMI，抑郁症和自我报告的健康状况相关，包括与低水平抑郁症相关的协球菌（r=-0.003，p=0.00017）。IBS患者之间观察到的异质性程度高于健康个体之间观察到的异质性程度。结论：IBS中未观察到明显的微生物特征。自我评价低或BMI高的个体的肠道微生物组丰富度较低。

Pubmed_ID: 31595814

Diversification of host bile acids by members of the gut microbiota

肠道菌群成员使宿主胆汁酸多样化

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1674124

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31595814/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: Bile acid biotransformation is a collaborative effort by the host and the gut microbiome. Host hepatocytes synthesize primary bile acids from cholesterol. Once these host-derived primary bile acids enter the gastrointestinal tract, the gut microbiota chemically modify them into secondary bile acids. Interest into the gut-bile acid-host axis is expanding in diverse fields including gastroenterology, endocrinology, oncology, and infectious disease. This review aims to 1) describe the physiologic aspects of collaborative bile acid metabolism by the host and gut microbiota; 2) to evaluate how gut microbes influence bile acid pools, and in turn how bile acid pools modulate the gut microbial community structure; 3) to compare species differences in bile acid pools; and lastly, 4) discuss the effects of ursodeoxycholic acid (UDCA) administration, a common therapeutic bile acid, on the gut microbiota-bile acid-host axis.

摘要: 胆汁酸的生物转化是宿主和肠道微生物组的共同努力。宿主肝细胞由胆固醇合成胆汁酸。一旦这些宿主衍生的初级胆汁酸进入胃肠道，肠道菌群就将它们化学修饰成次级胆汁酸。对肠胆汁酸宿主轴的兴趣正在胃肠病学，内分泌学，肿瘤学和传染病等多个领域不断扩大。该综述旨在：1）描述宿主和肠道菌群协同胆汁酸代谢的生理方面；2）评估肠道微生物如何影响胆汁酸池，进而评估胆汁酸池如何调节肠道微生物群落结构；3）比较胆汁酸库中的物种差异；最后，4）讨论了熊去氧胆酸（UDCA）的给药（一种常见的治疗性胆汁酸）对肠道微生物-胆汁酸-宿主轴的影响。

Pubmed_ID: 31586932

Gut microbiota shape 'inflamm-ageing' cytokines and account for age-dependent decline in DNA damage repair

肠道菌群塑造“炎症衰老”细胞因子，并解释DNA损伤修复的年龄依赖性下降

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-318491

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31586932/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: Objective: Failing to properly repair damaged DNA drives the ageing process. Furthermore, age-related inflammation contributes to the manifestation of ageing. Recently, we demonstrated that the efficiency of repair of diethylnitrosamine (DEN)-induced double-strand breaks (DSBs) rapidly declines with age. We therefore hypothesised that with age, the decline in DNA damage repair stems from age-related inflammation. Design: We used DEN-induced DNA damage in mouse livers and compared the efficiency of their resolution in different ages and following various permutations aimed at manipulating the liver age-related inflammation. Results: We found that age-related deregulation of innate immunity was linked to altered gut microbiota. Consequently, antibiotic treatment, MyD88 ablation or germ-free mice had reduced cytokine expression and improved DSBs rejoining in 6-month-old mice. In contrast, feeding young mice with a high-fat diet enhanced inflammation and facilitated the decline in DSBs repair. This latter effect was reversed by antibiotic treatment. Kupffer cell replenishment or their inactivation with gadolinium chloride reduced proinflammatory cytokine expression and reversed the decline in DSBs repair. The addition of proinflammatory cytokines ablated DSBs rejoining mediated by macrophage-derived heparin-binding epidermal growth factor-like growth factor. Conclusions: Taken together, our results reveal a previously unrecognised link between commensal bacteria-induced inflammation that results in age-dependent decline in DNA damage repair. Importantly, the present study support the notion of a cell non-autonomous mechanism for age-related decline in DNA damage repair that is based on the presence of 'inflamm-ageing' cytokines in the tissue microenvironment, rather than an intrinsic cellular deficiency in the DNA repair machinery.

摘要: 目的：未能正确修复受损的DNA会导致衰老。此外，与年龄有关的炎症有助于衰老的表现。最近，我们证明了修复二乙基亚硝胺（DEN）诱导的双链断裂（DSBs）的效率随着年龄的增长而迅速下降。因此，我们假设随着年龄的增长，DNA损伤修复的下降源于与年龄有关的炎症。设计：我们使用了DEN诱导的小鼠肝脏DNA损伤，并比较了它们在不同年龄下以及为控制与肝脏年龄相关的炎症而进行的各种排列后的分辨效率。结果：我们发现与年龄有关的先天免疫失调与肠道菌群的改变有关。因此，抗生素治疗，MyD88消融或无菌小鼠在6个月大的小鼠中减少了细胞因子的表达并改善了DSB的重新结合。相反，用高脂饮食喂养年轻的小鼠会加剧炎症，并促进DSB修复的下降。后者的作用被抗生素治疗所逆转。枯否细胞补充或用氯化ado灭活会降低促炎细胞因子的表达并逆转DSB修复的下降。由巨噬细胞衍生的肝素结合表皮生长因子样生长因子介导的促炎细胞因子消融DSB的再结合。结论：综上所述，我们的研究结果揭示了共生细菌引起的炎症之间先前无法识别的联系，这种联系导致DNA损伤修复的年龄依赖性下降。重要的是，本研究支持一种与年龄相关的DNA损伤修复下降的细胞非自主机制的概念，该机制基于组织微环境中“炎症衰老”细胞因子的存在，而不是细胞内在的固有细胞缺陷。DNA修复机械。

Pubmed_ID: 31564204

Insights from pharmacokinetic models of host-microbiome drug metabolism

宿主微生物组药物代谢的药代动力学模型的见解

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1667724

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31564204/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 05/03/2020

Abstract: Increasing evidence suggests a role of the gut microbiota in patients' response to medicinal drugs. In our recent study, we combined genomics of human gut commensals and gnotobiotic animal experiments to quantify microbiota and host contributions to drug metabolism. Informed by experimental data, we built a physiology-based pharmacokinetic model of drug metabolism that includes intestinal compartments with microbiome drug-metabolizing activity. This model successfully predicted serum levels of metabolites of three different drugs, quantified microbial contribution to systemic drug metabolite exposure, and simulated the effect of different parameters on host and microbiota drug metabolism. In this addendum, we expand these simulations to assess the effect of microbiota on the systemic drug and metabolite levels under conditions of altered host physiology, microbiota drug-metabolizing activity or physico-chemical properties of drugs. This work illustrates how and under which circumstances the gut microbiome may influence drug pharmacokinetics, and discusses broader implications of expanded pharmacokinetic models.

摘要: 越来越多的证据表明肠道菌群在患者对药物反应中的作用。在我们最近的研究中，我们结合了人类肠道功能的基因组学和gnotobiotic动物实验，以量化微生物群和宿主对药物代谢的贡献。根据实验数据，我们建立了一种基于生理学的药物代谢药代动力学模型，该模型包括具有微生物组药物代谢活性的肠腔。该模型成功地预测了三种不同药物的血清代谢物水平，量化了微生物对全身性药物代谢物暴露的贡献，并模拟了不同参数对宿主和微生物群药物代谢的影响。在本附录中，我们扩展了这些模拟，以评估在改变的宿主生理，微生物群落药物代谢活性或药物的理化性质条件下，微生物群对全身药物和代谢产物水平的影响。这项工作说明了肠道微生物组如何以及在什么情况下会影响药物的药代动力学，并讨论了扩展的药代动力学模型的更广泛的含义。

Pubmed_ID: 31550982

The association between gut microbiota development and maturation of intestinal bile acid metabolism in the first 3 y of healthy Japanese infants

健康日本婴儿头3年肠道微生物群发育与肠道胆汁酸代谢成熟之间的关系

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1650997

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31550982/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: The gut microbial community greatly changes in early life, influencing infant health and subsequent host physiology, notably through its collective metabolism, including host-microbiota interplay of bile acid (BA) metabolism. However, little is known regarding how the development of the intestinal microbial community is associated with maturation of intestinal BA metabolism. To address this, we monitored the succession of gut bacterial community and its association with fecal BA profile in the first 3 y of ten healthy Japanese infants. The BA profiles were classified into four types, defined by high content of conjugated primary BA (Con type), unconjugated primary BA (chenodeoxycholic acid and cholic acid) (Pri type), ursodeoxycholic acid (Urs type), and deoxycholic and lithocholic acid (Sec type). Most subjects begun with Con type or Pri type profiles during lactation and eventually transited to Sec type through Urs type after the start of solid food intake. Con type and Pri type were associated with Enterobacteriaceae-dominant microbiota corresponding to the neonatal type or Bifidobacterium-dominant microbiota corresponding to lactation type, respectively. Urs type subjects were strongly associated with Ruminococcus gnavus colonization, mostly occurring between Pri type and Sec type. Sec type was associated with adult-type complex microbiota dominated by a variety of Firmicutes and Bacteroidetes species. Addressing the link of the common developmental passage of intestinal BA metabolism with infant's health and subsequent host physiology requires further study.

摘要: 肠道微生物群落在早期生命中发生了巨大变化，尤其是通过其集体代谢，包括宿主微生物与胆汁酸（BA）代谢的相互作用，影响了婴儿的健康状况以及随后的宿主生理。但是，关于肠道微生物群落的发展与肠道BA代谢成熟如何相关的了解甚少。为了解决这个问题，我们在10名健康的日本婴儿的前3年中监测了肠道细菌群落的继承及其与粪便BA谱的关联。BA配置文件分为四种类型，分别由高含量的共轭伯BA（Con型），未共轭伯BA（鹅去氧胆酸和胆酸）（Pri型），熊去氧胆酸（Urs型）以及脱氧胆酸和石胆酸（秒类型）。大多数受试者在哺乳期开始时表现为Con型或Pri型，最终在开始摄取固体食物后通过Urs型转变为Sec型。Con型和Pri型分别与对应于新生儿型的肠杆菌科优势菌群或对应于泌乳型的双歧杆菌型菌群有关。Urs型受试者与念珠菌球菌定植密切相关，主要发生在Pri型和Sec型之间。Sec类型与由各种Firmicutes和Bacteroidetes物种主导的成年型复杂微生物群相关。解决肠道BA代谢共同发育通道与婴儿健康和随后的宿主生理之间的联系需要进一步研究。

Pubmed_ID: 31530137

Additional Candida albicans administration enhances the severity of dextran sulfate solution induced colitis mouse model through leaky gut-enhanced systemic inflammation and gut-dysbiosis but attenuated by Lactobacillus rhamnosus L34

额外的白色念珠菌给药可通过漏泄的肠道增强的全身性炎症和肠道营养不良增加硫酸葡聚糖溶液诱导的结肠炎小鼠模型的严重性，但被鼠李糖乳杆菌减弱

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1662712

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31530137/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 05/03/2020

Abstract: is abundant in the human gut mycobiota but this species does not colonize the mouse gastrointestinal tract. C. albicans administration in dextran-sulfate solution (DSS) induced-colitis mouse model (DSS+Candida) might resemble more to human condition, therefore, a DSS colitis model with Candida administration was studied; first, to test the influence of fungi in DSS model and second, to test the efficacy of Lactobacillus rhamnosus L34. We demonstrated serum (1→3)-β-D-glucan (BG) elevation in patients with IBD and endoscopic moderate colitis in clinical remission, supporting the possible influence of gut fungi toward IBD in human. Then, in mouse model, Candida gavage was found to worsen the DSS model indicated by higher mortality rate, more severe colon histology and enhanced gut-leakage (FITC-dextran assay, endotoxemia, serum BG and blood bacterial burdens) but did not affect weight loss and diarrhea. DSS+Candida induced higher pro-inflammatory cytokines both in blood and in intestinal tissue. Worsened systemic pro-inflammatory cytokine responses in DSS+Candida compared with DSS alone was possibly due to the more severe translocation of LPS, BG and bacteria (not fungemia) from gut into systemic circulation. Interestingly, bacteremia from Pseudomonas aeruginosa was more frequently isolated from DSS+Candida than DSS alone. In parallel, P. aeruginosa was also isolated from fecal culture in most of the mice in DSS+Candida group supported by prominent Gammaproteobacteria in fecal microbioata analysis. However, L. rhamnosus L34 attenuated both DSS+Candida and DSS model through the attenuation of gut local inflammation (cytokines and histology), gut-leakage severity, fecal dysbiosis (culture method and microbiome analysis) and systemic inflammation (serum cytokines). In conclusion, gut Candida in DSS model induced fecal bacterial dysbiosis and enhanced leaky-gut induced bacteremia. Probiotic treatment strategy aiming to reduce gut-fungi and fecal dysbiosis could attenuate disease severity. Investigation on gut fungi in patients with IBD is highly interesting.

摘要: 在人的肠道菌群中含量很高，但是该物种不会在小鼠胃肠道中定殖。在硫酸葡聚糖溶液（DSS）诱导的结肠炎小鼠模型（DSS+Candida）中施用白色念珠菌可能与人的情况更相似，因此，研究了念珠菌给药的DSS结肠炎模型；首先，测试真菌对DSS模型的影响，其次，测试鼠李糖乳杆菌L34的功效。我们在临床缓解中证实了IBD和内镜中度结肠炎患者的血清（1→3）-β-D-葡聚糖（BG）升高，支持了肠道真菌对人中IBD的可能影响。然后，在小鼠模型中，发现念珠菌的管饲使死亡率增加，结肠组织学更加严重和肠道渗漏（FITC-葡聚糖测定，内毒素血症，血清BG和血液细菌负担）增加表明DSS模型恶化，但并未影响体重腹泻和腹泻。DSS+Candida诱导血液和肠组织中较高的促炎细胞因子。与单独的DSS相比，DSS+Candida中全身的促炎细胞因子反应更差，这可能是由于LPS，BG和细菌（不是真菌病）从肠道更严重地转移到全身循环中所致。有趣的是，铜绿假单胞菌的菌血症比单独的DSS更频繁地从DSS+Candida中分离出来。同时，在粪便微生物群分析中，在突出的γ-变形杆菌支持下，DSS+Candida组的大多数小鼠的粪便培养物中也分离出铜绿假单胞菌。然而，鼠李糖乳杆菌L34通过肠局部炎症（细胞因子和组织学），肠渗漏严重性，粪便病态（培养方法和微生物组分析）和全身性炎症（血清细胞因子）的减弱而减弱了DSS+Candida和DSS模型。总之，DSS模型中的肠道念珠菌可引起粪便细菌性营养不良，并增强漏肠导致的菌血症。旨在减少肠道真菌和粪便营养不良的益生菌治疗策略可以减轻疾病的严重程度。对IBD患者的肠道真菌进行研究非常有趣。

Pubmed_ID: 31530087

Analysis of gut microbiome, nutrition and immune status in autism spectrum disorder: a case-control study in Ecuador

自闭症谱系障碍者肠道微生物组，营养和免疫状况分析：厄瓜多尔病例对照研究

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1662260

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31530087/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 05/03/2020

Abstract: Most studies on autism spectrum disorder (ASD) risk factors have been conducted in developed countries where ethnicity and environment are different than in developing countries. We compared nutritional status, immune response and microbiota composition in mestizo children with ASD with matched controls in Ecuador. Twenty-five cases and 35 controls were matched by age, sex and school location. The prevalence of under- and overweight was higher in children with ASD. Nutritional differences were accompanied by abnormal food habits and more frequent gastrointestinal symptoms in children with ASD. Also, greater serum concentrations of TGF-β1 were observed in children with ASD. Finally, there was greater alpha diversity and abundance of Bacteroides (2 OTUs), Akkermansia, Coprococcus and different species of Ruminococcus in ASD children.

摘要: 关于自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）危险因素的大多数研究是在种族和环境与发展中国家不同的发达国家进行的。我们比较了厄瓜多尔患有ASD的混血儿与对照组的营养状况，免疫反应和微生物群组成。25例病例和35例对照者按年龄，性别和学校所在地相匹配。ASD儿童的体重不足和超重患病率较高。营养差异伴随着异常饮食习惯和ASD儿童更常见的胃肠道症状。此外，在患有自闭症的儿童中观察到较高的血清TGF-β1浓度。最后，ASD儿童中的拟杆菌（2个OTUs），阿克曼虫病，副球菌和不同种类的鲁米诺球菌具有较高的α多样性和丰富性。

Pubmed_ID: 31495829

Natural diets promote retention of the native gut microbiota in captive rodents

天然饮食可促进天然肠道微生物在圈养啮齿动物中的滞留

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-019-0497-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31495829/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: Wild animals entering captivity experience radical lifestyle changes resulting in microbiome alterations. However, little is known about the factors that drive microbial community shifts in captivity, and what actions could mitigate microbial changes. Using white-throated woodrats (Neotoma albigula), we tested whether offering natural diets in captivity facilitates retention of native microbial communities of captive animals. Wild-caught woodrats were brought to laboratory conditions. Woodrats received either a natural diet of Opuntia cactus or an artificial diet of commercial chow over three weeks. Microbial inventories from woodrat feces at the time of capture and in captivity were generated using Illumina 16S rRNA sequencing. We found that providing woodrats with wild-natural diets significantly mitigated alterations in their microbiota, promoting a 90% retention of native microbial communities across the experiment. In contrast, the artificial diet significantly impacted microbial structure to the extent that 38% of the natural microflora was lost. Core bacteria including Bifidobacterium and Allobaculum were lost, and abundances of microbes related to oxalate degradation decreased in individuals fed artificial but not natural diets. These results highlight the importance of supplementing captive diets with natural foods to maintain native microbiomes of animals kept in artificial conditions for scientific or conservation purposes.

摘要: 被圈养的野生动物经历了彻底的生活方式改变，导致微生物组发生改变。但是，对于导致微生物群落圈养变化的因素以及采取何种行动可以减轻微生物变化的了解甚少。我们使用白喉伍德拉特（Neotomaalbigula），测试了提供人工饲养的自然饮食是否有助于保留圈养动物的原生微生物群落。将野生捕捞的伍德拉特犬带入实验室条件。Woodrats在三周内接受了仙人掌自然饮食或商业食物的人工饮食。使用Illumina16SrRNA测序，从捕获时和圈养时的Woodrat粪便中收集微生物清单。我们发现，为伍德拉特鼠提供野生自然饮食可显着减轻其微生物群的变化，从而在整个实验过程中促进90％的原生微生物群落保留。相反，人工饮食对微生物结构的影响很大，以至于丧失了38％的天然菌群。人工喂养但非自然饮食的个体丧失了包括双歧杆菌和同种异位菌在内的核心细菌，与草酸盐降解有关的微生物数量减少了。这些结果凸显了用天然食品补充圈养饮食以维持出于科学或保护目的在人工条件下饲养的动物的天然微生物组的重要性。

Pubmed_ID: 31492962

Metagenomic and chemical characterization of soil cobalamin production

土壤钴胺素生产的元基因组学和化学特征

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-019-0502-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31492962/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: Cobalamin (vitamin B12) is an essential enzyme cofactor for most branches of life. Despite the potential importance of this cofactor for soil microbial communities, the producers and consumers of cobalamin in terrestrial environments are still unknown. Here we provide the first metagenome-based assessment of soil cobalamin-producing bacteria and archaea, quantifying and classifying genes encoding proteins for cobalamin biosynthesis, transport, remodeling, and dependency in 155 soil metagenomes with profile hidden Markov models. We also measured several forms of cobalamin (CN-, Me-, OH-, Ado-B12) and the cobalamin lower ligand (5,6-dimethylbenzimidazole; DMB) in 40 diverse soil samples. Metagenomic analysis revealed that less than 10% of soil bacteria and archaea encode the genetic potential for de novo synthesis of this important enzyme cofactor. Predominant soil cobalamin producers were associated with the Proteobacteria, Actinobacteria, Firmicutes, Nitrospirae, and Thaumarchaeota. In contrast, a much larger proportion of abundant soil genera lacked cobalamin synthesis genes and instead were associated with gene sequences encoding cobalamin transport and cobalamin-dependent enzymes. The enrichment of DMB and corresponding DMB synthesis genes, relative to corrin ring synthesis genes, suggests an important role for cobalamin remodelers in terrestrial habitats. Together, our results indicate that microbial cobalamin production and repair serve as keystone functions that are significantly correlated with microbial community size, diversity, and biogeochemistry of terrestrial ecosystems.

摘要: 钴胺素（维生素B12）是生命中大部分分支的必需酶辅因子。尽管该辅助因子对土壤微生物群落具有潜在的重要性，但在陆地环境中钴胺素的生产者和消费者仍然未知。在这里，我们提供了第一个基于元基因组的土壤钴胺素生产细菌和古细菌的评估，量化和分类了编码155个土壤突变基因组中隐含马尔可夫模型的钴胺素生物合成，转运，重塑和依赖性蛋白的基因。我们还测量了40种不同土壤样品中几种形式的钴胺素（CN-，Me-，OH-，Ado-B12）和钴胺素低配体（5,6-二甲基苯并咪唑;DMB）。元基因组学分析表明，不到10％的土壤细菌和古细菌编码这种重要酶辅因子从头合成的遗传潜力。土壤钴胺素的主要生产者与变形杆菌，放线菌，硬毛，硝化螺旋藻和丘菌科细菌有关。相反，大量土壤属中缺乏钴胺素合成基因，而与编码钴胺素转运和钴胺素依赖性酶的基因序列有关。相对于corrin环合成基因，DMB和相应DMB合成基因的富集表明钴胺素重塑剂在陆地生境中具有重要作用。总之，我们的结果表明，微生物钴胺素的产生和修复是与微生物群落大小，多样性和陆地生态系统生物地球化学显着相关的基石功能。

Pubmed_ID: 31492961

Metaproteomics reveal that rapid perturbations in organic matter prioritize functional restructuring over taxonomy in western Arctic Ocean microbiomes

元蛋白质组学揭示了在北冰洋西部微生物群落中，有机物的快速扰动优先于功能重组而不是分类学

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-019-0503-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31492961/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: We examined metaproteome profiles from two Arctic microbiomes during 10-day shipboard incubations to directly track early functional and taxonomic responses to a simulated algal bloom and an oligotrophic control. Using a novel peptide-based enrichment analysis, significant changes (p-value < 0.01) in biological and molecular functions associated with carbon and nitrogen recycling were observed. Within the first day under both organic matter conditions, Bering Strait surface microbiomes increased protein synthesis, carbohydrate degradation, and cellular redox processes while decreasing C1 metabolism. Taxonomic assignments revealed that the core microbiome collectively responded to algal substrates by assimilating carbon before select taxa utilize and metabolize nitrogen intracellularly. Incubations of Chukchi Sea bottom water microbiomes showed similar, but delayed functional responses to identical treatments. Although 24 functional terms were shared between experimental treatments, the timing, and degree of the remaining responses were highly variable, showing that organic matter perturbation directs community functionality prior to alterations to the taxonomic distribution at the microbiome class level. The dynamic responses of these two oceanic microbial communities have important implications for timing and magnitude of responses to organic perturbations within the Arctic Ocean and how community-level functions may forecast biogeochemical gradients in oceans.

摘要: 我们在10天的舰船孵化过程中检查了两个北极微生物群落的元蛋白质组概况，以直接跟踪对模拟藻华和营养缺乏控制的早期功能和分类学响应。使用基于肽的新型富集分析，观察到与碳和氮循环相关的生物学和分子功能的显着变化（p值<0.01）。在两种有机物质条件下的第一天，白令海峡表面微生物群落增加了蛋白质合成，碳水化合物降解和细胞氧化还原过程，同时降低了C1代谢。分类学任务表明，核心微生物组在选择的分类单元利用并代谢细胞内氮之前，通过吸收碳来共同对藻类底物作出反应。楚科奇海底微生物群落的孵化显示相似，但对相同处理的功能反应延迟。尽管实验处理之间共有24个功能性术语，但其余反应的时间和程度却高度可变，这表明在微生物组类别的分类学分布发生变化之前，有机物扰动会指导群落功能。这两个海洋微生物群落的动态响应对于北冰洋内对有机扰动的响应时间和响应强度以及社区层面的功能如何预测海洋生物地球化学梯度具有重要意义。

Pubmed_ID: 31492690

Dietary fat and the faecal microbiome: where collinearity may lead to incorrect attribution of effects to fat

膳食脂肪和粪便微生物组：共线性可能导致对脂肪影响的错误归因

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-319628

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31492690/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 31484996

The functional repertoire contained within the native microbiota of the model nematode Caenorhabditis elegans

线虫秀丽隐杆线虫模型的天然微生物群中包含的功能库

DOI: 10.1038/s41396-019-0504-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31484996/

Journal: The ISME journal ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: The microbiota is generally assumed to have a substantial influence on the biology of multicellular organisms. The exact functional contributions of the microbes are often unclear and cannot be inferred easily from 16S rRNA genotyping, which is commonly used for taxonomic characterization of bacterial associates. In order to bridge this knowledge gap, we here analyzed the metabolic competences of the native microbiota of the model nematode Caenorhabditis elegans. We integrated whole-genome sequences of 77 bacterial microbiota members with metabolic modeling and experimental characterization of bacterial physiology. We found that, as a community, the microbiota can synthesize all essential nutrients for C. elegans. Both metabolic models and experimental analyses revealed that nutrient context can influence how bacteria interact within the microbiota. We identified key bacterial traits that are likely to influence the microbe's ability to colonize C. elegans (i.e., the ability of bacteria for pyruvate fermentation to acetoin) and affect nematode fitness (i.e., bacterial competence for hydroxyproline degradation). Considering that the microbiota is usually neglected in C. elegans research, the resource presented here will help our understanding of this nematode's biology in a more natural context. Our integrative approach moreover provides a novel, general framework to characterize microbiota-mediated functions.

摘要: 通常认为微生物群对多细胞生物的生物学有重大影响。微生物的确切功能贡献通常是不清楚的，并且不能轻易地从16SrRNA基因分型推论得出，16SrRNA基因分型通常用于细菌伴生物的分类学表征。为了弥合这一知识鸿沟，我们在这里分析了线虫秀丽隐杆线虫的天然微生物群的代谢能力。我们整合了代谢模型和细菌生理学实验表征的77个细菌微生物群成员的全基因组序列。我们发现，作为一个群落，微生物群可以合成秀丽隐杆线虫的所有必需营养素。代谢模型和实验分析均表明，营养物环境可以影响细菌在微生物群内的相互作用。我们确定了可能影响微生物定殖线虫的能力（即细菌将丙酮酸发酵成乙酰丙酮的能力）并影响线虫的适应性（即细菌对羟脯氨酸降解的能力）的关键细菌性状。考虑到秀丽隐杆线虫的研究通常忽略了微生物群，此处提供的资源将有助于我们在更自然的背景下了解该线虫的生物学特性。此外，我们的整合方法提供了一个新颖的，通用的框架来表征微生物群介导的功能。

Pubmed_ID: 31471351

Transfer of a healthy microbiota reduces amyloid and tau pathology in an Alzheimer's disease animal model

健康微生物群的转移减少了阿尔茨海默氏病动物模型中的淀粉样蛋白和tau病理

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2018-317431

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31471351/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Feb

Abstract: Objective: Cerebral amyloidosis and severe tauopathy in the brain are key pathological features of Alzheimer's disease (AD). Despite a strong influence of the intestinal microbiota on AD, the causal relationship between the gut microbiota and AD pathophysiology is still elusive. Design: Using a recently developed AD-like pathology with amyloid and neurofibrillary tangles (ADLPAPT) transgenic mouse model of AD, which shows amyloid plaques, neurofibrillary tangles and reactive gliosis in their brains along with memory deficits, we examined the impact of the gut microbiota on AD pathogenesis. Results: Composition of the gut microbiota in ADLPAPT mice differed from that of healthy wild-type (WT) mice. Besides, ADLPAPT mice showed a loss of epithelial barrier integrity and chronic intestinal and systemic inflammation. Both frequent transfer and transplantation of the faecal microbiota from WT mice into ADLPAPT mice ameliorated the formation of amyloid β plaques and neurofibrillary tangles, glial reactivity and cognitive impairment. Additionally, the faecal microbiota transfer reversed abnormalities in the colonic expression of genes related to intestinal macrophage activity and the circulating blood inflammatory monocytes in the ADLPAPT recipient mice. Conclusion: These results indicate that microbiota-mediated intestinal and systemic immune aberrations contribute to the pathogenesis of AD in ADLPAPT mice, providing new insights into the relationship between the gut (colonic gene expression, gut permeability), blood (blood immune cell population) and brain (pathology) axis and AD (memory deficits). Thus, restoring gut microbial homeostasis may have beneficial effects on AD treatment.

摘要: 目的：脑淀粉样变性病和严重的脑部tauopathy是阿尔茨海默氏病（AD）的关键病理特征。尽管肠道菌群对AD的影响很大，但肠道菌群与AD病理生理之间的因果关系仍然难以捉摸。设计：使用最近开发的具有AD的淀粉样蛋白和神经原纤维缠结（ADLPAPT）转基因小鼠模型的AD样病理学，该模型显示了大脑中的淀粉样蛋白斑块，神经原纤维缠结和反应性胶质增生以及记忆缺陷，我们研究了肠道菌群的影响关于AD的发病机理。结果：ADLPAPT小鼠的肠道菌群组成与健康的野生型（WT）小鼠不同。此外，ADLPAPT小鼠表现出上皮屏障完整性的丧失以及慢性肠道和全身炎症。WT小鼠粪便菌群的频繁转移和移植到ADLPAPT小鼠中均改善了淀粉样β斑块和神经原纤维缠结，神经胶质反应性和认知障碍的形成。另外，粪便微生物群转移逆转了与ADLPAPT受体小鼠中的肠巨噬细胞活性和循环的血液炎性单核细胞有关的基因的结肠表达异常。结论：这些结果表明，微生物群介导的肠道和全身免疫畸变是导致ADLPAPT小鼠AD发病的原因，为了解肠道（结肠基因表达，肠道通透性），血液（血液免疫细胞群）与肠道之间的关系提供了新见解。脑（病理）轴和AD（记忆缺陷）。因此，恢复肠道微生物的动态平衡可能会对AD治疗产生有益的影响。

Pubmed_ID: 31411526

Prevention of enteric bacterial infections and modulation of gut microbiota with conjugated linoleic acids producing Lactobacillus in mice

预防肠道细菌感染和共轭亚油酸产生乳酸菌对小鼠肠道菌群的调节

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1638724

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31411526/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 05/03/2020

Abstract: Probiotics are recognized for outcompeting pathogenic bacteria by competitive receptor-mediated colonization and secretion of functional metabolites which are antimicrobial against certain microbes as well as improving host's gut health and immunity. Recently, we have constructed a bioactive Lactobacillus casei (LC) strain, LC+mcra , by inserting mcra (myosin cross-reactive antigen) gene, which stimulates the conversion of conjugated linoleic acids. In this study, we evaluated the modulation of gut microbiome and protective roles of LC+mcra against pathogenic Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium (ST) and enterohemorrhagic E. coli (EHEC) infections in BALB/cJ mice. We observed that LC+mcra colonized efficiently in mice gut intestine and competitively reduced the infection with ST and EHEC in various locations of small and large intestine, specifically cecum, jejunum, and ileum (p < 0.05). Positive modulation of the cecal microbiota, for example, higher relative abundances of Firmicutes, lower relative abundances of Proteobacteria, and increased bacterial species diversity/richness, was detected in ST-challenged mice pretreated with LC+mcra based on 16S metagenomic sequencing. Cytokine gene expression analysis indicated that mice pretreated with LC+mcra associated with attenuated bacterial pathogen-induced gut inflammation. Furthermore, mice fed daily with LC+mcra for one week could protect themselves from the impairments caused by enteric infections with ST or EHEC. These impairments include weight loss, negative hematological changes, intestinal histological alterations, and potential death. This in vivo study suggests that daily consumption of novel conjugated linoleic acids over-producing probiotic effectively improves intestinal microbiota composition and prevents/combats foodborne enteric bacterial infections with pathogenic Salmonella and diarrheagenic E. coli.

摘要: 益生菌通过竞争性受体介导的定殖和功能代谢产物的分泌而胜过病原菌，功能代谢产物对某些微生物具有抗菌作用，并改善了肠道健康和免疫力。最近，我们通过插入mcra（肌球蛋白交叉反应抗原）基因来构建生物活性干酪乳杆菌（LC）菌株LC+mcra，该基因刺激了共轭亚油酸的转化。在这项研究中，我们评估了BALB/cJ小鼠中肠道微生物组的调节作用以及LC+mcra对病原性肠炎沙门氏菌血清鼠伤寒（ST）和大肠埃希菌（EHEC）感染的保护作用。我们观察到LC+mcra在小鼠肠道小肠中有效定居，并竞争性地减少了小肠和大肠的各个位置（特别是盲肠，空肠和回肠）中ST和EHEC的感染（p<0.05）。在基于16S宏基因组测序的用LC+mcra预处理的ST攻击的小鼠中，检测到盲肠菌群的正向调节，例如，沙门氏菌的相对丰度较高，变形杆菌的相对丰度较低，细菌种类的多样性/丰富度增加。细胞因子基因表达分析表明，用LC+mcra预处理的小鼠与细菌病原体诱导的肠道炎症反应减弱有关。此外，每天接受LC+mcra喂养一周的小鼠可以保护自己免受ST或EHEC肠感染的损害。这些损害包括体重减轻，血液学变化阴性，肠道组织学改变和潜在死亡。这项体内研究表明，每天食用过量产生过量益生菌的新型共轭亚油酸可有效改善肠道菌群组成，并预防/抵抗食源性肠细菌感染致病性沙门氏菌和腹泻性大肠杆菌。

Pubmed_ID: 31379246

Opioid use potentiates the virulence of hospital-acquired infection, increases systemic bacterial dissemination and exacerbates gut dysbiosis in a murine model of Citrobacter rodentium infection

阿片类药物的使用可增强医院获得性感染的毒力，增加全身细菌的传播，并加剧鼠类柠檬酸杆菌感染小鼠模型中的肠道营养不良。

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1629237

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31379246/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: Opioid analgesics are frequently prescribed in the United States and worldwide. However, serious side effects such as addiction, immunosuppression and gastrointestinal symptoms limit their use. It was recently demonstrated that morphine treatment results in a significant disruption in gut barrier function, leading to an increased translocation of gut commensal bacteria. Further studies have indicated distinct alterations in the gut microbiome and metabolome following morphine treatment, contributing to the negative consequences that are associated with opioid use. However, it is unclear how opioids modulate gut homeostasis in the context of a hospital-acquired bacterial infection. Citrobacter rodentium is an ideal murine model of human infections with enteropathogenic Escherichia coli (EPEC) and enterohemorrhagic E. coli (EHEC). In the current study, a mouse model of C. rodentium infection was used to investigate the role of morphine in the modulation of gut homeostasis in the context of a hospital-acquired bacterial infection. Morphine treatment resulted in 1) the promotion of C. rodentium systemic dissemination, 2) an increase in the expression of the virulence factors of C. rodentium colonization in intestinal contents, 3) altered gut microbiome, 4) damaged integrity of gut epithelial barrier function, 5) inhibition of the C. rodentium-induced increase in goblet cells, and 6) dysregulated IL-17A immune response. This study demonstrates and further validates a positive correlation between opioid drug use/abuse and an increased risk of infections, suggesting that the overprescription of opioids may increase the susceptibility to hospital-acquired infection.

摘要: 阿片类镇痛药在美国和世界各地经常开出处方。但是，诸如成瘾，免疫抑制和胃肠道症状等严重的副作用限制了它们的使用。最近证实，吗啡治疗导致肠道屏障功能的显着破坏，导致肠道共生细菌的移位增加。进一步的研究表明，吗啡治疗后肠道微生物组和代谢组发生了明显变化，导致与使用阿片类药物有关的负面后果。然而，尚不清楚在医院获得性细菌感染的情况下，阿片类药物如何调节肠道稳态。啮齿类柠檬酸杆菌是人类感染肠道致病性大肠杆菌（EPEC）和出血性大肠杆菌（EHEC）的理想鼠类模型。在当前的研究中，使用了啮齿类念珠菌感染的小鼠模型来研究吗啡在医院获得性细菌感染的情况下在调节肠道稳态中的作用。吗啡治疗导致1）促进啮齿类动物的全身传播，2）肠道内容物中啮齿类动物结肠定殖的毒力因子表达增加，3）肠道微生物组改变，4）肠道上皮屏障功能完整性受损，5）抑制啮齿类念珠菌诱导的杯状细胞增加，以及6）IL-17A免疫反应异常。这项研究证明并进一步验证了阿片类药物的使用/滥用与感染风险增加之间的正相关性，这表明阿片类药物的处方过多可能会增加医院获得性感染的易感性。

Pubmed_ID: 31368397

Gut microbes and metabolites as modulators of blood-brain barrier integrity and brain health

肠道微生物和代谢产物可调节血脑屏障的完整性和大脑健康

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1638722

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31368397/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: The human gastrointestinal (gut) microbiota comprises diverse and dynamic populations of bacteria, archaea, viruses, fungi, and protozoa, coexisting in a mutualistic relationship with the host. When intestinal homeostasis is perturbed, the function of the gastrointestinal tract and other organ systems, including the brain, can be compromised. The gut microbiota is proposed to contribute to blood-brain barrier disruption and the pathogenesis of neurodegenerative diseases. While progress is being made, a better understanding of interactions between gut microbes and host cells, and the impact these have on signaling from gut to brain is now required. In this review, we summarise current evidence of the impact gut microbes and their metabolites have on blood-brain barrier integrity and brain function, and the communication networks between the gastrointestinal tract and brain, which they may modulate. We also discuss the potential of microbiota modulation strategies as therapeutic tools for promoting and restoring brain health.

摘要: 人的胃肠（肠道）微生物群包括细菌，古细菌，病毒，真菌和原生动物的各种动态种群，它们与宿主共存。当肠道稳态受到干扰时，胃肠道和其他器官系统（包括大脑）的功能可能会受到损害。肠道菌群被认为有助于血脑屏障的破坏和神经退行性疾病的发病机理。在取得进步的同时，现在需要对肠道微生物与宿主细胞之间的相互作用以及它们对从肠道到大脑的信号传导产生的影响有更好的了解。在这篇综述中，我们总结了影响肠道微生物及其代谢产物对血脑屏障完整性和大脑功能以及胃肠道与大脑之间的通讯网络（可能会调节）的当前证据。我们还讨论了微生物群调节策略作为促进和恢复大脑健康的治疗工具的潜力。

Pubmed_ID: 31347946

Innate lymphoid cells link gut microbes with mucosal T cell immunity

先天性淋巴样细胞将肠道微生物与粘膜T细胞免疫力联系起来

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1638725

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31347946/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: Despite continuous exposure to trillions of microbes, the intestinal immune system protects the mucosa by balancing barrier protection, tolerance, and immunity. As both sentinel and effector, the mucosal innate immune system plays a central role in coordinating these responses. By integrating signals from the intestinal microbiota, mononuclear phagocytes (MNPs) serve as a critical link in regulating effector functions of group 3 innate lymphoid cells (ILC3s). Our recent work identified the role for MNP production of the IBD-linked protein TNF-like ligand 1A (TL1A) in modulating microbial regulation of ILC3 barrier immunity. These findings highlight a broader role for ILC3s in local control of T cell immunity and their potential role in the pathogenesis and treatment of inflammatory disease.

摘要: 尽管持续暴露于数万亿微生物，但肠道免疫系统通过平衡屏障保护，耐受性和免疫力来保护粘膜。作为前哨和效应物，粘膜先天免疫系统在协调这些反应中起着核心作用。通过整合来自肠道菌群的信号，单核吞噬细胞（MNP）成为调节第3组先天性淋巴样细胞（ILC3）效应子功能的关键环节。我们最近的工作确定了IBD连接蛋白TNF样配体1A（TL1A）的MNP产生在调节ILC3屏障免疫力的微生物调节中的作用。这些发现突出了ILC3在T细胞免疫的局部控制中的更广泛作用及其在炎症性疾病的发病机理和治疗中的潜在作用。

Pubmed_ID: 31347944

Compositional analyses reveal correlations between taxon-level gut bacterial abundance and peripheral T cell marker expression in African infants

成分分析揭示了非洲婴儿分类单元水平肠道细菌的丰度与外周T细胞标志物表达之间的相关性

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1643673

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31347944/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: Although exclusive breastfeeding has been linked to lower rates of postnatal HIV transmission compared to nonexclusive breastfeeding, mechanisms underlying this are unclear. Across a longitudinally sampled cohort of South African infants, we showed that exclusively breastfed (EBF) infants had altered gut bacterial communities when compared to nonexclusively breastfed (NEBF) infants, as well as reduced peripheral CD4 + T cell activation and lowered chemokine and chemokine receptor expression in the oral mucosa. We further demonstrated that the relative abundance of key taxa was correlated with peripheral CD4 + T cell activation. Here, we supplement those findings by using compositional data analyses to identify shifts in the abundance of several Bifidobacteria strains relative to select strains of Escherichia, Bacteroides, and others that are associated with the transition to NEBF. We illustrate that the abundance ratio of these taxa is tightly correlated with feeding modality and is a strong predictor of peripheral T cell activation. More broadly, we discuss our study in the context of novel developments and explore future directions for the field.

摘要: 尽管与非排他性母乳喂养相比，排他性母乳喂养与较低的出生后艾滋病毒传播率有关，但尚不清楚其背后的机制。在一组纵向抽样的南非婴儿中，我们发现与非排他性母乳喂养的婴儿相比，纯母乳喂养的婴儿的肠道细菌群落发生了改变，外周CD4+T细胞活化降低，趋化因子和趋化因子受体降低在口腔粘膜中表达。我们进一步证明，关键分类单元的相对丰度与外周CD4+T细胞活化相关。在这里，我们通过使用成分数据分析来确定一些双歧杆菌菌株相对于选定的大肠杆菌，拟杆菌和其他与向NEBF过渡相关的菌株的丰度变化，来补充这些发现。我们说明，这些类群的丰度比与进食方式紧密相关，并且是周围T细胞活化的强烈预测因子。更广泛地说，我们在新颖发展的背景下讨论我们的研究，并探索该领域的未来方向。

Pubmed_ID: 31345081

Links between the gut microbiota, metabolism, and host behavior

肠道菌群，新陈代谢和宿主行为之间的联系

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1643674

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31345081/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: The gut microbiota is known to regulate multiple aspects of host physiology, including metabolism and behavior. Locomotion, which is closely intertwined with metabolism, is an important component of complex behaviors, such as foraging, mating, and evading predators. Our recent work revealed that certain bacterial species and their products modulate motor behavior in the fruit fly Drosophila melanogaster via metabolic and neuronal pathways. In the context of our previously published findings and recent work by others, I will discuss potential avenues for future research at the intersection of the microbiota, metabolism, and host behavior.

摘要: 已知肠道菌群可调节宿主生理的多个方面，包括新陈代谢和行为。运动与新陈代谢紧密相关，是复杂行为的重要组成部分，例如觅食，交配和逃避食肉动物。我们最近的工作表明，某些细菌种类及其产物通过代谢和神经元途径调节果蝇果蝇的运动行为。在我们先前发表的发现和其他人最近的工作的背景下，我将讨论微生物群，新陈代谢和宿主行为的交集，以进行未来研究的潜在途径。

Pubmed_ID: 31311405

Gut microbiota composition explains more variance in the host cardiometabolic risk than genetic ancestry

肠道菌群组成比遗传祖先解释了宿主代谢风险的更多差异

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1634416

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31311405/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: Cardiometabolic affections greatly contribute to the global burden of disease. The susceptibility to obesity, cardiovascular disease, and type-2 diabetes, conditions that add to the cardiometabolic syndrome (CMS), was associated with the ancestral genetic composition and gut microbiota. Studies explicitly testing associations between genetic ancestry and gut microbes are growing. We here examined whether the host genetic ancestry was associated with gut microbiota composition, and distinguished the effects of genetic ancestry and non-genetic factors on human cardiometabolic health. We performed a cross-sectional study with 441 community-dwelling Colombian mestizos from five cities spanning the Andes, Pacific, and Caribbean coasts. We characterized the host genetic ancestry by genotyping 40 ancestry informative markers; characterized gut microbiota through 16S rRNA gene sequencing; assessed diet intake, physical activity, cigarette, and medicament consumption; and measured cardiometabolic outcomes that allowed calculating a CMS risk scale. On average, each individual of our cohort was 67 ± 6% European, 21 ± 5% Native American and 12 ± 5% African. Multivariable-adjusted generalized linear models showed that individuals with higher Native American and African ancestries had increased fasting insulin, body mass index and CMS risk, as assessed by the CMS risk scale. Furthermore, we identified 21 OTUs associated to the host genetic ancestry and 20 to cardiometabolic health. While we highlight novel associations between genetic ancestry and gut microbiota, we found that the effect of intestinal microbes was more likely to explain the variance in CMS risk scale than the contributions of European, Native American and African genetic backgrounds.

摘要: 心脏代谢问题极大地加剧了全球疾病负担。肥胖，心血管疾病和2型糖尿病的易感性加重了心脏代谢综合征（CMS），与祖先的遗传成分和肠道菌群有关。明确测试遗传祖先与肠道微生物之间关联的研究正在增长。我们在这里检查了宿主遗传谱系是否与肠道菌群组成有关，并区分了遗传谱系和非遗传因素对人类心脏代谢健康的影响。我们对来自安第斯山脉，太平洋和加勒比海沿岸五个城市的441个社区居民哥伦比亚混血儿进行了横断面研究。我们通过对40个祖先信息标记进行基因分型来表征宿主遗传祖先。通过16SrRNA基因测序鉴定肠道菌群;评估饮食摄入，体育锻炼，香烟和药物消耗；和测量的心脏代谢结果，从而可以计算出CMS风险量表。平均而言，我们队列中的每个人都是67±6％欧洲人，21±5％美国印第安人和12±5％非洲人。经多变量调整的广义线性模型显示，根据CMS风险量表，具有较高美洲原住民和非洲血统的个体的空腹胰岛素，体重指数和CMS风险增加。此外，我们确定了与宿主遗传血统相关的21个OTU，以及与心脏代谢健康相关的20个OTU。尽管我们重点介绍了遗传起源与肠道菌群之间的新型关联，但我们发现，肠道菌的作用比欧洲，美洲原住民和非洲遗传背景的贡献更能解释CMS风险量表的差异。

Pubmed_ID: 31306081

Mechanisms and consequences of gut commensal translocation in chronic diseases

肠道疾病在慢性疾病中的转移机制及后果

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1629236

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31306081/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 2020

Abstract: Humans and other mammalian hosts have evolved mechanisms to control the bacteria colonizing their mucosal barriers to prevent invasion. While the breach of barriers by bacteria typically leads to overt infection, increasing evidence supports a role for translocation of commensal bacteria across an impaired gut barrier to extraintestinal sites in the pathogenesis of autoimmune and other chronic, non-infectious diseases. Whether gut commensal translocation is a cause or consequence of the disease is incompletely defined. Here we discuss factors that lead to translocation of live bacteria across the gut barrier. We expand upon our recently published demonstration that translocation of the gut pathobiont Enterococcus gallinarum can induce autoimmunity in susceptible hosts and postulate on the role of Enterococcus species as instigators of chronic, non-infectious diseases.

摘要: 人类和其他哺乳动物宿主已经进化出机制来控制细菌定居在其粘膜屏障中以防止入侵。尽管细菌破坏屏障通常会导致明显的感染，但越来越多的证据支持共生细菌通过受损的肠屏障转运到自身免疫性疾病和其他慢性非感染性疾病的发病机理中的作用。肠道食道易位是疾病的原因还是后果尚不完全清楚。在这里，我们讨论导致活菌跨过肠壁移位的因素。我们扩大了我们最近发表的证明，肠道病原体肠球菌肠球菌的移位可以在易感宿主中诱导自身免疫，并假定肠球菌作为慢性非传染性疾病的诱因者的作用。

Pubmed_ID: 31243055

Alterations of the bile microbiome in primary sclerosing cholangitis

原发性硬化性胆管炎胆汁微生物组的改变

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-318416

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31243055/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Background: Patients with primary sclerosing cholangitis (PSC) display an altered colonic microbiome compared with healthy controls. However, little is known on the bile duct microbiome and its interplay with bile acid metabolism in PSC. Methods: Patients with PSC (n=43) and controls without sclerosing cholangitis (n=22) requiring endoscopic retrograde cholangiography were included prospectively. Leading indications in controls were sporadic choledocholithiasis and papillary adenoma. A total of 260 biospecimens were collected from the oral cavity, duodenal fluid and mucosa and ductal bile. Microbiomes of the upper alimentary tract and ductal bile were profiled by sequencing the 16S-rRNA-encoding gene (V1-V2). Bile fluid bile acid composition was measured by high-performance liquid chromatography mass spectrometry and validated in an external cohort (n=20). Results: The bile fluid harboured a diverse microbiome that was distinct from the oral cavity, the duodenal fluid and duodenal mucosa communities. The upper alimentary tract microbiome differed between PSC patients and controls. However, the strongest differences between PSC patients and controls were observed in the ductal bile fluid, including reduced biodiversity (Shannon entropy, p=0.0127) and increase of pathogen Enterococcus faecalis (FDR=4.18×10-5) in PSC. Enterococcus abundance in ductal bile was strongly correlated with concentration of the noxious secondary bile acid taurolithocholic acid (r=0.60, p=0.0021). Conclusion: PSC is characterised by an altered microbiome of the upper alimentary tract and bile ducts. Biliary dysbiosis is linked with increased concentrations of the proinflammatory and potentially cancerogenic agent taurolithocholic acid.

摘要: 背景：与健康对照组相比，原发性硬化性胆管炎（PSC）患者的结肠微生物组发生了改变。然而，关于胆管微生物组及其与PSC中胆汁酸代谢的相互作用了解甚少。方法：前瞻性纳入需要内镜逆行胆管造影术的PSC患者（n=43）和无硬化性胆管炎的对照组（n=22）。对照的主要指征是散发性胆管结石症和乳头状腺瘤。从口腔，十二指肠液，粘膜和导管胆汁中收集了总共260份生物标本。通过对16S-rRNA编码基因（V1-V2）进行测序，分析了上消化道和导管胆的微生物组。胆汁液胆汁酸成分通过高效液相色谱质谱法测定，并在外部队列中验证（n=20）。结果：胆汁液中含有多种微生物，不同于口腔，十二指肠液和十二指肠黏膜群落。PSC患者和对照组之间的上消化道微生物组有所不同。然而，PSC患者和对照组之间在导管胆汁中的差异最大，包括生物多样性降低（Shannon熵，p=0.0127）和病原菌肠屎肠球菌（FDR=4.18×10-5）的增加。导管胆汁中肠球菌的丰度与有害的次级胆汁酸牛磺石胆酸的浓度密切相关（r=0.60，p=0.0021）。结论：PSC的特征是上消化道和胆管的微生物组改变。胆汁性营养不良与促炎和潜在致癌物质牛磺石胆酸的浓度增加有关。

Pubmed_ID: 31227588

Tracing the accumulation of in vivo human oral microbiota elucidates microbial community dynamics at the gateway to the GI tract

追踪体内人类口腔微生物群的积累可阐明胃肠道入口处的微生物群落动态

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-318977

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31227588/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 31203722

Dynamic immunoglobulin responses to gut bacteria during inflammatory bowel disease

炎症性肠病期间对肠道细菌的动态免疫球蛋白反应

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1626683

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31203722/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 05/03/2020

Abstract: Aberrant immune responses against gut microbiota are thought to be key drivers of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) pathogenesis. However, the extent and targets of immunoglobulin (Ig) A versus IgG responses to gut bacteria in IBD and its association with IBD severity is not well understood. Here, we address this by analyzing fecal samples from Crohn's disease (CD), ulcerative colitis (UC), and Non-IBD patients by flow cytometry for the frequency of bacteria that were endogenously bound with IgA and/or IgG. Assessment of IBD patients from two geographically distinct cohorts revealed increased percentages of IgA- and IgG-bound fecal bacteria compared to non-IBD controls. Notably, the two major subsets of IBD showed distinct patterns of Ig-bound bacteria, with CD activity associated with increases in both IgA and IgG-bound bacteria, whereas UC activity correlated only with increases in IgG-bound bacteria. Analysis of the flow sorted Ig-bound bacterial repertoire by 16S rDNA sequencing revealed taxa that were Ig-bound specifically in IBD. Notably, this included bacteria that are also thought to reside in the oral pharynx, including Gemella, Peptostreptococcus, and Streptococcus species. These data show that the pattern of IgA and IgG binding to fecal bacteria is distinct in UC and CD. In addition, the frequency of Ig-bound fecal bacteria may have potential as a non-invasive biomarker for disease activity. Finally, our results support the hypothesis that immune responses to oral pharyngeal bacteria may play an important role in the pathogenesis of IBD.

摘要: 人们认为，针对肠道菌群的异常免疫反应是炎症性肠病（IBD）发病机理的关键驱动因素。然而，人们对免疫球蛋白（Ig）A与IgG对IBD中肠道细菌的反应的程度和目标及其与IBD严重性的关联尚不清楚。在这里，我们通过流式细胞仪分析克罗恩病（CD），溃疡性结肠炎（UC）和非IBD患者的粪便样本来分析与IgA和/或IgG内源结合的细菌的频率。对来自两个地理上不同人群的IBD患者的评估显示，与非IBD对照相比，IgA和IgG结合的粪便细菌百分数增加。值得注意的是，IBD的两个主要子集显示出与Ig结合细菌不同的模式，CD活性与IgA和IgG结合细菌的增加相关，而UC活性仅与IgG结合细菌的增加相关。通过16SrDNA测序对流分类的与Ig结合的细菌库进行分析，发现在IBD中特异性结合Ig的分类单元。值得注意的是，这包括认为也存在于口腔咽中的细菌，包括双歧杆菌，消化链球菌和链球菌。这些数据表明，IgA和IgG与粪便细菌结合的模式在UC和CD中是不同的。另外，结合Ig的粪便细菌的频率可能具有潜在的疾病活动性非侵入性生物标志物的作用。最后，我们的结果支持以下假设：对口腔咽细菌的免疫反应可能在IBD的发病机理中起重要作用。

Pubmed_ID: 31203717

Lipopolysaccharides modulate intestinal epithelial permeability and inflammation in a species-specific manner

脂多糖以物种特异性方式调节肠道上皮通透性和炎症

DOI: 10.1080/19490976.2019.1629235

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31203717/

Journal: Gut microbes {'ISSN': '1949-0976', 'Name': 'gut microbes', '2015': '0', '2016': '0', '2017': '0', '2018': '7.823', '2019': '7.74'}

Date: 05/03/2020

Abstract: Patients presenting with Inflammatory bowel disease have been shown to exhibit an altered microbiome in both Crohn's disease and Ulcerative colitis. This shift in the microbial content led us to question whether several of these microbes are important in inflammatory processes present in these diseases and more specifically whether lipopolysaccharides from the gram-negative cell wall differentially stimulates resident cells. We, therefore, investigated the possible contribution of five major species of gram-negative bacteria found to be altered in presence during disease progression and evaluate their pathogenicity through LPS. We demonstrated that LPS from these different species had individual capacities to induce NF-κB and pro-inflammatory IL-8 production from HEK-TLR4 cells in a TLR4 dependent manner. Additional work using human intestinal colonic epithelial cell monolayers (Caco-2) demonstrated that the cells responded to the serotype specific LPS in a distinct manner, inducing many inflammatory mediators such as TNF-α and IL-10 in significantly altered proportions. Furthermore, the permeability of Caco-2 monolayers, as a test for their ability to alter intestinal permeability, was also differentially altered by the serotype specific LPS modulating trans-epithelial electrical resistance, small molecule movement, and tight junction integrity. Our results suggest that specific species of bacteria may be potentiating the pathogenesis of IBD and chronic inflammatory diseases through their serotype specific LPS responses.

摘要: 已显示患有炎症性肠病的患者在克罗恩病和溃疡性结肠炎中均表现出微生物组的改变。微生物含量的这种变化使我们怀疑这些微生物中的几种在这些疾病中存在的炎症过程中是否重要，更具体地讲，来自革兰氏阴性细胞壁的脂多糖是否能差异性刺激驻留细胞。因此，我们研究了在疾病发展过程中发现存在的五种主要革兰氏阴性细菌的可能贡献，并通过LPS评估了它们的致病性。我们证明了来自这些不同物种的LPS具有以TLR4依赖性方式诱导HEK-TLR4细胞产生NF-κB和促炎性IL-8的能力。使用人肠道结肠上皮细胞单层（Caco-2）的其他工作表明，细胞以独特的方式对血清型特异性LPS作出反应，诱导了许多炎症介质，例如TNF-α和IL-10的比例大大改变。此外，Caco-2单层的渗透性，作为测试其改变肠道渗透性的能力，还受到血清型特异性LPS调节跨上皮电阻，小分子运动和紧密连接完整性的影响。我们的结果表明，特定细菌种类可能通过其血清型特异性LPS反应增强IBD和慢性炎症性疾病的发病机制。

Pubmed_ID: 31203205

Trust is good, control is better: technical considerations in blood microbiome analysis

信任是好的，控制是更好的：血液微生物组分析中的技术考虑

DOI: 10.1136/gutjnl-2019-319123

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31203205/

Journal: Gut ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: No abstract
